GV01rv_hn08u:1: RV_8,001.01a mā cid anyad vi śaṃsata sakhāyo mā riṣaṇyata |
GV01rv_hn08u:2: RV_8,001.01c indram it stotā vṛṣaṇaṃ sacā sute muhur ukthā ca śaṃsata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3: RV_8,001.02a avakrakṣiṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ yathājuraṃ gāṃ na carṣaṇīsaham |
GV01rv_hn08u:5: RV_8,001.03a yac cid dhi tvā janā ime nānā havanta ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:6: RV_8,001.03c asmākam brahmedam indra bhūtu te 'hā viśvā ca vardhanam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:7: RV_8,001.04a vi tartūryante maghavan vipaścito 'ryo vipo janānām |
GV01rv_hn08u:8: RV_8,001.04c upa kramasva pururūpam ā bhara vājaṃ nediṣṭham ūtaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:9: RV_8,001.05a mahe cana tvām adrivaḥ parā śulkāya deyām |
GV01rv_hn08u:10: RV_8,001.05c na sahasrāya nāyutāya vajrivo na śatāya śatāmagha ||
GV01rv_hn08u:11: RV_8,001.06a vasyāṃ indrāsi me pitur uta bhrātur abhuñjataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:12: RV_8,001.06c mātā ca me chadayathaḥ samā vaso vasutvanāya rādhase ||
GV01rv_hn08u:13: RV_8,001.07a kveyatha kved asi purutrā cid dhi te manaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:14: RV_8,001.07c alarṣi yudhma khajakṛt purandara pra gāyatrā agāsiṣuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:15: RV_8,001.08a prāsmai gāyatram arcata vāvātur yaḥ purandaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:16: RV_8,001.08c yābhiḥ kāṇvasyopa barhir āsadaṃ yāsad vajrī bhinat puraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:17: RV_8,001.09a ye te santi daśagvinaḥ śatino ye sahasriṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:18: RV_8,001.09c aśvāso ye te vṛṣaṇo raghudruvas tebhir nas tūyam ā gahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:19: RV_8,001.10a ā tv adya sabardughāṃ huve gāyatravepasam |
GV01rv_hn08u:20: RV_8,001.10c indraṃ dhenuṃ sudughām anyām iṣam urudhārām araṅkṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:21: RV_8,001.11a yat tudat sūra etaśaṃ vaṅkū vātasya parṇinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:22: RV_8,001.11c vahat kutsam ārjuneyaṃ śatakratuḥ tsarad gandharvam astṛtam
GV01rv_hn08u:23: RV_8,001.12a ya ṛte cid abhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhya ātṛdaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:24: RV_8,001.12c saṃdhātā saṃdhim maghavā purūvasur iṣkartā vihrutam punaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:25: RV_8,001.13a mā bhūma niṣṭyā ivendra tvad araṇā iva |
GV01rv_hn08u:26: RV_8,001.13c vanāni na prajahitāny adrivo duroṣāso amanmahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:28: RV_8,001.14c sakṛt su te mahatā śūra rādhasā anu stomam mudīmahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:29: RV_8,001.15a yadi stomam mama śravad asmākam indram indavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:30: RV_8,001.15c tiraḥ pavitraṃ sasṛvāṃsa āśavo mandantu tugryāvṛdhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:31: RV_8,001.16a ā tv adya sadhastutiṃ vāvātuḥ sakhyur ā gahi |
GV01rv_hn08u:32: RV_8,001.16c upastutir maghonām pra tvāvatv adhā te vaśmi suṣṭutim ||
GV01rv_hn08u:33: RV_8,001.17a sotā hi somam adribhir em enam apsu dhāvata |
GV01rv_hn08u:34: RV_8,001.17c gavyā vastreva vāsayanta in naro nir dhukṣan vakṣaṇābhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:35: RV_8,001.18a adha jmo adha vā divo bṛhato rocanād adhi |
GV01rv_hn08u:36: RV_8,001.18c ayā vardhasva tanvā girā mamā jātā sukrato pṛṇa ||
GV01rv_hn08u:37: RV_8,001.19a indrāya su madintamaṃ somaṃ sotā vareṇyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:38: RV_8,001.19c śakra eṇam pīpayad viśvayā dhiyā hinvānaṃ na vājayum ||
GV01rv_hn08u:39: RV_8,001.20a mā tvā somasya galdayā sadā yācann ahaṃ girā |
GV01rv_hn08u:40: RV_8,001.20c bhūrṇim mṛgaṃ na savaneṣu cukrudhaṃ ka īśānaṃ na yāciṣat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:41: RV_8,001.21a madeneṣitam madam ugram ugreṇa śavasā |
GV01rv_hn08u:42: RV_8,001.21c viśveṣāṃ tarutāram madacyutam made hi ṣmā dadāti naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:43: RV_8,001.22a śevāre vāryā puru devo martāya dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:44: RV_8,001.22c sa sunvate ca stuvate ca rāsate viśvagūrto ariṣṭutaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:45: RV_8,001.23a endra yāhi matsva citreṇa deva rādhasā |
GV01rv_hn08u:46: RV_8,001.23c saro na prāsy udaraṃ sapītibhir ā somebhir uru sphiram ||
GV01rv_hn08u:47: RV_8,001.24a ā tvā sahasram ā śataṃ yuktā rathe hiraṇyaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:48: RV_8,001.24c brahmayujo haraya indra keśino vahantu somapītaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:49: RV_8,001.25a ā tvā rathe hiraṇyaye harī mayūraśepyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:50: RV_8,001.25c śitipṛṣṭhā vahatām madhvo andhaso vivakṣaṇasya pītaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:51: RV_8,001.26a pibā tv asya girvaṇaḥ sutasya pūrvapā iva |
GV01rv_hn08u:52: RV_8,001.26c pariṣkṛtasya rasina iyam āsutiś cārur madāya patyate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:53: RV_8,001.27a ya eko asti daṃsanā mahāṃ ugro abhi vrataiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:54: RV_8,001.27c gamat sa śiprī na sa yoṣad ā gamad dhavaṃ na pari varjati ||
GV01rv_hn08u:55: RV_8,001.28a tvam puraṃ cariṣṇvaṃ vadhaiḥ śuṣṇasya sam piṇak |
GV01rv_hn08u:56: RV_8,001.28c tvam bhā anu caro adha dvitā yad indra havyo bhuvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:57: RV_8,001.29a mama tvā sūra udite mama madhyandine divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:58: RV_8,001.29c mama prapitve apiśarvare vasav ā stomāso avṛtsata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:59: RV_8,001.30a stuhi stuhīd ete ghā te maṃhiṣṭhāso maghonām |
GV01rv_hn08u:60: RV_8,001.30c ninditāśvaḥ prapathī paramajyā maghasya medhyātithe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:61: RV_8,001.31a ā yad aśvān vananvataḥ śraddhayāhaṃ rathe ruham |
GV01rv_hn08u:62: RV_8,001.31c uta vāmasya vasunaś ciketati yo asti yādvaḥ paśuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:63: RV_8,001.32a ya ṛjrā mahyam māmahe saha tvacā hiraṇyayā |
GV01rv_hn08u:64: RV_8,001.32c eṣa viśvāny abhy astu saubhagāsaṅgasya svanadrathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:65: RV_8,001.33a adha plāyogir ati dāsad anyān āsaṅgo agne daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:66: RV_8,001.33c adhokṣaṇo daśa mahyaṃ ruśanto naḷā iva saraso nir atiṣṭhan ||
GV01rv_hn08u:67: RV_8,001.34a anv asya sthūraṃ dadṛśe purastād anastha ūrur avarambamāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:68: RV_8,001.34c śaśvatī nāry abhicakṣyāha subhadram arya bhojanam bibharṣi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:69: RV_8,002.01a idaṃ vaso sutam andhaḥ pibā supūrṇam udaram |
GV01rv_hn08u:71: RV_8,002.02a nṛbhir dhūtaḥ suto aśnair avyo vāraiḥ paripūtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:73: RV_8,002.03a taṃ te yavaṃ yathā gobhiḥ svādum akarma śrīṇantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:75: RV_8,002.04a indra it somapā eka indraḥ sutapā viśvāyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:77: RV_8,002.05a na yaṃ śukro na durāśīr na tṛprā uruvyacasam |
GV01rv_hn08u:79: RV_8,002.06a gobhir yad īm anye asman mṛgaṃ na vrā mṛgayante |
GV01rv_hn08u:81: RV_8,002.07a traya indrasya somāḥ sutāsaḥ santu devasya |
GV01rv_hn08u:83: RV_8,002.08a trayaḥ kośāsa ścotanti tisraś camvaḥ supūrṇāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:85: RV_8,002.09a śucir asi puruniṣṭhāḥ kṣīrair madhyata āśīrtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:87: RV_8,002.10a ime ta indra somās tīvrā asme sutāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:89: RV_8,002.11a tāṃ āśiram puroḷāśam indremaṃ somaṃ śrīṇīhi |
GV01rv_hn08u:91: RV_8,002.12a hṛtsu pītāso yudhyante durmadāso na surāyām |
GV01rv_hn08u:93: RV_8,002.13a revāṃ id revata stotā syāt tvāvato maghonaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:95: RV_8,002.14a ukthaṃ cana śasyamānam agor arir ā ciketa |
GV01rv_hn08u:97: RV_8,002.15a mā na indra pīyatnave mā śardhate parā dāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:99: RV_8,002.16a vayam u tvā tadidarthā indra tvāyantaḥ sakhāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:101: RV_8,002.17a na ghem anyad ā papana vajrinn apaso naviṣṭau |
GV01rv_hn08u:103: RV_8,002.18a icchanti devāḥ sunvantaṃ na svapnāya spṛhayanti |
GV01rv_hn08u:105: RV_8,002.19a o ṣu pra yāhi vājebhir mā hṛṇīthā abhy asmān |
GV01rv_hn08u:107: RV_8,002.20a mo ṣv adya durhaṇāvān sāyaṃ karad āre asmat |
GV01rv_hn08u:109: RV_8,002.21a vidmā hy asya vīrasya bhūridāvarīṃ sumatim |
GV01rv_hn08u:111: RV_8,002.22a ā tū ṣiñca kaṇvamantaṃ na ghā vidma śavasānāt |
GV01rv_hn08u:113: RV_8,002.23a jyeṣṭhena sotar indrāya somaṃ vīrāya śakrāya |
GV01rv_hn08u:115: RV_8,002.24a yo vediṣṭho avyathiṣv aśvāvantaṃ jaritṛbhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:117: RV_8,002.25a panyam-panyam it sotāra ā dhāvata madyāya |
GV01rv_hn08u:119: RV_8,002.26a pātā vṛtrahā sutam ā ghā gaman nāre asmat |
GV01rv_hn08u:121: RV_8,002.27a eha harī brahmayujā śagmā vakṣataḥ sakhāyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:123: RV_8,002.28a svādavaḥ somā ā yāhi śrītāḥ somā ā yāhi |
GV01rv_hn08u:124: RV_8,002.28c śiprinn ṛṣīvaḥ śacīvo nāyam acchā sadhamādam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:125: RV_8,002.29a stutaś ca yās tvā vardhanti mahe rādhase nṛmṇāya |
GV01rv_hn08u:127: RV_8,002.30a giraś ca yās te girvāha ukthā ca tubhyaṃ tāni |
GV01rv_hn08u:129: RV_8,002.31a eved eṣa tuvikūrmir vājāṃ eko vajrahastaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:131: RV_8,002.32a hantā vṛtraṃ dakṣiṇenendraḥ purū puruhūtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:133: RV_8,002.33a yasmin viśvāś carṣaṇaya uta cyautnā jrayāṃsi ca |
GV01rv_hn08u:135: RV_8,002.34a eṣa etāni cakārendro viśvā yo 'ti śṛṇve |
GV01rv_hn08u:137: RV_8,002.35a prabhartā rathaṃ gavyantam apākāc cid yam avati |
GV01rv_hn08u:138: RV_8,002.35c ino vasu sa hi voḷhā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:139: RV_8,002.36a sanitā vipro arvadbhir hantā vṛtraṃ nṛbhiḥ śūraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:141: RV_8,002.37a yajadhvainam priyamedhā indraṃ satrācā manasā |
GV01rv_hn08u:145: RV_8,002.39a ya ṛte cid gās padebhyo dāt sakhā nṛbhyaḥ śacīvān |
GV01rv_hn08u:147: RV_8,002.40a itthā dhīvantam adrivaḥ kāṇvam medhyātithim |
GV01rv_hn08u:149: RV_8,002.41a śikṣā vibhindo asmai catvāry ayutā dadat |
GV01rv_hn08u:151: RV_8,002.42a uta su tye payovṛdhā mākī raṇasya naptyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:153: RV_8,003.01a pibā sutasya rasino matsvā na indra gomataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:154: RV_8,003.01c āpir no bodhi sadhamādyo vṛdhe 'smāṃ avantu te dhiyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:155: RV_8,003.02a bhūyāma te sumatau vājino vayam mā na star abhimātaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:156: RV_8,003.02c asmāñ citrābhir avatād abhiṣṭibhir ā naḥ sumneṣu yāmaya ||
GV01rv_hn08u:157: RV_8,003.03a imā u tvā purūvaso giro vardhantu yā mama |
GV01rv_hn08u:158: RV_8,003.03c pāvakavarṇāḥ śucayo vipaścito 'bhi stomair anūṣata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:159: RV_8,003.04a ayaṃ sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sahaskṛtaḥ samudra iva paprathe |
GV01rv_hn08u:160: RV_8,003.04c satyaḥ so asya mahimā gṛṇe śavo yajñeṣu viprarājye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:161: RV_8,003.05a indram id devatātaya indram prayaty adhvare |
GV01rv_hn08u:162: RV_8,003.05c indraṃ samīke vanino havāmaha indraṃ dhanasya sātaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:163: RV_8,003.06a indro mahnā rodasī paprathac chava indraḥ sūryam arocayat |
GV01rv_hn08u:164: RV_8,003.06c indre ha viśvā bhuvanāni yemira indre suvānāsa indavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:165: RV_8,003.07a abhi tvā pūrvapītaya indra stomebhir āyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:166: RV_8,003.07c samīcīnāsa ṛbhavaḥ sam asvaran rudrā gṛṇanta pūrvyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:167: RV_8,003.08a asyed indro vāvṛdhe vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo made sutasya viṣṇavi |
GV01rv_hn08u:168: RV_8,003.08c adyā tam asya mahimānam āyavo 'nu ṣṭuvanti pūrvathā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:169: RV_8,003.09a tat tvā yāmi suvīryaṃ tad brahma pūrvacittaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:170: RV_8,003.09c yenā yatibhyo bhṛgave dhane hite yena praskaṇvam āvitha ||
GV01rv_hn08u:171: RV_8,003.10a yenā samudram asṛjo mahīr apas tad indra vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:172: RV_8,003.10c sadyaḥ so asya mahimā na saṃnaśe yaṃ kṣoṇīr anucakrade ||
GV01rv_hn08u:173: RV_8,003.11a śagdhī na indra yat tvā rayiṃ yāmi suvīryam |
GV01rv_hn08u:174: RV_8,003.11c śagdhi vājāya prathamaṃ siṣāsate śagdhi stomāya pūrvya ||
GV01rv_hn08u:175: RV_8,003.12a śagdhī no asya yad dha pauram āvitha dhiya indra siṣāsataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:176: RV_8,003.12c śagdhi yathā ruśamaṃ śyāvakaṃ kṛpam indra prāvaḥ svarṇaram ||
GV01rv_hn08u:177: RV_8,003.13a kan navyo atasīnāṃ turo gṛṇīta martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:178: RV_8,003.13c nahī nv asya mahimānam indriyaṃ svar gṛṇanta ānaśuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:179: RV_8,003.14a kad u stuvanta ṛtayanta devata ṛṣiḥ ko vipra ohate |
GV01rv_hn08u:180: RV_8,003.14c kadā havam maghavann indra sunvataḥ kad u stuvata ā gamaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:181: RV_8,003.15a ud u tye madhumattamā gira stomāsa īrate |
GV01rv_hn08u:182: RV_8,003.15c satrājito dhanasā akṣitotayo vājayanto rathā iva ||
GV01rv_hn08u:183: RV_8,003.16a kaṇvā iva bhṛgavaḥ sūryā iva viśvam id dhītam ānaśuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:184: RV_8,003.16c indraṃ stomebhir mahayanta āyavaḥ priyamedhāso asvaran ||
GV01rv_hn08u:185: RV_8,003.17a yukṣvā hi vṛtrahantama harī indra parāvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:186: RV_8,003.17c arvācīno maghavan somapītaya ugra ṛṣvebhir ā gahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:187: RV_8,003.18a ime hi te kāravo vāvaśur dhiyā viprāso medhasātaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:188: RV_8,003.18c sa tvaṃ no maghavann indra girvaṇo veno na śṛṇudhī havam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:189: RV_8,003.19a nir indra bṛhatībhyo vṛtraṃ dhanubhyo asphuraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:190: RV_8,003.19c nir arbudasya mṛgayasya māyino niḥ parvatasya gā ājaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:191: RV_8,003.20a nir agnayo rurucur nir u sūryo niḥ soma indriyo rasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:192: RV_8,003.20c nir antarikṣād adhamo mahām ahiṃ kṛṣe tad indra pauṃsyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:193: RV_8,003.21a yam me dur indro marutaḥ pākasthāmā kaurayāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:194: RV_8,003.21c viśveṣāṃ tmanā śobhiṣṭham upeva divi dhāvamānam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:195: RV_8,003.22a rohitam me pākasthāmā sudhuraṃ kakṣyaprām |
GV01rv_hn08u:197: RV_8,003.23a yasmā anye daśa prati dhuraṃ vahanti vahnayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:199: RV_8,003.24a ātmā pitus tanūr vāsa ojodā abhyañjanam |
GV01rv_hn08u:200: RV_8,003.24c turīyam id rohitasya pākasthāmānam bhojaṃ dātāram abravam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:201: RV_8,004.01a yad indra prāg apāg udaṅ nyag vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:202: RV_8,004.01c simā purū nṛṣūto asy ānave 'si praśardha turvaśe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:203: RV_8,004.02a yad vā rume ruśame śyāvake kṛpa indra mādayase sacā |
GV01rv_hn08u:204: RV_8,004.02c kaṇvāsas tvā brahmabhi stomavāhasa indrā yacchanty ā gahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:205: RV_8,004.03a yathā gauro apā kṛtaṃ tṛṣyann ety averiṇam |
GV01rv_hn08u:206: RV_8,004.03c āpitve naḥ prapitve tūyam ā gahi kaṇveṣu su sacā piba ||
GV01rv_hn08u:207: RV_8,004.04a mandantu tvā maghavann indrendavo rādhodeyāya sunvate |
GV01rv_hn08u:208: RV_8,004.04c āmuṣyā somam apibaś camū sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ tad dadhiṣe sahaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:209: RV_8,004.05a pra cakre sahasā saho babhañja manyum ojasā |
GV01rv_hn08u:210: RV_8,004.05c viśve ta indra pṛtanāyavo yaho ni vṛkṣā iva yemire ||
GV01rv_hn08u:211: RV_8,004.06a sahasreṇeva sacate yavīyudhā yas ta ānaḷ upastutim |
GV01rv_hn08u:212: RV_8,004.06c putram prāvargaṃ kṛṇute suvīrye dāśnoti namauktibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:213: RV_8,004.07a mā bhema mā śramiṣmograsya sakhye tava |
GV01rv_hn08u:214: RV_8,004.07c mahat te vṛṣṇo abhicakṣyaṃ kṛtam paśyema turvaśaṃ yadum ||
GV01rv_hn08u:215: RV_8,004.08a savyām anu sphigyaṃ vāvase vṛṣā na dāno asya roṣati |
GV01rv_hn08u:216: RV_8,004.08c madhvā sampṛktāḥ sāragheṇa dhenavas tūyam ehi dravā piba ||
GV01rv_hn08u:217: RV_8,004.09a aśvī rathī surūpa id gomāṃ id indra te sakhā |
GV01rv_hn08u:218: RV_8,004.09c śvātrabhājā vayasā sacate sadā candro yāti sabhām upa ||
GV01rv_hn08u:219: RV_8,004.10a ṛśyo na tṛṣyann avapānam ā gahi pibā somaṃ vaśāṃ anu |
GV01rv_hn08u:220: RV_8,004.10c nimeghamāno maghavan dive-diva ojiṣṭhaṃ dadhiṣe sahaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:221: RV_8,004.11a adhvaryo drāvayā tvaṃ somam indraḥ pipāsati |
GV01rv_hn08u:222: RV_8,004.11c upa nūnaṃ yuyuje vṛṣaṇā harī ā ca jagāma vṛtrahā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:223: RV_8,004.12a svayaṃ cit sa manyate dāśurir jano yatrā somasya tṛmpasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:224: RV_8,004.12c idaṃ te annaṃ yujyaṃ samukṣitaṃ tasyehi pra dravā piba ||
GV01rv_hn08u:226: RV_8,004.13c adhi bradhnasyādrayo vi cakṣate sunvanto dāśvadhvaram ||
GV01rv_hn08u:227: RV_8,004.14a upa bradhnaṃ vāvātā vṛṣaṇā harī indram apasu vakṣataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:228: RV_8,004.14c arvāñcaṃ tvā saptayo 'dhvaraśriyo vahantu savaned upa ||
GV01rv_hn08u:229: RV_8,004.15a pra pūṣaṇaṃ vṛṇīmahe yujyāya purūvasum |
GV01rv_hn08u:230: RV_8,004.15c sa śakra śikṣa puruhūta no dhiyā tuje rāye vimocana ||
GV01rv_hn08u:231: RV_8,004.16a saṃ naḥ śiśīhi bhurijor iva kṣuraṃ rāsva rāyo vimocana |
GV01rv_hn08u:232: RV_8,004.16c tve tan naḥ suvedam usriyaṃ vasu yaṃ tvaṃ hinoṣi martyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:233: RV_8,004.17a vemi tvā pūṣann ṛñjase vemi stotava āghṛṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:234: RV_8,004.17c na tasya vemy araṇaṃ hi tad vaso stuṣe pajrāya sāmne ||
GV01rv_hn08u:235: RV_8,004.18a parā gāvo yavasaṃ kac cid āghṛṇe nityaṃ rekṇo amartya |
GV01rv_hn08u:236: RV_8,004.18c asmākam pūṣann avitā śivo bhava maṃhiṣṭho vājasātaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:237: RV_8,004.19a sthūraṃ rādhaḥ śatāśvaṃ kuruṅgasya diviṣṭiṣu |
GV01rv_hn08u:238: RV_8,004.19c rājñas tveṣasya subhagasya rātiṣu turvaśeṣv amanmahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:239: RV_8,004.20a dhībhiḥ sātāni kāṇvasya vājinaḥ priyamedhair abhidyubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:240: RV_8,004.20c ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrānu nirmajām aje nir yūthāni gavām ṛṣiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:241: RV_8,004.21a vṛkṣāś cin me abhipitve arāraṇuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:242: RV_8,004.21c gām bhajanta mehanāśvam bhajanta mehanā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:243: RV_8,005.01a dūrād iheva yat saty aruṇapsur aśiśvitat |
GV01rv_hn08u:245: RV_8,005.02a nṛvad dasrā manoyujā rathena pṛthupājasā |
GV01rv_hn08u:247: RV_8,005.03a yuvābhyāṃ vājinīvasū prati stomā adṛkṣata |
GV01rv_hn08u:249: RV_8,005.04a purupriyā ṇa ūtaye purumandrā purūvasū |
GV01rv_hn08u:253: RV_8,005.06a tā sudevāya dāśuṣe sumedhām avitāriṇīm |
GV01rv_hn08u:255: RV_8,005.07a ā na stomam upa dravat tūyaṃ śyenebhir āśubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:257: RV_8,005.08a yebhis tisraḥ parāvato divo viśvāni rocanā |
GV01rv_hn08u:259: RV_8,005.09a uta no gomatīr iṣa uta sātīr aharvidā |
GV01rv_hn08u:261: RV_8,005.10a ā no gomantam aśvinā suvīraṃ surathaṃ rayim |
GV01rv_hn08u:263: RV_8,005.11a vāvṛdhānā śubhas patī dasrā hiraṇyavartanī |
GV01rv_hn08u:265: RV_8,005.12a asmabhyaṃ vājinīvasū maghavadbhyaś ca saprathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:267: RV_8,005.13a ni ṣu brahma janānāṃ yāviṣṭaṃ tūyam ā gatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:269: RV_8,005.14a asya pibatam aśvinā yuvam madasya cāruṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:271: RV_8,005.15a asme ā vahataṃ rayiṃ śatavantaṃ sahasriṇam |
GV01rv_hn08u:273: RV_8,005.16a purutrā cid dhi vāṃ narā vihvayante manīṣiṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:277: RV_8,005.18a asmākam adya vām ayaṃ stomo vāhiṣṭho antamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:279: RV_8,005.19a yo ha vām madhuno dṛtir āhito rathacarṣaṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:281: RV_8,005.20a tena no vājinīvasū paśve tokāya śaṃ gave |
GV01rv_hn08u:283: RV_8,005.21a uta no divyā iṣa uta sindhūṃr aharvidā |
GV01rv_hn08u:285: RV_8,005.22a kadā vāṃ taugryo vidhat samudre jahito narā |
GV01rv_hn08u:286: RV_8,005.22c yad vāṃ ratho vibhiṣ patāt ||
GV01rv_hn08u:287: RV_8,005.23a yuvaṃ kaṇvāya nāsatyā ṛpiriptāya harmye |
GV01rv_hn08u:289: RV_8,005.24a tābhir ā yātam ūtibhir navyasībhiḥ suśastibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:291: RV_8,005.25a yathā cit kaṇvam āvatam priyamedham upastutam |
GV01rv_hn08u:293: RV_8,005.26a yathota kṛtvye dhane 'ṃśuṃ goṣv agastyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:295: RV_8,005.27a etāvad vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū ato vā bhūyo aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:299: RV_8,005.29a hiraṇyayī vāṃ rabhir īṣā akṣo hiraṇyayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:301: RV_8,005.30a tena no vājinīvasū parāvataś cid ā gatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:303: RV_8,005.31a ā vahethe parākāt pūrvīr aśnantāv aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:305: RV_8,005.32a ā no dyumnair ā śravobhir ā rāyā yātam aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:307: RV_8,005.33a eha vām pruṣitapsavo vayo vahantu parṇinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:309: RV_8,005.34a rathaṃ vām anugāyasaṃ ya iṣā vartate saha |
GV01rv_hn08u:313: RV_8,005.36a yuvam mṛgaṃ jāgṛvāṃsaṃ svadatho vā vṛṣaṇvasū |
GV01rv_hn08u:314: RV_8,005.36c tā naḥ pṛṅktam iṣā rayim ||
GV01rv_hn08u:315: RV_8,005.37a tā me aśvinā sanīnāṃ vidyātaṃ navānām |
GV01rv_hn08u:316: RV_8,005.37c yathā cic caidyaḥ kaśuḥ śatam uṣṭrānāṃ dadat sahasrā daśa
GV01rv_hn08u:318: RV_8,005.38a yo me hiraṇyasaṃdṛśo daśa rājño amaṃhata |
GV01rv_hn08u:319: RV_8,005.38c adhaspadā ic caidyasya kṛṣṭayaś carmamnā abhito janāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:320: RV_8,005.39a mākir enā pathā gād yeneme yanti cedayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:321: RV_8,005.39c anyo net sūrir ohate bhūridāvattaro janaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:322: RV_8,006.01a mahāṃ indro ya ojasā parjanyo vṛṣṭimāṃ iva |
GV01rv_hn08u:324: RV_8,006.02a prajām ṛtasya piprataḥ pra yad bharanta vahnayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:326: RV_8,006.03a kaṇvā indraṃ yad akrata stomair yajñasya sādhanam |
GV01rv_hn08u:328: RV_8,006.04a sam asya manyave viśo viśvā namanta kṛṣṭayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:330: RV_8,006.05a ojas tad asya titviṣa ubhe yat samavartayat |
GV01rv_hn08u:332: RV_8,006.06a vi cid vṛtrasya dodhato vajreṇa śataparvaṇā |
GV01rv_hn08u:334: RV_8,006.07a imā abhi pra ṇonumo vipām agreṣu dhītayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:336: RV_8,006.08a guhā satīr upa tmanā pra yac chocanta dhītayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:338: RV_8,006.09a pra tam indra naśīmahi rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam |
GV01rv_hn08u:340: RV_8,006.10a aham id dhi pituṣ pari medhām ṛtasya jagrabha |
GV01rv_hn08u:342: RV_8,006.11a aham pratnena manmanā giraḥ śumbhāmi kaṇvavat |
GV01rv_hn08u:344: RV_8,006.12a ye tvām indra na tuṣṭuvur ṛṣayo ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:346: RV_8,006.13a yad asya manyur adhvanīd vi vṛtram parvaśo rujan |
GV01rv_hn08u:348: RV_8,006.14a ni śuṣṇa indra dharṇasiṃ vajraṃ jaghantha dasyavi |
GV01rv_hn08u:350: RV_8,006.15a na dyāva indram ojasā nāntarikṣāṇi vajriṇam |
GV01rv_hn08u:352: RV_8,006.16a yas ta indra mahīr apa stabhūyamāna āśayat |
GV01rv_hn08u:354: RV_8,006.17a ya ime rodasī mahī samīcī samajagrabhīt |
GV01rv_hn08u:356: RV_8,006.18a ya indra yatayas tvā bhṛgavo ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:358: RV_8,006.19a imās ta indra pṛśnayo ghṛtaṃ duhata āśiram |
GV01rv_hn08u:360: RV_8,006.20a yā indra prasvas tvāsā garbham acakriran |
GV01rv_hn08u:362: RV_8,006.21a tvām ic chavasas pate kaṇvā ukthena vāvṛdhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:364: RV_8,006.22a taved indra praṇītiṣūta praśastir adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:366: RV_8,006.23a ā na indra mahīm iṣam puraṃ na darṣi gomatīm |
GV01rv_hn08u:368: RV_8,006.24a uta tyad āśvaśvyaṃ yad indra nāhuṣīṣv ā |
GV01rv_hn08u:370: RV_8,006.25a abhi vrajaṃ na tatniṣe sūra upākacakṣasam |
GV01rv_hn08u:372: RV_8,006.26a yad aṅga taviṣīyasa indra prarājasi kṣitīḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:374: RV_8,006.27a taṃ tvā haviṣmatīr viśa upa bruvata ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:376: RV_8,006.28a upahvare girīṇāṃ saṃgathe ca nadīnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:378: RV_8,006.29a ataḥ samudram udvataś cikitvāṃ ava paśyati |
GV01rv_hn08u:380: RV_8,006.30a ād it pratnasya retaso jyotiṣ paśyanti vāsaram |
GV01rv_hn08u:382: RV_8,006.31a kaṇvāsa indra te matiṃ viśve vardhanti pauṃsyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:384: RV_8,006.32a imām ma indra suṣṭutiṃ juṣasva pra su mām ava |
GV01rv_hn08u:386: RV_8,006.33a uta brahmaṇyā vayaṃ tubhyam pravṛddha vajrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:388: RV_8,006.34a abhi kaṇvā anūṣatāpo na pravatā yatīḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:390: RV_8,006.35a indram ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:392: RV_8,006.36a ā no yāhi parāvato haribhyāṃ haryatābhyām |
GV01rv_hn08u:394: RV_8,006.37a tvām id vṛtrahantama janāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:396: RV_8,006.38a anu tvā rodasī ubhe cakraṃ na varty etaśam |
GV01rv_hn08u:398: RV_8,006.39a mandasvā su svarṇara utendra śaryaṇāvati |
GV01rv_hn08u:400: RV_8,006.40a vāvṛdhāna upa dyavi vṛṣā vajry aroravīt |
GV01rv_hn08u:402: RV_8,006.41a ṛṣir hi pūrvajā asy eka īśāna ojasā |
GV01rv_hn08u:404: RV_8,006.42a asmākaṃ tvā sutāṃ upa vītapṛṣṭhā abhi prayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:406: RV_8,006.43a imāṃ su pūrvyāṃ dhiyam madhor ghṛtasya pipyuṣīm |
GV01rv_hn08u:408: RV_8,006.44a indram id vimahīnām medhe vṛṇīta martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:410: RV_8,006.45a arvāñcaṃ tvā puruṣṭuta priyamedhastutā harī |
GV01rv_hn08u:412: RV_8,006.46a śatam ahaṃ tirindire sahasram parśāv ā dade |
GV01rv_hn08u:414: RV_8,006.47a trīṇi śatāny arvatāṃ sahasrā daśa gonām |
GV01rv_hn08u:416: RV_8,006.48a ud ānaṭ kakuho divam uṣṭrāñ caturyujo dadat |
GV01rv_hn08u:418: RV_8,007.01a pra yad vas triṣṭubham iṣam maruto vipro akṣarat |
GV01rv_hn08u:420: RV_8,007.02a yad aṅga taviṣīyavo yāmaṃ śubhrā acidhvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:422: RV_8,007.03a ud īrayanta vāyubhir vāśrāsaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:424: RV_8,007.04a vapanti maruto miham pra vepayanti parvatān |
GV01rv_hn08u:426: RV_8,007.05a ni yad yāmāya vo girir ni sindhavo vidharmaṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:428: RV_8,007.06a yuṣmāṃ u naktam ūtaye yuṣmān divā havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:430: RV_8,007.07a ud u tye aruṇapsavaś citrā yāmebhir īrate |
GV01rv_hn08u:432: RV_8,007.08a sṛjanti raśmim ojasā panthāṃ sūryāya yātave |
GV01rv_hn08u:434: RV_8,007.09a imām me maruto giram imaṃ stomam ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:436: RV_8,007.10a trīṇi sarāṃsi pṛśnayo duduhre vajriṇe madhu |
GV01rv_hn08u:438: RV_8,007.11a maruto yad dha vo divaḥ sumnāyanto havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:439: RV_8,007.11c ā tū na upa gantana ||
GV01rv_hn08u:440: RV_8,007.12a yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānavo rudrā ṛbhukṣaṇo dame |
GV01rv_hn08u:442: RV_8,007.13a ā no rayim madacyutam purukṣuṃ viśvadhāyasam |
GV01rv_hn08u:444: RV_8,007.14a adhīva yad girīṇāṃ yāmaṃ śubhrā acidhvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:446: RV_8,007.15a etāvataś cid eṣāṃ sumnam bhikṣeta martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:448: RV_8,007.16a ye drapsā iva rodasī dhamanty anu vṛṣṭibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:450: RV_8,007.17a ud u svānebhir īrata ud rathair ud u vāyubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:452: RV_8,007.18a yenāva turvaśaṃ yaduṃ yena kaṇvaṃ dhanaspṛtam |
GV01rv_hn08u:454: RV_8,007.19a imā u vaḥ sudānavo ghṛtaṃ na pipyuṣīr iṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:456: RV_8,007.20a kva nūnaṃ sudānavo madathā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:458: RV_8,007.21a nahi ṣma yad dha vaḥ purā stomebhir vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:460: RV_8,007.22a sam u tye mahatīr apaḥ saṃ kṣoṇī sam u sūryam |
GV01rv_hn08u:462: RV_8,007.23a vi vṛtram parvaśo yayur vi parvatāṃ arājinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:464: RV_8,007.24a anu tritasya yudhyataḥ śuṣmam āvann uta kratum |
GV01rv_hn08u:466: RV_8,007.25a vidyuddhastā abhidyavaḥ śiprāḥ śīrṣan hiraṇyayīḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:468: RV_8,007.26a uśanā yat parāvata ukṣṇo randhram ayātana |
GV01rv_hn08u:470: RV_8,007.27a ā no makhasya dāvane 'śvair hiraṇyapāṇibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:472: RV_8,007.28a yad eṣām pṛṣatī rathe praṣṭir vahati rohitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:476: RV_8,007.30a kadā gacchātha maruta itthā vipraṃ havamānam |
GV01rv_hn08u:478: RV_8,007.31a kad dha nūnaṃ kadhapriyo yad indram ajahātana |
GV01rv_hn08u:480: RV_8,007.32a saho ṣu ṇo vajrahastaiḥ kaṇvāso agnim marudbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:482: RV_8,007.33a o ṣu vṛṣṇaḥ prayajyūn ā navyase suvitāya |
GV01rv_hn08u:484: RV_8,007.34a girayaś cin ni jihate parśānāso manyamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:488: RV_8,007.36a agnir hi jāni pūrvyaś chando na sūro arciṣā |
GV01rv_hn08u:490: RV_8,008.01a ā no viśvābhir ūtibhir aśvinā gacchataṃ yuvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:491: RV_8,008.01c dasrā hiraṇyavartanī pibataṃ somyam madhu ||
GV01rv_hn08u:492: RV_8,008.02a ā nūnaṃ yātam aśvinā rathena sūryatvacā |
GV01rv_hn08u:494: RV_8,008.03a ā yātaṃ nahuṣas pary āntarikṣāt suvṛktibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:495: RV_8,008.03c pibātho aśvinā madhu kaṇvānāṃ savane sutam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:496: RV_8,008.04a ā no yātaṃ divas pary āntarikṣād adhapriyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:497: RV_8,008.04c putraḥ kaṇvasya vām iha suṣāva somyam madhu ||
GV01rv_hn08u:498: RV_8,008.05a ā no yātam upaśruty aśvinā somapītaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:499: RV_8,008.05c svāhā stomasya vardhanā pra kavī dhītibhir narā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:500: RV_8,008.06a yac cid dhi vām pura ṛṣayo juhūre 'vase narā |
GV01rv_hn08u:501: RV_8,008.06c ā yātam aśvinā gatam upemāṃ suṣṭutim mama ||
GV01rv_hn08u:502: RV_8,008.07a divaś cid rocanād adhy ā no gantaṃ svarvidā |
GV01rv_hn08u:504: RV_8,008.08a kim anye pary āsate 'smat stomebhir aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:505: RV_8,008.08c putraḥ kaṇvasya vām ṛṣir gīrbhir vatso avīvṛdhat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:506: RV_8,008.09a ā vāṃ vipra ihāvase 'hvat stomebhir aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:507: RV_8,008.09c ariprā vṛtrahantamā tā no bhūtam mayobhuvā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:508: RV_8,008.10a ā yad vāṃ yoṣaṇā ratham atiṣṭhad vājinīvasū |
GV01rv_hn08u:509: RV_8,008.10c viśvāny aśvinā yuvam pra dhītāny agacchatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:510: RV_8,008.11a ataḥ sahasranirṇijā rathenā yātam aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:511: RV_8,008.11c vatso vām madhumad vaco 'śaṃsīt kāvyaḥ kaviḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:513: RV_8,008.12c stomam me aśvināv imam abhi vahnī anūṣātām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:514: RV_8,008.13a ā no viśvāny aśvinā dhattaṃ rādhāṃsy ahrayā |
GV01rv_hn08u:515: RV_8,008.13c kṛtaṃ na ṛtviyāvato mā no rīradhataṃ nide ||
GV01rv_hn08u:516: RV_8,008.14a yan nāsatyā parāvati yad vā stho adhy ambare |
GV01rv_hn08u:517: RV_8,008.14c ataḥ sahasranirṇijā rathenā yātam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:518: RV_8,008.15a yo vāṃ nāsatyāv ṛṣir gīrbhir vatso avīvṛdhat |
GV01rv_hn08u:519: RV_8,008.15c tasmai sahasranirṇijam iṣaṃ dhattaṃ ghṛtaścutam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:520: RV_8,008.16a prāsmā ūrjaṃ ghṛtaścutam aśvinā yacchataṃ yuvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:521: RV_8,008.16c yo vāṃ sumnāya tuṣṭavad vasūyād dānunas patī ||
GV01rv_hn08u:522: RV_8,008.17a ā no gantaṃ riśādasemaṃ stomam purubhujā |
GV01rv_hn08u:523: RV_8,008.17c kṛtaṃ naḥ suśriyo naremā dātam abhiṣṭaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:524: RV_8,008.18a ā vāṃ viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ priyamedhā ahūṣata |
GV01rv_hn08u:526: RV_8,008.19a ā no gantam mayobhuvāśvinā śambhuvā yuvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:527: RV_8,008.19c yo vāṃ vipanyū dhītibhir gīrbhir vatso avīvṛdhat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:528: RV_8,008.20a yābhiḥ kaṇvam medhātithiṃ yābhir vaśaṃ daśavrajam |
GV01rv_hn08u:529: RV_8,008.20c yābhir gośaryam āvataṃ tābhir no 'vataṃ narā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:530: RV_8,008.21a yābhir narā trasadasyum āvataṃ kṛtvye dhane |
GV01rv_hn08u:531: RV_8,008.21c tābhiḥ ṣv asmāṃ aśvinā prāvataṃ vājasātaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:532: RV_8,008.22a pra vāṃ stomāḥ suvṛktayo giro vardhantv aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:533: RV_8,008.22c purutrā vṛtrahantamā tā no bhūtam puruspṛhā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:534: RV_8,008.23a trīṇi padāny aśvinor āviḥ sānti guhā paraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:535: RV_8,008.23c kavī ṛtasya patmabhir arvāg jīvebhyas pari ||
GV01rv_hn08u:536: RV_8,009.01a ā nūnam aśvinā yuvaṃ vatsasya gantam avase |
GV01rv_hn08u:537: RV_8,009.01c prāsmai yacchatam avṛkam pṛthu cchardir yuyutaṃ yā arātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:538: RV_8,009.02a yad antarikṣe yad divi yat pañca mānuṣāṃ anu |
GV01rv_hn08u:540: RV_8,009.03a ye vāṃ daṃsāṃsy aśvinā viprāsaḥ parimāmṛśuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:542: RV_8,009.04a ayaṃ vāṃ gharmo aśvinā stomena pari ṣicyate |
GV01rv_hn08u:543: RV_8,009.04c ayaṃ somo madhumān vājinīvasū yena vṛtraṃ ciketathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:544: RV_8,009.05a yad apsu yad vanaspatau yad oṣadhīṣu purudaṃsasā kṛtam |
GV01rv_hn08u:546: RV_8,009.06a yan nāsatyā bhuraṇyatho yad vā deva bhiṣajyathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:547: RV_8,009.06c ayaṃ vāṃ vatso matibhir na vindhate haviṣmantaṃ hi gacchathaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:548: RV_8,009.07a ā nūnam aśvinor ṛṣi stomaṃ ciketa vāmayā |
GV01rv_hn08u:549: RV_8,009.07c ā somam madhumattamaṃ gharmaṃ siñcād atharvaṇi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:550: RV_8,009.08a ā nūnaṃ raghuvartaniṃ rathaṃ tiṣṭhātho aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:551: RV_8,009.08c ā vāṃ stomā ime mama nabho na cucyavīrata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:552: RV_8,009.09a yad adya vāṃ nāsatyokthair ācucyuvīmahi |
GV01rv_hn08u:553: RV_8,009.09c yad vā vāṇībhir aśvinevet kāṇvasya bodhatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:554: RV_8,009.10a yad vāṃ kakṣīvāṃ uta yad vyaśva ṛṣir yad vāṃ dīrghatamā juhāva |
GV01rv_hn08u:555: RV_8,009.10c pṛthī yad vāṃ vainyaḥ sādaneṣv eved ato aśvinā cetayethām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:556: RV_8,009.11a yātaṃ chardiṣpā uta naḥ paraspā bhūtaṃ jagatpā uta nas tanūpā
GV01rv_hn08u:558: RV_8,009.12a yad indreṇa sarathaṃ yātho aśvinā yad vā vāyunā bhavathaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:560: RV_8,009.12c yad ādityebhir ṛbhubhiḥ sajoṣasā yad vā viṣṇor vikramaṇeṣu tiṣṭhathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:561: RV_8,009.13a yad adyāśvināv ahaṃ huveya vājasātaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:562: RV_8,009.13c yat pṛtsu turvaṇe sahas tac chreṣṭham aśvinor avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:563: RV_8,009.14a ā nūnaṃ yātam aśvinemā havyāni vāṃ hitā |
GV01rv_hn08u:564: RV_8,009.14c ime somāso adhi turvaśe yadāv ime kaṇveṣu vām atha ||
GV01rv_hn08u:565: RV_8,009.15a yan nāsatyā parāke arvāke asti bheṣajam |
GV01rv_hn08u:566: RV_8,009.15c tena nūnaṃ vimadāya pracetasā chardir vatsāya yacchatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:567: RV_8,009.16a abhutsy u pra devyā sākaṃ vācāham aśvinoḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:568: RV_8,009.16c vy āvar devy ā matiṃ vi rātim martyebhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:569: RV_8,009.17a pra bodhayoṣo aśvinā pra devi sūnṛte mahi |
GV01rv_hn08u:570: RV_8,009.17c pra yajñahotar ānuṣak pra madāya śravo bṛhat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:571: RV_8,009.18a yad uṣo yāsi bhānunā saṃ sūryeṇa rocase |
GV01rv_hn08u:572: RV_8,009.18c ā hāyam aśvino ratho vartir yāti nṛpāyyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:573: RV_8,009.19a yad āpītāso aṃśavo gāvo na duhra ūdhabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:574: RV_8,009.19c yad vā vāṇīr anūṣata pra devayanto aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:575: RV_8,009.20a pra dyumnāya pra śavase pra nṛṣāhyāya śarmaṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:577: RV_8,009.21a yan nūnaṃ dhībhir aśvinā pitur yonā niṣīdathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:579: RV_8,010.01a yat stho dīrghaprasadmani yad vādo rocane divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:580: RV_8,010.01c yad vā samudre adhy ākṛte gṛhe 'ta ā yātam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:581: RV_8,010.02a yad vā yajñam manave sammimikṣathur evet kāṇvasya bodhatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:582: RV_8,010.02c bṛhaspatiṃ viśvān devāṃ ahaṃ huva indrāviṣṇū aśvināv āśuheṣasā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:583: RV_8,010.03a tyā nv aśvinā huve sudaṃsasā gṛbhe kṛtā |
GV01rv_hn08u:584: RV_8,010.03c yayor asti pra ṇaḥ sakhyaṃ deveṣv adhy āpyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:585: RV_8,010.04a yayor adhi pra yajñā asūre santi sūrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:586: RV_8,010.04c tā yajñasyādhvarasya pracetasā svadhābhir yā pibataḥ somyam madhu ||
GV01rv_hn08u:587: RV_8,010.05a yad adyāśvināv apāg yat prāk stho vājinīvasū |
GV01rv_hn08u:588: RV_8,010.05c yad druhyavy anavi turvaśe yadau huve vām atha mā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:589: RV_8,010.06a yad antarikṣe patathaḥ purubhujā yad veme rodasī anu |
GV01rv_hn08u:590: RV_8,010.06c yad vā svadhābhir adhitiṣṭhatho ratham ata ā yātam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:591: RV_8,011.01a tvam agne vratapā asi deva ā martyeṣv ā |
GV01rv_hn08u:593: RV_8,011.02a tvam asi praśasyo vidatheṣu sahantya |
GV01rv_hn08u:595: RV_8,011.03a sa tvam asmad apa dviṣo yuyodhi jātavedaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:597: RV_8,011.04a anti cit santam aha yajñam martasya ripoḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:599: RV_8,011.05a martā amartyasya te bhūri nāma manāmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:601: RV_8,011.06a vipraṃ viprāso 'vase devam martāsa ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:603: RV_8,011.07a ā te vatso mano yamat paramāc cit sadhasthāt |
GV01rv_hn08u:605: RV_8,011.08a purutrā hi sadṛṅṅ asi viśo viśvā anu prabhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:607: RV_8,011.09a samatsv agnim avase vājayanto havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:609: RV_8,011.10a pratno hi kam īḍyo adhvareṣu sanāc ca hotā navyaś ca satsi |
GV01rv_hn08u:610: RV_8,011.10c svāṃ cāgne tanvam piprayasvāsmabhyaṃ ca saubhagam ā yajasva ||
GV01rv_hn08u:611: RV_8,012.01a ya indra somapātamo madaḥ śaviṣṭha cetati |
GV01rv_hn08u:612: RV_8,012.01c yenā haṃsi ny atriṇaṃ tam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:613: RV_8,012.02a yenā daśagvam adhriguṃ vepayantaṃ svarṇaram |
GV01rv_hn08u:614: RV_8,012.02c yenā samudram āvithā tam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:615: RV_8,012.03a yena sindhum mahīr apo rathāṃ iva pracodayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:616: RV_8,012.03c panthām ṛtasya yātave tam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:617: RV_8,012.04a imaṃ stomam abhiṣṭaye ghṛtaṃ na pūtam adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:618: RV_8,012.04c yenā nu sadya ojasā vavakṣitha ||
GV01rv_hn08u:619: RV_8,012.05a imaṃ juṣasva girvaṇaḥ samudra iva pinvate |
GV01rv_hn08u:621: RV_8,012.06a yo no devaḥ parāvataḥ sakhitvanāya māmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:622: RV_8,012.06c divo na vṛṣṭim prathayan vavakṣitha ||
GV01rv_hn08u:623: RV_8,012.07a vavakṣur asya ketavo uta vajro gabhastyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:624: RV_8,012.07c yat sūryo na rodasī avardhayat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:625: RV_8,012.08a yadi pravṛddha satpate sahasram mahiṣāṃ aghaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:626: RV_8,012.08c ād it ta indriyam mahi pra vāvṛdhe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:627: RV_8,012.09a indraḥ sūryasya raśmibhir ny arśasānam oṣati |
GV01rv_hn08u:628: RV_8,012.09c agnir vaneva sāsahiḥ pra vāvṛdhe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:629: RV_8,012.10a iyaṃ ta ṛtviyāvatī dhītir eti navīyasī |
GV01rv_hn08u:631: RV_8,012.11a garbho yajñasya devayuḥ kratum punīta ānuṣak |
GV01rv_hn08u:632: RV_8,012.11c stomair indrasya vāvṛdhe mimīta it ||
GV01rv_hn08u:633: RV_8,012.12a sanir mitrasya papratha indraḥ somasya pītaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:634: RV_8,012.12c prācī vāśīva sunvate mimīta it ||
GV01rv_hn08u:636: RV_8,012.13c ghṛtaṃ na pipya āsany ṛtasya yat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:637: RV_8,012.14a uta svarāje aditi stomam indrāya jījanat |
GV01rv_hn08u:640: RV_8,012.15c na deva vivratā harī ṛtasya yat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:641: RV_8,012.16a yat somam indra viṣṇavi yad vā gha trita āptye |
GV01rv_hn08u:642: RV_8,012.16c yad vā marutsu mandase sam indubhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:643: RV_8,012.17a yad vā śakra parāvati samudre adhi mandase |
GV01rv_hn08u:644: RV_8,012.17c asmākam it sute raṇā sam indubhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:645: RV_8,012.18a yad vāsi sunvato vṛdho yajamānasya satpate |
GV01rv_hn08u:646: RV_8,012.18c ukthe vā yasya raṇyasi sam indubhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:648: RV_8,012.19c adhā yajñāya turvaṇe vy ānaśuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:650: RV_8,012.20c hotrābhir indraṃ vāvṛdhur vy ānaśuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:651: RV_8,012.21a mahīr asya praṇītayaḥ pūrvīr uta praśastayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:652: RV_8,012.21c viśvā vasūni dāśuṣe vy ānaśuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:653: RV_8,012.22a indraṃ vṛtrāya hantave devāso dadhire puraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:654: RV_8,012.22c indraṃ vāṇīr anūṣatā sam ojase ||
GV01rv_hn08u:655: RV_8,012.23a mahāntam mahinā vayaṃ stomebhir havanaśrutam |
GV01rv_hn08u:656: RV_8,012.23c arkair abhi pra ṇonumaḥ sam ojase ||
GV01rv_hn08u:657: RV_8,012.24a na yaṃ vivikto rodasī nāntarikṣāṇi vajriṇam |
GV01rv_hn08u:658: RV_8,012.24c amād id asya titviṣe sam ojasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:659: RV_8,012.25a yad indra pṛtanājye devās tvā dadhire puraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:660: RV_8,012.25c ād it te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:661: RV_8,012.26a yadā vṛtraṃ nadīvṛtaṃ śavasā vajrinn avadhīḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:662: RV_8,012.26c ād it te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:663: RV_8,012.27a yadā te viṣṇur ojasā trīṇi padā vicakrame |
GV01rv_hn08u:664: RV_8,012.27c ād it te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:665: RV_8,012.28a yadā te haryatā harī vāvṛdhāte dive-dive |
GV01rv_hn08u:666: RV_8,012.28c ād it te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire ||
GV01rv_hn08u:667: RV_8,012.29a yadā te mārutīr viśas tubhyam indra niyemire |
GV01rv_hn08u:668: RV_8,012.29c ād it te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire ||
GV01rv_hn08u:669: RV_8,012.30a yadā sūryam amuṃ divi śukraṃ jyotir adhārayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:670: RV_8,012.30c ād it te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire ||
GV01rv_hn08u:671: RV_8,012.31a imāṃ ta indra suṣṭutiṃ vipra iyarti dhītibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:673: RV_8,012.32a yad asya dhāmani priye samīcīnāso asvaran |
GV01rv_hn08u:675: RV_8,012.33a suvīryaṃ svaśvyaṃ sugavyam indra daddhi naḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:677: RV_8,013.01a indraḥ suteṣu someṣu kratum punīta ukthyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:678: RV_8,013.01c vide vṛdhasya dakṣaso mahān hi ṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:679: RV_8,013.02a sa prathame vyomani devānāṃ sadane vṛdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:681: RV_8,013.03a tam ahve vājasātaya indram bharāya śuṣmiṇam |
GV01rv_hn08u:682: RV_8,013.03c bhavā naḥ sumne antamaḥ sakhā vṛdhe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:683: RV_8,013.04a iyaṃ ta indra girvaṇo rātiḥ kṣarati sunvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:684: RV_8,013.04c mandāno asya barhiṣo vi rājasi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:685: RV_8,013.05a nūnaṃ tad indra daddhi no yat tvā sunvanta īmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:686: RV_8,013.05c rayiṃ naś citram ā bharā svarvidam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:687: RV_8,013.06a stotā yat te vicarṣaṇir atipraśardhayad giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:688: RV_8,013.06c vayā ivānu rohate juṣanta yat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:689: RV_8,013.07a pratnavaj janayā giraḥ śṛṇudhī jaritur havam |
GV01rv_hn08u:691: RV_8,013.08a krīḷanty asya sūnṛtā āpo na pravatā yatīḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:692: RV_8,013.08c ayā dhiyā ya ucyate patir divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:693: RV_8,013.09a uto patir ya ucyate kṛṣṭīnām eka id vaśī |
GV01rv_hn08u:695: RV_8,013.10a stuhi śrutaṃ vipaścitaṃ harī yasya prasakṣiṇā |
GV01rv_hn08u:698: RV_8,013.11c ā yāhi yajñam āśubhiḥ śam id dhi te ||
GV01rv_hn08u:699: RV_8,013.12a indra śaviṣṭha satpate rayiṃ gṛṇatsu dhāraya |
GV01rv_hn08u:701: RV_8,013.13a have tvā sūra udite have madhyandine divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:702: RV_8,013.13c juṣāṇa indra saptibhir na ā gahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:703: RV_8,013.14a ā tū gahi pra tu drava matsvā sutasya gomataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:704: RV_8,013.14c tantuṃ tanuṣva pūrvyaṃ yathā vide ||
GV01rv_hn08u:705: RV_8,013.15a yac chakrāsi parāvati yad arvāvati vṛtrahan |
GV01rv_hn08u:706: RV_8,013.15c yad vā samudre andhaso 'vited asi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:707: RV_8,013.16a indraṃ vardhantu no gira indraṃ sutāsa indavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:709: RV_8,013.17a tam id viprā avasyavaḥ pravatvatībhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:710: RV_8,013.17c indraṃ kṣoṇīr avardhayan vayā iva ||
GV01rv_hn08u:711: RV_8,013.18a trikadrukeṣu cetanaṃ devāso yajñam atnata |
GV01rv_hn08u:712: RV_8,013.18c tam id vardhantu no giraḥ sadāvṛdham ||
GV01rv_hn08u:713: RV_8,013.19a stotā yat te anuvrata ukthāny ṛtuthā dadhe |
GV01rv_hn08u:714: RV_8,013.19c śuciḥ pāvaka ucyate so adbhutaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:715: RV_8,013.20a tad id rudrasya cetati yahvam pratneṣu dhāmasu |
GV01rv_hn08u:716: RV_8,013.20c mano yatrā vi tad dadhur vicetasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:717: RV_8,013.21a yadi me sakhyam āvara imasya pāhy andhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:718: RV_8,013.21c yena viśvā ati dviṣo atārima ||
GV01rv_hn08u:719: RV_8,013.22a kadā ta indra girvaṇa stotā bhavāti śantamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:720: RV_8,013.22c kadā no gavye aśvye vasau dadhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:721: RV_8,013.23a uta te suṣṭutā harī vṛṣaṇā vahato ratham |
GV01rv_hn08u:723: RV_8,013.24a tam īmahe puruṣṭutaṃ yahvam pratnābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:724: RV_8,013.24c ni barhiṣi priye sadad adha dvitā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:725: RV_8,013.25a vardhasvā su puruṣṭuta ṛṣiṣṭutābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:726: RV_8,013.25c dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam avā ca naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:727: RV_8,013.26a indra tvam avited asītthā stuvato adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:728: RV_8,013.26c ṛtād iyarmi te dhiyam manoyujam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:729: RV_8,013.27a iha tyā sadhamādyā yujānaḥ somapītaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:730: RV_8,013.27c harī indra pratadvasū abhi svara ||
GV01rv_hn08u:731: RV_8,013.28a abhi svarantu ye tava rudrāsaḥ sakṣata śriyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:732: RV_8,013.28c uto marutvatīr viśo abhi prayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:733: RV_8,013.29a imā asya pratūrtayaḥ padaṃ juṣanta yad divi |
GV01rv_hn08u:734: RV_8,013.29c nābhā yajñasya saṃ dadhur yathā vide ||
GV01rv_hn08u:735: RV_8,013.30a ayaṃ dīrghāya cakṣase prāci prayaty adhvare |
GV01rv_hn08u:737: RV_8,013.31a vṛṣāyam indra te ratha uto te vṛṣaṇā harī |
GV01rv_hn08u:738: RV_8,013.31c vṛṣā tvaṃ śatakrato vṛṣā havaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:739: RV_8,013.32a vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā mado vṛṣā somo ayaṃ sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:740: RV_8,013.32c vṛṣā yajño yam invasi vṛṣā havaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:741: RV_8,013.33a vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇaṃ huve vajriñ citrābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:742: RV_8,013.33c vāvantha hi pratiṣṭutiṃ vṛṣā havaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:743: RV_8,014.01a yad indrāhaṃ yathā tvam īśīya vasva eka it |
GV01rv_hn08u:745: RV_8,014.02a śikṣeyam asmai ditseyaṃ śacīpate manīṣiṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:747: RV_8,014.03a dhenuṣ ṭa indra sūnṛtā yajamānāya sunvate |
GV01rv_hn08u:749: RV_8,014.04a na te vartāsti rādhasa indra devo na martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:751: RV_8,014.05a yajña indram avardhayad yad bhūmiṃ vy avartayat |
GV01rv_hn08u:753: RV_8,014.06a vāvṛdhānasya te vayaṃ viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:755: RV_8,014.07a vy antarikṣam atiran made somasya rocanā |
GV01rv_hn08u:757: RV_8,014.08a ud gā ājad aṅgirobhya āviṣ kṛṇvan guhā satīḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:759: RV_8,014.09a indreṇa rocanā divo dṛḷhāni dṛṃhitāni ca |
GV01rv_hn08u:761: RV_8,014.10a apām ūrmir madann iva stoma indrājirāyate |
GV01rv_hn08u:763: RV_8,014.11a tvaṃ hi stomavardhana indrāsy ukthavardhanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:765: RV_8,014.12a indram it keśinā harī somapeyāya vakṣataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:767: RV_8,014.13a apām phenena namuceḥ śira indrod avartayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:769: RV_8,014.14a māyābhir utsisṛpsata indra dyām ārurukṣataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:771: RV_8,014.15a asunvām indra saṃsadaṃ viṣūcīṃ vy anāśayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:773: RV_8,015.01a tam v abhi pra gāyata puruhūtam puruṣṭutam |
GV01rv_hn08u:774: RV_8,015.01c indraṃ gīrbhis taviṣam ā vivāsata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:775: RV_8,015.02a yasya dvibarhaso bṛhat saho dādhāra rodasī |
GV01rv_hn08u:776: RV_8,015.02c girīṃr ajrāṃ apaḥ svar vṛṣatvanā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:777: RV_8,015.03a sa rājasi puruṣṭutaṃ eko vṛtrāṇi jighnase |
GV01rv_hn08u:778: RV_8,015.03c indra jaitrā śravasyā ca yantave ||
GV01rv_hn08u:779: RV_8,015.04a taṃ te madaṃ gṛṇīmasi vṛṣaṇam pṛtsu sāsahim |
GV01rv_hn08u:781: RV_8,015.05a yena jyotīṃṣy āyave manave ca viveditha |
GV01rv_hn08u:782: RV_8,015.05c mandāno asya barhiṣo vi rājasi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:783: RV_8,015.06a tad adyā cit ta ukthino 'nu ṣṭuvanti pūrvathā |
GV01rv_hn08u:785: RV_8,015.07a tava tyad indriyam bṛhat tava śuṣmam uta kratum |
GV01rv_hn08u:787: RV_8,015.08a tava dyaur indra pauṃsyam pṛthivī vardhati śravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:788: RV_8,015.08c tvām āpaḥ parvatāsaś ca hinvire ||
GV01rv_hn08u:789: RV_8,015.09a tvāṃ viṣṇur bṛhan kṣayo mitro gṛṇāti varuṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:790: RV_8,015.09c tvāṃ śardho madaty anu mārutam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:791: RV_8,015.10a tvaṃ vṛṣā janānām maṃhiṣṭha indra jajñiṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:793: RV_8,015.11a satrā tvam puruṣṭutaṃ eko vṛtrāṇi tośase |
GV01rv_hn08u:794: RV_8,015.11c nānya indrāt karaṇam bhūya invati ||
GV01rv_hn08u:795: RV_8,015.12a yad indra manmaśas tvā nānā havanta ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:796: RV_8,015.12c asmākebhir nṛbhir atrā svar jaya ||
GV01rv_hn08u:797: RV_8,015.13a araṃ kṣayāya no mahe viśvā rūpāṇy āviśan |
GV01rv_hn08u:799: RV_8,016.01a pra samrājaṃ carṣaṇīnām indraṃ stotā navyaṃ gīrbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:801: RV_8,016.02a yasminn ukthāni raṇyanti viśvāni ca śravasyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:803: RV_8,016.03a taṃ suṣṭutyā vivāse jyeṣṭharājam bhare kṛtnum |
GV01rv_hn08u:805: RV_8,016.04a yasyānūnā gabhīrā madā uravas tarutrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:807: RV_8,016.05a tam id dhaneṣu hiteṣv adhivākāya havante |
GV01rv_hn08u:809: RV_8,016.06a tam ic cyautnair āryanti taṃ kṛtebhiś carṣaṇayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:811: RV_8,016.07a indro brahmendra ṛṣir indraḥ purū puruhūtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:813: RV_8,016.08a sa stomyaḥ sa havyaḥ satyaḥ satvā tuvikūrmiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:815: RV_8,016.09a tam arkebhis taṃ sāmabhis taṃ gāyatraiś carṣaṇayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:817: RV_8,016.10a praṇetāraṃ vasyo acchā kartāraṃ jyotiḥ samatsu |
GV01rv_hn08u:819: RV_8,016.11a sa naḥ papriḥ pārayāti svasti nāvā puruhūtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:821: RV_8,016.12a sa tvaṃ na indra vājebhir daśasyā ca gātuyā ca |
GV01rv_hn08u:822: RV_8,016.12c acchā ca naḥ sumnaṃ neṣi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:823: RV_8,017.01a ā yāhi suṣumā hi ta indra somam pibā imam |
GV01rv_hn08u:825: RV_8,017.02a ā tvā brahmayujā harī vahatām indra keśinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:827: RV_8,017.03a brahmāṇas tvā vayaṃ yujā somapām indra sominaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:829: RV_8,017.04a ā no yāhi sutāvato 'smākaṃ suṣṭutīr upa |
GV01rv_hn08u:831: RV_8,017.05a ā te siñcāmi kukṣyor anu gātrā vi dhāvatu |
GV01rv_hn08u:833: RV_8,017.06a svāduṣ ṭe astu saṃsude madhumān tanve tava |
GV01rv_hn08u:834: RV_8,017.06c somaḥ śam astu te hṛde ||
GV01rv_hn08u:835: RV_8,017.07a ayam u tvā vicarṣaṇe janīr ivābhi saṃvṛtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:837: RV_8,017.08a tuvigrīvo vapodaraḥ subāhur andhaso made |
GV01rv_hn08u:839: RV_8,017.09a indra prehi puras tvaṃ viśvasyeśāna ojasā |
GV01rv_hn08u:841: RV_8,017.10a dīrghas te astv aṅkuśo yenā vasu prayacchasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:843: RV_8,017.11a ayaṃ ta indra somo nipūto adhi barhiṣi |
GV01rv_hn08u:845: RV_8,017.12a śācigo śācipūjanāyaṃ raṇāya te sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:847: RV_8,017.13a yas te śṛṅgavṛṣo napāt praṇapāt kuṇḍapāyyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:848: RV_8,017.13c ny asmin dadhra ā manaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:849: RV_8,017.14a vāstoṣ pate dhruvā sthūṇāṃsatraṃ somyānām |
GV01rv_hn08u:850: RV_8,017.14c drapso bhettā purāṃ śaśvatīnām indro munīnāṃ sakhā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:851: RV_8,017.15a pṛdākusānur yajato gaveṣaṇa ekaḥ sann abhi bhūyasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:852: RV_8,017.15c bhūrṇim aśvaṃ nayat tujā puro gṛbhendraṃ somasya pītaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:853: RV_8,018.01a idaṃ ha nūnam eṣāṃ sumnam bhikṣeta martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:855: RV_8,018.02a anarvāṇo hy eṣām panthā ādityānām |
GV01rv_hn08u:857: RV_8,018.03a tat su naḥ savitā bhago varuṇo mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn08u:858: RV_8,018.03c śarma yacchantu sapratho yad īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:859: RV_8,018.04a devebhir devy adite 'riṣṭabharmann ā gahi |
GV01rv_hn08u:861: RV_8,018.05a te hi putrāso aditer vidur dveṣāṃsi yotave |
GV01rv_hn08u:863: RV_8,018.06a aditir no divā paśum aditir naktam advayāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:865: RV_8,018.07a uta syā no divā matir aditir ūtyā gamat |
GV01rv_hn08u:866: RV_8,018.07c sā śantāti mayas karad apa sridhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:867: RV_8,018.08a uta tyā daivyā bhiṣajā śaṃ naḥ karato aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:868: RV_8,018.08c yuyuyātām ito rapo apa sridhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:869: RV_8,018.09a śam agnir agnibhiḥ karac chaṃ nas tapatu sūryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:870: RV_8,018.09c śaṃ vāto vātv arapā apa sridhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:871: RV_8,018.10a apāmīvām apa sridham apa sedhata durmatim |
GV01rv_hn08u:873: RV_8,018.11a yuyotā śarum asmad āṃ ādityāsa utāmatim |
GV01rv_hn08u:875: RV_8,018.12a tat su naḥ śarma yacchatādityā yan mumocati |
GV01rv_hn08u:877: RV_8,018.13a yo naḥ kaś cid ririkṣati rakṣastvena martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:878: RV_8,018.13c svaiḥ ṣa evai ririṣīṣṭa yur janaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:879: RV_8,018.14a sam it tam agham aśnavad duḥśaṃsam martyaṃ ripum |
GV01rv_hn08u:880: RV_8,018.14c yo asmatrā durhaṇāvāṃ upa dvayuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:881: RV_8,018.15a pākatrā sthana devā hṛtsu jānītha martyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:882: RV_8,018.15c upa dvayuṃ cādvayuṃ ca vasavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:883: RV_8,018.16a ā śarma parvatānām otāpāṃ vṛṇīmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:885: RV_8,018.17a te no bhadreṇa śarmaṇā yuṣmākaṃ nāvā vasavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:887: RV_8,018.18a tuce tanāya tat su no drāghīya āyur jīvase |
GV01rv_hn08u:889: RV_8,018.19a yajño hīḷo vo antara ādityā asti mṛḷata |
GV01rv_hn08u:890: RV_8,018.19c yuṣme id vo api ṣmasi sajātye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:891: RV_8,018.20a bṛhad varūtham marutāṃ devaṃ trātāram aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:893: RV_8,018.21a aneho mitrāryaman nṛvad varuṇa śaṃsyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:894: RV_8,018.21c trivarūtham maruto yanta naś chardiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:895: RV_8,018.22a ye cid dhi mṛtyubandhava ādityā manavaḥ smasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:896: RV_8,018.22c pra sū na āyur jīvase tiretana ||
GV01rv_hn08u:897: RV_8,019.01a taṃ gūrdhayā svarṇaraṃ devāso devam aratiṃ dadhanvire |
GV01rv_hn08u:899: RV_8,019.02a vibhūtarātiṃ vipra citraśociṣam agnim īḷiṣva yanturam |
GV01rv_hn08u:900: RV_8,019.02c asya medhasya somyasya sobhare prem adhvarāya pūrvyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:901: RV_8,019.03a yajiṣṭhaṃ tvā vavṛmahe devaṃ devatrā hotāram amartyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:903: RV_8,019.04a ūrjo napātaṃ subhagaṃ sudīditim agniṃ śreṣṭhaśociṣam |
GV01rv_hn08u:904: RV_8,019.04c sa no mitrasya varuṇasya so apām ā sumnaṃ yakṣate divi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:905: RV_8,019.05a yaḥ samidhā ya āhutī yo vedena dadāśa marto agnaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:907: RV_8,019.06a tasyed arvanto raṃhayanta āśavas tasya dyumnitamaṃ yaśaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:908: RV_8,019.06c na tam aṃho devakṛtaṃ kutaś cana na martyakṛtaṃ naśat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:909: RV_8,019.07a svagnayo vo agnibhiḥ syāma sūno sahasa ūrjām pate |
GV01rv_hn08u:911: RV_8,019.08a praśaṃsamāno atithir na mitriyo 'gnī ratho na vedyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:912: RV_8,019.08c tve kṣemāso api santi sādhavas tvaṃ rājā rayīṇām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:913: RV_8,019.09a so addhā dāśvadhvaro 'gne martaḥ subhaga sa praśaṃsyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:915: RV_8,019.10a yasya tvam ūrdhvo adhvarāya tiṣṭhasi kṣayadvīraḥ sa sādhate |
GV01rv_hn08u:916: RV_8,019.10c so arvadbhiḥ sanitā sa vipanyubhiḥ sa śūraiḥ sanitā kṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:917: RV_8,019.11a yasyāgnir vapur gṛhe stomaṃ cano dadhīta viśvavāryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:919: RV_8,019.12a viprasya vā stuvataḥ sahaso yaho makṣūtamasya rātiṣu |
GV01rv_hn08u:920: RV_8,019.12c avodevam uparimartyaṃ kṛdhi vaso vividuṣo vacaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:921: RV_8,019.13a yo agniṃ havyadātibhir namobhir vā sudakṣam āvivāsati |
GV01rv_hn08u:923: RV_8,019.14a samidhā yo niśitī dāśad aditiṃ dhāmabhir asya martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:924: RV_8,019.14c viśvet sa dhībhiḥ subhago janāṃ ati dyumnair udna iva tāriṣat
GV01rv_hn08u:925: RV_8,019.15a tad agne dyumnam ā bhara yat sāsahat sadane kaṃ cid atriṇam |
GV01rv_hn08u:927: RV_8,019.16a yena caṣṭe varuṇo mitro aryamā yena nāsatyā bhagaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:928: RV_8,019.16c vayaṃ tat te śavasā gātuvittamā indratvotā vidhemahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:929: RV_8,019.17a te ghed agne svādhyo ye tvā vipra nidadhire nṛcakṣasam |
GV01rv_hn08u:931: RV_8,019.18a ta id vediṃ subhaga ta āhutiṃ te sotuṃ cakrire divi |
GV01rv_hn08u:932: RV_8,019.18c ta id vājebhir jigyur mahad dhanaṃ ye tve kāmaṃ nyerire ||
GV01rv_hn08u:933: RV_8,019.19a bhadro no agnir āhuto bhadrā rātiḥ subhaga bhadro adhvaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:935: RV_8,019.20a bhadram manaḥ kṛṇuṣva vṛtratūrye yenā samatsu sāsahaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:936: RV_8,019.20c ava sthirā tanuhi bhūri śardhatāṃ vanemā te abhiṣṭibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:937: RV_8,019.21a īḷe girā manurhitaṃ yaṃ devā dūtam aratiṃ nyerire |
GV01rv_hn08u:939: RV_8,019.22a tigmajambhāya taruṇāya rājate prayo gāyasy agnaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:940: RV_8,019.22c yaḥ piṃśate sūnṛtābhiḥ suvīryam agnir ghṛtebhir āhutaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:941: RV_8,019.23a yadī ghṛtebhir āhuto vāśīm agnir bharata uc cāva ca |
GV01rv_hn08u:943: RV_8,019.24a yo havyāny airayatā manurhito deva āsā sugandhinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:944: RV_8,019.24c vivāsate vāryāṇi svadhvaro hotā devo amartyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:945: RV_8,019.25a yad agne martyas tvaṃ syām aham mitramaho amartyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:947: RV_8,019.26a na tvā rāsīyābhiśastaye vaso na pāpatvāya santya |
GV01rv_hn08u:948: RV_8,019.26c na me stotāmatīvā na durhitaḥ syād agne na pāpayā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:949: RV_8,019.27a pitur na putraḥ subhṛto duroṇa ā devāṃ etu pra ṇo haviḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:950: RV_8,019.28a tavāham agna ūtibhir nediṣṭhābhiḥ saceya joṣam ā vaso |
GV01rv_hn08u:952: RV_8,019.29a tava kratvā saneyaṃ tava rātibhir agne tava praśastibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:953: RV_8,019.29c tvām id āhuḥ pramatiṃ vaso mamāgne harṣasva dātave ||
GV01rv_hn08u:954: RV_8,019.30a pra so agne tavotibhiḥ suvīrābhis tirate vājabharmabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:956: RV_8,019.31a tava drapso nīlavān vāśa ṛtviya indhānaḥ siṣṇav ā dade |
GV01rv_hn08u:957: RV_8,019.31c tvam mahīnām uṣasām asi priyaḥ kṣapo vastuṣu rājasi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:958: RV_8,019.32a tam āganma sobharayaḥ sahasramuṣkaṃ svabhiṣṭim avase |
GV01rv_hn08u:960: RV_8,019.33a yasya te agne anye agnaya upakṣito vayā iva |
GV01rv_hn08u:961: RV_8,019.33c vipo na dyumnā ni yuve janānāṃ tava kṣatrāṇi vardhayan ||
GV01rv_hn08u:962: RV_8,019.34a yam ādityāso adruhaḥ pāraṃ nayatha martyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:964: RV_8,019.35a yūyaṃ rājānaḥ kaṃ cic carṣaṇīsahaḥ kṣayantam mānuṣāṃ anu |
GV01rv_hn08u:965: RV_8,019.35c vayaṃ te vo varuṇa mitrāryaman syāmed ṛtasya rathyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:966: RV_8,019.36a adān me paurukutsyaḥ pañcāśataṃ trasadasyur vadhūnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:968: RV_8,019.37a uta me prayiyor vayiyoḥ suvāstvā adhi tugvani |
GV01rv_hn08u:969: RV_8,019.37c tisṝṇāṃ saptatīnāṃ śyāvaḥ praṇetā bhuvad vasur diyānām patiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:970: RV_8,020.01a ā gantā mā riṣaṇyata prasthāvāno māpa sthātā samanyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:972: RV_8,020.02a vīḷupavibhir maruta ṛbhukṣaṇa ā rudrāsaḥ sudītibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:973: RV_8,020.02c iṣā no adyā gatā puruspṛho yajñam ā sobharīyavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:974: RV_8,020.03a vidmā hi rudriyāṇāṃ śuṣmam ugram marutāṃ śimīvatām |
GV01rv_hn08u:976: RV_8,020.04a vi dvīpāni pāpatan tiṣṭhad ducchunobhe yujanta rodasī |
GV01rv_hn08u:977: RV_8,020.04c pra dhanvāny airata śubhrakhādayo yad ejatha svabhānavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:978: RV_8,020.05a acyutā cid vo ajmann ā nānadati parvatāso vanaspatiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:980: RV_8,020.06a amāya vo maruto yātave dyaur jihīta uttarā bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn08u:981: RV_8,020.06c yatrā naro dediśate tanūṣv ā tvakṣāṃsi bāhvojasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:982: RV_8,020.07a svadhām anu śriyaṃ naro mahi tveṣā amavanto vṛṣapsavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:984: RV_8,020.08a gobhir vāṇo ajyate sobharīṇāṃ rathe kośe hiraṇyaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:985: RV_8,020.08c gobandhavaḥ sujātāsa iṣe bhuje mahānto na sparase nu ||
GV01rv_hn08u:986: RV_8,020.09a prati vo vṛṣadañjayo vṛṣṇe śardhāya mārutāya bharadhvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:988: RV_8,020.10a vṛṣaṇaśvena maruto vṛṣapsunā rathena vṛṣanābhinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:989: RV_8,020.10c ā śyenāso na pakṣiṇo vṛthā naro havyā no vītaye gata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:990: RV_8,020.11a samānam añjy eṣāṃ vi bhrājante rukmāso adhi bāhuṣu |
GV01rv_hn08u:992: RV_8,020.12a ta ugrāso vṛṣaṇa ugrabāhavo nakiṣ ṭanūṣu yetire |
GV01rv_hn08u:993: RV_8,020.12c sthirā dhanvāny āyudhā ratheṣu vo 'nīkeṣv adhi śriyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:994: RV_8,020.13a yeṣām arṇo na sapratho nāma tveṣaṃ śaśvatām ekam id bhuje |
GV01rv_hn08u:996: RV_8,020.14a tān vandasva marutas tāṃ upa stuhi teṣāṃ hi dhunīnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:997: RV_8,020.14c arāṇāṃ na caramas tad eṣāṃ dānā mahnā tad eṣām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:998: RV_8,020.15a subhagaḥ sa va ūtiṣv āsa pūrvāsu maruto vyuṣṭiṣu |
GV01rv_hn08u:1000: RV_8,020.16a yasya vā yūyam prati vājino nara ā havyā vītaye gatha |
GV01rv_hn08u:1001: RV_8,020.16c abhi ṣa dyumnair uta vājasātibhiḥ sumnā vo dhūtayo naśat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1002: RV_8,020.17a yathā rudrasya sūnavo divo vaśanty asurasya vedhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1004: RV_8,020.18a ye cārhanti marutaḥ sudānavaḥ sman mīḷhuṣaś caranti ye |
GV01rv_hn08u:1005: RV_8,020.18c ataś cid ā na upa vasyasā hṛdā yuvāna ā vavṛdhvam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1006: RV_8,020.19a yūna ū ṣu naviṣṭhayā vṛṣṇaḥ pāvakāṃ abhi sobhare girā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1008: RV_8,020.20a sāhā ye santi muṣṭiheva havyo viśvāsu pṛtsu hotṛṣu |
GV01rv_hn08u:1009: RV_8,020.20c vṛṣṇaś candrān na suśravastamān girā vandasva maruto aha ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1010: RV_8,020.21a gāvaś cid ghā samanyavaḥ sajātyena marutaḥ sabandhavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1012: RV_8,020.22a martaś cid vo nṛtavo rukmavakṣasa upa bhrātṛtvam āyati |
GV01rv_hn08u:1013: RV_8,020.22c adhi no gāta marutaḥ sadā hi va āpitvam asti nidhruvi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1014: RV_8,020.23a maruto mārutasya na ā bheṣajasya vahatā sudānavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1016: RV_8,020.24a yābhiḥ sindhum avatha yābhis tūrvatha yābhir daśasyathā krivim |
GV01rv_hn08u:1017: RV_8,020.24c mayo no bhūtotibhir mayobhuvaḥ śivābhir asacadviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1018: RV_8,020.25a yat sindhau yad asiknyāṃ yat samudreṣu marutaḥ subarhiṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1020: RV_8,020.26a viśvam paśyanto bibhṛthā tanūṣv ā tenā no adhi vocata |
GV01rv_hn08u:1021: RV_8,020.26c kṣamā rapo maruta āturasya na iṣkartā vihrutam punaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1022: RV_8,021.01a vayam u tvām apūrvya sthūraṃ na kac cid bharanto 'vasyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1024: RV_8,021.02a upa tvā karmann ūtaye sa no yuvograś cakrāma yo dhṛṣat |
GV01rv_hn08u:1025: RV_8,021.02c tvām id dhy avitāraṃ vavṛmahe sakhāya indra sānasim ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1026: RV_8,021.03a ā yāhīma indavo 'śvapate gopata urvarāpate |
GV01rv_hn08u:1028: RV_8,021.04a vayaṃ hi tvā bandhumantam abandhavo viprāsa indra yemima |
GV01rv_hn08u:1029: RV_8,021.04c yā te dhāmāni vṛṣabha tebhir ā gahi viśvebhiḥ somapītaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1030: RV_8,021.05a sīdantas te vayo yathā gośrīte madhau madire vivakṣaṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1032: RV_8,021.06a acchā ca tvainā namasā vadāmasi kim muhuś cid vi dīdhayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1033: RV_8,021.06c santi kāmāso harivo dadiṣ ṭvaṃ smo vayaṃ santi no dhiyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1034: RV_8,021.07a nūtnā id indra te vayam ūtī abhūma nahi nū te adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1036: RV_8,021.08a vidmā sakhitvam uta śūra bhojyam ā te tā vajrinn īmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1037: RV_8,021.08c uto samasminn ā śiśīhi no vaso vāje suśipra gomati ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1038: RV_8,021.09a yo na idam-idam purā pra vasya ānināya tam u va stuṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1040: RV_8,021.10a haryaśvaṃ satpatiṃ carṣaṇīsahaṃ sa hi ṣmā yo amandata |
GV01rv_hn08u:1041: RV_8,021.10c ā tu naḥ sa vayati gavyam aśvyaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavā śatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1042: RV_8,021.11a tvayā ha svid yujā vayam prati śvasantaṃ vṛṣabha bruvīmahi |
GV01rv_hn08u:1044: RV_8,021.12a jayema kāre puruhūta kāriṇo 'bhi tiṣṭhema dūḍhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1045: RV_8,021.12c nṛbhir vṛtraṃ hanyāma śūśuyāma cāver indra pra ṇo dhiyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1046: RV_8,021.13a abhrātṛvyo anā tvam anāpir indra januṣā sanād asi |
GV01rv_hn08u:1048: RV_8,021.14a nakī revantaṃ sakhyāya vindase pīyanti te surāśvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1049: RV_8,021.14c yadā kṛṇoṣi nadanuṃ sam ūhasy ād it piteva hūyase ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1050: RV_8,021.15a mā te amājuro yathā mūrāsa indra sakhye tvāvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1052: RV_8,021.16a mā te godatra nir arāma rādhasa indra mā te gṛhāmahi |
GV01rv_hn08u:1053: RV_8,021.16c dṛḷhā cid aryaḥ pra mṛśābhy ā bhara na te dāmāna ādabhe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1054: RV_8,021.17a indro vā ghed iyan maghaṃ sarasvatī vā subhagā dadir vasu |
GV01rv_hn08u:1056: RV_8,021.18a citra id rājā rājakā id anyake yake sarasvatīm anu |
GV01rv_hn08u:1057: RV_8,021.18c parjanya iva tatanad dhi vṛṣṭyā sahasram ayutā dadat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1058: RV_8,022.01a o tyam ahva ā ratham adyā daṃsiṣṭham ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:1059: RV_8,022.01c yam aśvinā suhavā rudravartanī ā sūryāyai tasthathuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1060: RV_8,022.02a pūrvāyuṣaṃ suhavam puruspṛham bhujyuṃ vājeṣu pūrvyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1061: RV_8,022.02c sacanāvantaṃ sumatibhiḥ sobhare vidveṣasam anehasam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1062: RV_8,022.03a iha tyā purubhūtamā devā namobhir aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1063: RV_8,022.03c arvācīnā sv avase karāmahe gantārā dāśuṣo gṛham ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1064: RV_8,022.04a yuvo rathasya pari cakram īyata īrmānyad vām iṣaṇyati |
GV01rv_hn08u:1065: RV_8,022.04c asmāṃ acchā sumatir vāṃ śubhas patī ā dhenur iva dhāvatu ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1066: RV_8,022.05a ratho yo vāṃ trivandhuro hiraṇyābhīśur aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1067: RV_8,022.05c pari dyāvāpṛthivī bhūṣati śrutas tena nāsatyā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1068: RV_8,022.06a daśasyantā manave pūrvyaṃ divi yavaṃ vṛkeṇa karṣathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1069: RV_8,022.06c tā vām adya sumatibhiḥ śubhas patī aśvinā pra stuvīmahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1070: RV_8,022.07a upa no vājinīvasū yātam ṛtasya pathibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1071: RV_8,022.07c yebhis tṛkṣiṃ vṛṣaṇā trāsadasyavam mahe kṣatrāya jinvathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1072: RV_8,022.08a ayaṃ vām adribhiḥ sutaḥ somo narā vṛṣaṇvasū |
GV01rv_hn08u:1073: RV_8,022.08c ā yātaṃ somapītaye pibataṃ dāśuṣo gṛhe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1074: RV_8,022.09a ā hi ruhatam aśvinā rathe kośe hiraṇyaye vṛṣaṇvasū |
GV01rv_hn08u:1076: RV_8,022.10a yābhiḥ paktham avatho yābhir adhriguṃ yābhir babhruṃ vijoṣasam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1077: RV_8,022.10c tābhir no makṣū tūyam aśvinā gatam bhiṣajyataṃ yad āturam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1078: RV_8,022.11a yad adhrigāvo adhrigū idā cid ahno aśvinā havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1080: RV_8,022.12a tābhir ā yātaṃ vṛṣaṇopa me havaṃ viśvapsuṃ viśvavāryam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1081: RV_8,022.12c iṣā maṃhiṣṭhā purubhūtamā narā yābhiḥ kriviṃ vāvṛdhus tābhir ā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1082: RV_8,022.13a tāv idā cid ahānāṃ tāv aśvinā vandamāna upa bruve |
GV01rv_hn08u:1084: RV_8,022.14a tāv id doṣā tā uṣasi śubhas patī tā yāman rudravartanī |
GV01rv_hn08u:1085: RV_8,022.14c mā no martāya ripave vājinīvasū paro rudrāv ati khyatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1086: RV_8,022.15a ā sugmyāya sugmyam prātā rathenāśvinā vā sakṣaṇī |
GV01rv_hn08u:1088: RV_8,022.16a manojavasā vṛṣaṇā madacyutā makṣuṅgamābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1089: RV_8,022.16c ārāttāc cid bhūtam asme avase pūrvībhiḥ purubhojasā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1090: RV_8,022.17a ā no aśvāvad aśvinā vartir yāsiṣṭam madhupātamā narā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1092: RV_8,022.18a suprāvargaṃ suvīryaṃ suṣṭhu vāryam anādhṛṣṭaṃ rakṣasvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1093: RV_8,022.18c asminn ā vām āyāne vājinīvasū viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1094: RV_8,023.01a īḷiṣvā hi pratīvyaṃ yajasva jātavedasam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1098: RV_8,023.03a yeṣām ābādha ṛgmiya iṣaḥ pṛkṣaś ca nigrabhe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1100: RV_8,023.04a ud asya śocir asthād dīdiyuṣo vy ajaram |
GV01rv_hn08u:1102: RV_8,023.05a ud u tiṣṭha svadhvara stavāno devyā kṛpā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1104: RV_8,023.06a agne yāhi suśastibhir havyā juhvāna ānuṣak |
GV01rv_hn08u:1106: RV_8,023.07a agniṃ vaḥ pūrvyaṃ huve hotāraṃ carṣaṇīnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1107: RV_8,023.07c tam ayā vācā gṛṇe tam u va stuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1108: RV_8,023.08a yajñebhir adbhutakratuṃ yaṃ kṛpā sūdayanta it |
GV01rv_hn08u:1109: RV_8,023.08c mitraṃ na jane sudhitam ṛtāvani ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1110: RV_8,023.09a ṛtāvānam ṛtāyavo yajñasya sādhanaṃ girā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1111: RV_8,023.09c upo enaṃ jujuṣur namasas pade ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1112: RV_8,023.10a acchā no aṅgirastamaṃ yajñāso yantu saṃyataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1113: RV_8,023.10c hotā yo asti vikṣv ā yaśastamaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1114: RV_8,023.11a agne tava tye ajarendhānāso bṛhad bhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1116: RV_8,023.12a sa tvaṃ na ūrjām pate rayiṃ rāsva suvīryam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1117: RV_8,023.12c prāva nas toke tanaye samatsv ā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1118: RV_8,023.13a yad vā u viśpatiḥ śitaḥ suprīto manuṣo viśi |
GV01rv_hn08u:1119: RV_8,023.13c viśved agniḥ prati rakṣāṃsi sedhati ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1120: RV_8,023.14a śruṣṭy agne navasya me stomasya vīra viśpate |
GV01rv_hn08u:1121: RV_8,023.14c ni māyinas tapuṣā rakṣaso daha ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1122: RV_8,023.15a na tasya māyayā cana ripur īśīta martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1124: RV_8,023.16a vyaśvas tvā vasuvidam ukṣaṇyur aprīṇād ṛṣiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1125: RV_8,023.16c maho rāye tam u tvā sam idhīmahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1126: RV_8,023.17a uśanā kāvyas tvā ni hotāram asādayat |
GV01rv_hn08u:1128: RV_8,023.18a viśve hi tvā sajoṣaso devāso dūtam akrata |
GV01rv_hn08u:1129: RV_8,023.18c śruṣṭī deva prathamo yajñiyo bhuvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1130: RV_8,023.19a imaṃ ghā vīro amṛtaṃ dūtaṃ kṛṇvīta martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1132: RV_8,023.20a taṃ huvema yatasrucaḥ subhāsaṃ śukraśociṣam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1133: RV_8,023.20c viśām agnim ajaram pratnam īḍyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1134: RV_8,023.21a yo asmai havyadātibhir āhutim marto 'vidhat |
GV01rv_hn08u:1135: RV_8,023.21c bhūri poṣaṃ sa dhatte vīravad yaśaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1136: RV_8,023.22a prathamaṃ jātavedasam agniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1137: RV_8,023.22c prati srug eti namasā haviṣmatī ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1140: RV_8,023.24a nūnam arca vihāyase stomebhi sthūrayūpavat |
GV01rv_hn08u:1143: RV_8,023.25c viprā agnim avase pratnam īḷate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1144: RV_8,023.26a maho viśvāṃ abhi ṣato 'bhi havyāni mānuṣā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1145: RV_8,023.26c agne ni ṣatsi namasādhi barhiṣi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1146: RV_8,023.27a vaṃsvā no vāryā puru vaṃsva rāyaḥ puruspṛhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1148: RV_8,023.28a tvaṃ varo suṣāmṇe 'gne janāya codaya |
GV01rv_hn08u:1149: RV_8,023.28c sadā vaso rātiṃ yaviṣṭha śaśvate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1150: RV_8,023.29a tvaṃ hi supratūr asi tvaṃ no gomatīr iṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1151: RV_8,023.29c maho rāyaḥ sātim agne apā vṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1152: RV_8,023.30a agne tvaṃ yaśā asy ā mitrāvaruṇā vaha |
GV01rv_hn08u:1154: RV_8,024.01a sakhāya ā śiṣāmahi brahmendrāya vajriṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1155: RV_8,024.01c stuṣa ū ṣu vo nṛtamāya dhṛṣṇave ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1156: RV_8,024.02a śavasā hy asi śruto vṛtrahatyena vṛtrahā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1157: RV_8,024.02c maghair maghono ati śūra dāśasi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1158: RV_8,024.03a sa na stavāna ā bhara rayiṃ citraśravastamam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1159: RV_8,024.03c nireke cid yo harivo vasur dadiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1160: RV_8,024.04a ā nirekam uta priyam indra darṣi janānām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1161: RV_8,024.04c dhṛṣatā dhṛṣṇo stavamāna ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1162: RV_8,024.05a na te savyaṃ na dakṣiṇaṃ hastaṃ varanta āmuraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1164: RV_8,024.06a ā tvā gobhir iva vrajaṃ gīrbhir ṛṇomy adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1165: RV_8,024.06c ā smā kāmaṃ jaritur ā manaḥ pṛṇa ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1166: RV_8,024.07a viśvāni viśvamanaso dhiyā no vṛtrahantama |
GV01rv_hn08u:1167: RV_8,024.07c ugra praṇetar adhi ṣū vaso gahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1168: RV_8,024.08a vayaṃ te asya vṛtrahan vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1170: RV_8,024.09a indra yathā hy asti te 'parītaṃ nṛto śavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1172: RV_8,024.10a ā vṛṣasva mahāmaha mahe nṛtama rādhase |
GV01rv_hn08u:1173: RV_8,024.10c dṛḷhaś cid dṛhya maghavan maghattaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1174: RV_8,024.11a nū anyatrā cid adrivas tvan no jagmur āśasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1175: RV_8,024.11c maghavañ chagdhi tava tan na ūtibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1176: RV_8,024.12a nahy aṅga nṛto tvad anyaṃ vindāmi rādhase |
GV01rv_hn08u:1177: RV_8,024.12c rāye dyumnāya śavase ca girvaṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1178: RV_8,024.13a endum indrāya siñcata pibāti somyam madhu |
GV01rv_hn08u:1180: RV_8,024.14a upo harīṇām patiṃ dakṣam pṛñcantam abravam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1182: RV_8,024.15a nahy aṅga purā cana jajñe vīrataras tvat |
GV01rv_hn08u:1183: RV_8,024.15c nakī rāyā naivathā na bhandanā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1184: RV_8,024.16a ed u madhvo madintaraṃ siñca vādhvaryo andhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1185: RV_8,024.16c evā hi vīra stavate sadāvṛdhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1186: RV_8,024.17a indra sthātar harīṇāṃ nakiṣ ṭe pūrvyastutim |
GV01rv_hn08u:1187: RV_8,024.17c ud ānaṃśa śavasā na bhandanā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1188: RV_8,024.18a taṃ vo vājānām patim ahūmahi śravasyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1190: RV_8,024.19a eto nv indraṃ stavāma sakhāya stomyaṃ naram |
GV01rv_hn08u:1191: RV_8,024.19c kṛṣṭīr yo viśvā abhy asty eka it ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1192: RV_8,024.20a agorudhāya gaviṣe dyukṣāya dasmyaṃ vacaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1193: RV_8,024.20c ghṛtāt svādīyo madhunaś ca vocata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1194: RV_8,024.21a yasyāmitāni vīryā na rādhaḥ paryetave |
GV01rv_hn08u:1195: RV_8,024.21c jyotir na viśvam abhy asti dakṣiṇā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1196: RV_8,024.22a stuhīndraṃ vyaśvavad anūrmiṃ vājinaṃ yamam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1197: RV_8,024.22c aryo gayam maṃhamānaṃ vi dāśuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1198: RV_8,024.23a evā nūnam upa stuhi vaiyaśva daśamaṃ navam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1200: RV_8,024.24a vetthā hi nirṛtīnāṃ vajrahasta parivṛjam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1202: RV_8,024.25a tad indrāva ā bhara yenā daṃsiṣṭha kṛtvane |
GV01rv_hn08u:1203: RV_8,024.25c dvitā kutsāya śiśnatho ni codaya ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1204: RV_8,024.26a tam u tvā nūnam īmahe navyaṃ daṃsiṣṭha sanyase |
GV01rv_hn08u:1205: RV_8,024.26c sa tvaṃ no viśvā abhimātīḥ sakṣaṇiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1206: RV_8,024.27a ya ṛkṣād aṃhaso mucad yo vāryāt sapta sindhuṣu |
GV01rv_hn08u:1208: RV_8,024.28a yathā varo suṣāmṇe sanibhya āvaho rayim |
GV01rv_hn08u:1210: RV_8,024.29a ā nāryasya dakṣiṇā vyaśvāṃ etu sominaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1211: RV_8,024.29c sthūraṃ ca rādhaḥ śatavat sahasravat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1212: RV_8,024.30a yat tvā pṛcchād ījānaḥ kuhayā kuhayākṛte |
GV01rv_hn08u:1213: RV_8,024.30c eṣo apaśrito valo gomatīm ava tiṣṭhati ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1214: RV_8,025.01a tā vāṃ viśvasya gopā devā deveṣu yajñiyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1216: RV_8,025.02a mitrā tanā na rathyā varuṇo yaś ca sukratuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1220: RV_8,025.04a mahāntā mitrāvaruṇā samrājā devāv asurā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1221: RV_8,025.04c ṛtāvānāv ṛtam ā ghoṣato bṛhat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1222: RV_8,025.05a napātā śavaso mahaḥ sūnū dakṣasya sukratū |
GV01rv_hn08u:1223: RV_8,025.05c sṛpradānū iṣo vāstv adhi kṣitaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1224: RV_8,025.06a saṃ yā dānūni yemathur divyāḥ pārthivīr iṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1225: RV_8,025.06c nabhasvatīr ā vāṃ carantu vṛṣṭayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1226: RV_8,025.07a adhi yā bṛhato divo 'bhi yūtheva paśyataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1228: RV_8,025.08a ṛtāvānā ni ṣedatuḥ sāmrājyāya sukratū |
GV01rv_hn08u:1231: RV_8,025.09c ni cin miṣantā nicirā ni cikyatuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1232: RV_8,025.10a uta no devy aditir uruṣyatāṃ nāsatyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1234: RV_8,025.11a te no nāvam uruṣyata divā naktaṃ sudānavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1236: RV_8,025.12a aghnate viṣṇave vayam ariṣyantaḥ sudānave |
GV01rv_hn08u:1238: RV_8,025.13a tad vāryaṃ vṛṇīmahe variṣṭhaṃ gopayatyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1239: RV_8,025.13c mitro yat pānti varuṇo yad aryamā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1240: RV_8,025.14a uta naḥ sindhur apāṃ tan marutas tad aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1242: RV_8,025.15a te hi ṣmā vanuṣo naro 'bhimātiṃ kayasya cit |
GV01rv_hn08u:1243: RV_8,025.15c tigmaṃ na kṣodaḥ pratighnanti bhūrṇayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1244: RV_8,025.16a ayam eka itthā purūru caṣṭe vi viśpatiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1245: RV_8,025.16c tasya vratāny anu vaś carāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1246: RV_8,025.17a anu pūrvāṇy okyā sāmrājyasya saścima |
GV01rv_hn08u:1248: RV_8,025.18a pari yo raśminā divo 'ntān mame pṛthivyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1249: RV_8,025.18c ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1250: RV_8,025.19a ud u ṣya śaraṇe divo jyotir ayaṃsta sūryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1251: RV_8,025.19c agnir na śukraḥ samidhāna āhutaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1254: RV_8,025.21a tat sūryaṃ rodasī ubhe doṣā vastor upa bruve |
GV01rv_hn08u:1255: RV_8,025.21c bhojeṣv asmāṃ abhy uc carā sadā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1258: RV_8,025.23a tā me aśvyānāṃ harīṇāṃ nitośanā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1260: RV_8,025.24a smadabhīśū kaśāvantā viprā naviṣṭhayā matī |
GV01rv_hn08u:1262: RV_8,026.01a yuvor u ṣū rathaṃ huve sadhastutyāya sūriṣu |
GV01rv_hn08u:1264: RV_8,026.02a yuvaṃ varo suṣāmṇe mahe tane nāsatyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1266: RV_8,026.03a tā vām adya havāmahe havyebhir vājinīvasū |
GV01rv_hn08u:1267: RV_8,026.03c pūrvīr iṣa iṣayantāv ati kṣapaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1268: RV_8,026.04a ā vāṃ vāhiṣṭho aśvinā ratho yātu śruto narā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1269: RV_8,026.04c upa stomān turasya darśathaḥ śriye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1270: RV_8,026.05a juhurāṇā cid aśvinā manyethāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū |
GV01rv_hn08u:1271: RV_8,026.05c yuvaṃ hi rudrā parṣatho ati dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1272: RV_8,026.06a dasrā hi viśvam ānuṣaṅ makṣūbhiḥ paridīyathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1274: RV_8,026.07a upa no yātam aśvinā rāyā viśvapuṣā saha |
GV01rv_hn08u:1276: RV_8,026.08a ā me asya pratīvyam indranāsatyā gatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1278: RV_8,026.09a vayaṃ hi vāṃ havāmaha ukṣaṇyanto vyaśvavat |
GV01rv_hn08u:1279: RV_8,026.09c sumatibhir upa viprāv ihā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1280: RV_8,026.10a aśvinā sv ṛṣe stuhi kuvit te śravato havam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1282: RV_8,026.11a vaiyaśvasya śrutaṃ naroto me asya vedathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1286: RV_8,026.13a yo vāṃ yajñebhir āvṛto 'dhivastrā vadhūr iva |
GV01rv_hn08u:1288: RV_8,026.14a yo vām uruvyacastamaṃ ciketati nṛpāyyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1289: RV_8,026.14c vartir aśvinā pari yātam asmayū ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1290: RV_8,026.15a asmabhyaṃ su vṛṣaṇvasū yātaṃ vartir nṛpāyyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1292: RV_8,026.16a vāhiṣṭho vāṃ havānāṃ stomo dūto huvan narā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1294: RV_8,026.17a yad ado divo arṇava iṣo vā madatho gṛhe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1296: RV_8,026.18a uta syā śvetayāvarī vāhiṣṭhā vāṃ nadīnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1298: RV_8,026.19a smad etayā sukīrtyāśvinā śvetayā dhiyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1300: RV_8,026.20a yukṣvā hi tvaṃ rathāsahā yuvasva poṣyā vaso |
GV01rv_hn08u:1301: RV_8,026.20c ān no vāyo madhu pibāsmākaṃ savanā gahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1302: RV_8,026.21a tava vāyav ṛtaspate tvaṣṭur jāmātar adbhuta |
GV01rv_hn08u:1304: RV_8,026.22a tvaṣṭur jāmātaraṃ vayam īśānaṃ rāya īmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1306: RV_8,026.23a vāyo yāhi śivā divo vahasvā su svaśvyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1308: RV_8,026.24a tvāṃ hi supsarastamaṃ nṛṣadaneṣu hūmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1310: RV_8,026.25a sa tvaṃ no deva manasā vāyo mandāno agriyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1312: RV_8,027.01a agnir ukthe purohito grāvāṇo barhir adhvare |
GV01rv_hn08u:1313: RV_8,027.01c ṛcā yāmi maruto brahmaṇas patiṃ devāṃ avo vareṇyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1314: RV_8,027.02a ā paśuṃ gāsi pṛthivīṃ vanaspatīn uṣāsā naktam oṣadhīḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1315: RV_8,027.02c viśve ca no vasavo viśvavedaso dhīnām bhūta prāvitāraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1316: RV_8,027.03a pra sū na etv adhvaro 'gnā deveṣu pūrvyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1317: RV_8,027.03c ādityeṣu pra varuṇe dhṛtavrate marutsu viśvabhānuṣu ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1318: RV_8,027.04a viśve hi ṣmā manave viśvavedaso bhuvan vṛdhe riśādasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1319: RV_8,027.04c ariṣṭebhiḥ pāyubhir viśvavedaso yantā no 'vṛkaṃ chardiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1320: RV_8,027.05a ā no adya samanaso gantā viśve sajoṣasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1321: RV_8,027.05c ṛcā girā maruto devy adite sadane pastye mahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1322: RV_8,027.06a abhi priyā maruto yā vo aśvyā havyā mitra prayāthana |
GV01rv_hn08u:1323: RV_8,027.06c ā barhir indro varuṇas turā nara ādityāsaḥ sadantu naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1324: RV_8,027.07a vayaṃ vo vṛktabarhiṣo hitaprayasa ānuṣak |
GV01rv_hn08u:1325: RV_8,027.07c sutasomāso varuṇa havāmahe manuṣvad iddhāgnayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1326: RV_8,027.08a ā pra yāta maruto viṣṇo aśvinā pūṣan mākīnayā dhiyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1327: RV_8,027.08c indra ā yātu prathamaḥ saniṣyubhir vṛṣā yo vṛtrahā gṛṇe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1328: RV_8,027.09a vi no devāso adruho 'cchidraṃ śarma yacchata |
GV01rv_hn08u:1329: RV_8,027.09c na yad dūrād vasavo nū cid antito varūtham ādadharṣati ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1330: RV_8,027.10a asti hi vaḥ sajātyaṃ riśādaso devāso asty āpyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1331: RV_8,027.10c pra ṇaḥ pūrvasmai suvitāya vocata makṣū sumnāya navyase ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1332: RV_8,027.11a idā hi va upastutim idā vāmasya bhaktaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:1333: RV_8,027.11c upa vo viśvavedaso namasyur āṃ asṛkṣy anyām iva ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1334: RV_8,027.12a ud u ṣya vaḥ savitā supraṇītayo 'sthād ūrdhvo vareṇyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1335: RV_8,027.12c ni dvipādaś catuṣpādo arthino 'viśran patayiṣṇavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1337: RV_8,027.13c devaṃ-devaṃ huvema vājasātaye gṛṇanto devyā dhiyā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1338: RV_8,027.14a devāso hi ṣmā manave samanyavo viśve sākaṃ sarātayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1339: RV_8,027.14c te no adya te aparaṃ tuce tu no bhavantu varivovidaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1340: RV_8,027.15a pra vaḥ śaṃsāmy adruhaḥ saṃstha upastutīnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1341: RV_8,027.15c na taṃ dhūrtir varuṇa mitra martyaṃ yo vo dhāmabhyo 'vidhat
GV01rv_hn08u:1342: RV_8,027.16a pra sa kṣayaṃ tirate vi mahīr iṣo yo vo varāya dāśati |
GV01rv_hn08u:1343: RV_8,027.16c pra prajābhir jāyate dharmaṇas pary ariṣṭaḥ sarva edhate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1344: RV_8,027.17a ṛte sa vindate yudhaḥ sugebhir yāty adhvanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1345: RV_8,027.17c aryamā mitro varuṇaḥ sarātayo yaṃ trāyante sajoṣasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1346: RV_8,027.18a ajre cid asmai kṛṇuthā nyañcanaṃ durge cid ā susaraṇam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1347: RV_8,027.18c eṣā cid asmād aśaniḥ paro nu sāsredhantī vi naśyatu ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1348: RV_8,027.19a yad adya sūrya udyati priyakṣatrā ṛtaṃ dadha |
GV01rv_hn08u:1349: RV_8,027.19c yan nimruci prabudhi viśvavedaso yad vā madhyandine divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1350: RV_8,027.20a yad vābhipitve asurā ṛtaṃ yate chardir yema vi dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1351: RV_8,027.20c vayaṃ tad vo vasavo viśvavedasa upa stheyāma madhya ā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1352: RV_8,027.21a yad adya sūra udite yan madhyandina ātuci |
GV01rv_hn08u:1353: RV_8,027.21c vāmaṃ dhattha manave viśvavedaso juhvānāya pracetase ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1354: RV_8,027.22a vayaṃ tad vaḥ samrāja ā vṛṇīmahe putro na bahupāyyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1355: RV_8,027.22c aśyāma tad ādityā juhvato havir yena vasyo 'naśāmahai ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1356: RV_8,028.01a ye triṃśati trayas paro devāso barhir āsadan |
GV01rv_hn08u:1358: RV_8,028.02a varuṇo mitro aryamā smadrātiṣāco agnayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1360: RV_8,028.03a te no gopā apācyās ta udak ta itthā nyak |
GV01rv_hn08u:1362: RV_8,028.04a yathā vaśanti devās tathed asat tad eṣāṃ nakir ā minat |
GV01rv_hn08u:1364: RV_8,028.05a saptānāṃ sapta ṛṣṭayaḥ sapta dyumnāny eṣām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1366: RV_8,029.01a babhrur eko viṣuṇaḥ sūnaro yuvāñjy aṅkte hiraṇyayam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1367: RV_8,029.02a yonim eka ā sasāda dyotano 'ntar deveṣu medhiraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1368: RV_8,029.03a vāśīm eko bibharti hasta āyasīm antar deveṣu nidhruviḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1369: RV_8,029.04a vajram eko bibharti hasta āhitaṃ tena vṛtrāṇi jighnate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1370: RV_8,029.05a tigmam eko bibharti hasta āyudhaṃ śucir ugro jalāṣabheṣajaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1371: RV_8,029.06a patha ekaḥ pīpāya taskaro yathāṃ eṣa veda nidhīnām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1372: RV_8,029.07a trīṇy eka urugāyo vi cakrame yatra devāso madanti ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1373: RV_8,029.08a vibhir dvā carata ekayā saha pra pravāseva vasataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1374: RV_8,029.09a sado dvā cakrāte upamā divi samrājā sarpirāsutī ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1375: RV_8,029.10a arcanta eke mahi sāma manvata tena sūryam arocayan ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1376: RV_8,030.01a nahi vo asty arbhako devāso na kumārakaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1378: RV_8,030.02a iti stutāso asathā riśādaso ye stha trayaś ca triṃśac ca |
GV01rv_hn08u:1380: RV_8,030.03a te nas trādhvaṃ te 'vata ta u no adhi vocata |
GV01rv_hn08u:1381: RV_8,030.03c mā naḥ pathaḥ pitryān mānavād adhi dūraṃ naiṣṭa parāvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1382: RV_8,030.04a ye devāsa iha sthana viśve vaiśvānarā uta |
GV01rv_hn08u:1383: RV_8,030.04c asmabhyaṃ śarma sapratho gave 'śvāya yacchata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1384: RV_8,031.01a yo yajāti yajāta it sunavac ca pacāti ca |
GV01rv_hn08u:1386: RV_8,031.02a puroḷāśaṃ yo asmai somaṃ rarata āśiram |
GV01rv_hn08u:1387: RV_8,031.02c pād it taṃ śakro aṃhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1388: RV_8,031.03a tasya dyumāṃ asad ratho devajūtaḥ sa śūśuvat |
GV01rv_hn08u:1392: RV_8,031.05a yā dampatī samanasā sunuta ā ca dhāvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1394: RV_8,031.06a prati prāśavyāṃ itaḥ samyañcā barhir āśāte |
GV01rv_hn08u:1396: RV_8,031.07a na devānām api hnutaḥ sumatiṃ na jugukṣataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1398: RV_8,031.08a putriṇā tā kumāriṇā viśvam āyur vy aśnutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1401: RV_8,031.09c sam ūdho romaśaṃ hato deveṣu kṛṇuto duvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1402: RV_8,031.10a ā śarma parvatānāṃ vṛṇīmahe nadīnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1404: RV_8,031.11a aitu pūṣā rayir bhagaḥ svasti sarvadhātamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1406: RV_8,031.12a aramatir anarvaṇo viśvo devasya manasā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1408: RV_8,031.13a yathā no mitro aryamā varuṇaḥ santi gopāḥ |
