GV01rv_hn08u:1410: RV_8,031.14a agniṃ vaḥ pūrvyaṃ girā devam īḷe vasūnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1411: RV_8,031.14c saparyantaḥ purupriyam mitraṃ na kṣetrasādhasam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1412: RV_8,031.15a makṣū devavato rathaḥ śūro vā pṛtsu kāsu cit |
GV01rv_hn08u:1413: RV_8,031.15c devānāṃ ya in mano yajamāna iyakṣaty abhīd ayajvano bhuvat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1414: RV_8,031.16a na yajamāna riṣyasi na sunvāna na devayo |
GV01rv_hn08u:1415: RV_8,031.16c devānāṃ ya in mano yajamāna iyakṣaty abhīd ayajvano bhuvat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1416: RV_8,031.17a nakiṣ ṭaṃ karmaṇā naśan na pra yoṣan na yoṣati |
GV01rv_hn08u:1417: RV_8,031.17c devānāṃ ya in mano yajamāna iyakṣaty abhīd ayajvano bhuvat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1418: RV_8,031.18a asad atra suvīryam uta tyad āśvaśvyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1419: RV_8,031.18c devānāṃ ya in mano yajamāna iyakṣaty abhīd ayajvano bhuvat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1420: RV_8,032.01a pra kṛtāny ṛjīṣiṇaḥ kaṇvā indrasya gāthayā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1422: RV_8,032.02a yaḥ sṛbindam anarśanim pipruṃ dāsam ahīśuvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1424: RV_8,032.03a ny arbudasya viṣṭapaṃ varṣmāṇam bṛhatas tira |
GV01rv_hn08u:1426: RV_8,032.04a prati śrutāya vo dhṛṣat tūrṇāśaṃ na girer adhi |
GV01rv_hn08u:1428: RV_8,032.05a sa gor aśvasya vi vrajam mandānaḥ somyebhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1430: RV_8,032.06a yadi me rāraṇaḥ suta ukthe vā dadhase canaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1432: RV_8,032.07a vayaṃ ghā te api ṣmasi stotāra indra girvaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1434: RV_8,032.08a uta naḥ pitum ā bhara saṃrarāṇo avikṣitam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1436: RV_8,032.09a uta no gomatas kṛdhi hiraṇyavato aśvinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1440: RV_8,032.11a yaḥ saṃsthe cic chatakratur ād īṃ kṛṇoti vṛtrahā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1442: RV_8,032.12a sa naḥ śakraś cid ā śakad dānavāṃ antarābharaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1444: RV_8,032.13a yo rāyo 'vanir mahān supāraḥ sunvataḥ sakhā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1446: RV_8,032.14a āyantāram mahi sthiram pṛtanāsu śravojitam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1448: RV_8,032.15a nakir asya śacīnāṃ niyantā sūnṛtānām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1449: RV_8,032.15c nakir vaktā na dād iti ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1450: RV_8,032.16a na nūnam brahmaṇām ṛṇam prāśūnām asti sunvatām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1452: RV_8,032.17a panya id upa gāyata panya ukthāni śaṃsata |
GV01rv_hn08u:1454: RV_8,032.18a panya ā dardirac chatā sahasrā vājy avṛtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1456: RV_8,032.19a vi ṣū cara svadhā anu kṛṣṭīnām anv āhuvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1458: RV_8,032.20a piba svadhainavānām uta yas tugrye sacā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1462: RV_8,032.22a ihi tisraḥ parāvata ihi pañca janāṃ ati |
GV01rv_hn08u:1464: RV_8,032.23a sūryo raśmiṃ yathā sṛjā tvā yacchantu me giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1466: RV_8,032.24a adhvaryav ā tu hi ṣiñca somaṃ vīrāya śipriṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1468: RV_8,032.25a ya udnaḥ phaligam bhinan nyak sindhūṃr avāsṛjat |
GV01rv_hn08u:1470: RV_8,032.26a ahan vṛtram ṛcīṣama aurṇavābham ahīśuvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1472: RV_8,032.27a pra va ugrāya niṣṭure 'ṣāḷhāya prasakṣiṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1474: RV_8,032.28a yo viśvāny abhi vratā somasya made andhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1476: RV_8,032.29a iha tyā sadhamādyā harī hiraṇyakeśyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1478: RV_8,032.30a arvāñcaṃ tvā puruṣṭuta priyamedhastutā harī |
GV01rv_hn08u:1480: RV_8,033.01a vayaṃ gha tvā sutāvanta āpo na vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1481: RV_8,033.01c pavitrasya prasravaṇeṣu vṛtrahan pari stotāra āsate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1482: RV_8,033.02a svaranti tvā sute naro vaso nireka ukthinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1483: RV_8,033.02c kadā sutaṃ tṛṣāṇa oka ā gama indra svabdīva vaṃsagaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1484: RV_8,033.03a kaṇvebhir dhṛṣṇav ā dhṛṣad vājaṃ darṣi sahasriṇam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1485: RV_8,033.03c piśaṅgarūpam maghavan vicarṣaṇe makṣū gomantam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1486: RV_8,033.04a pāhi gāyāndhaso mada indrāya medhyātithe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1487: RV_8,033.04c yaḥ sammiślo haryor yaḥ sute sacā vajrī ratho hiraṇyayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1488: RV_8,033.05a yaḥ suṣavyaḥ sudakṣiṇa ino yaḥ sukratur gṛṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1489: RV_8,033.05c ya ākaraḥ sahasrā yaḥ śatāmagha indro yaḥ pūrbhid āritaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1490: RV_8,033.06a yo dhṛṣito yo 'vṛto yo asti śmaśruṣu śritaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1491: RV_8,033.06c vibhūtadyumnaś cyavanaḥ puruṣṭutaḥ kratvā gaur iva śākinaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1492: RV_8,033.07a ka īṃ veda sute sacā pibantaṃ kad vayo dadhe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1493: RV_8,033.07c ayaṃ yaḥ puro vibhinatty ojasā mandānaḥ śipry andhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1494: RV_8,033.08a dānā mṛgo na vāraṇaḥ purutrā carathaṃ dadhe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1495: RV_8,033.08c nakiṣ ṭvā ni yamad ā sute gamo mahāṃś carasy ojasā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1496: RV_8,033.09a ya ugraḥ sann aniṣṭṛta sthiro raṇāya saṃskṛtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1497: RV_8,033.09c yadi stotur maghavā śṛṇavad dhavaṃ nendro yoṣaty ā gamat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1498: RV_8,033.10a satyam itthā vṛṣed asi vṛṣajūtir no 'vṛtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1499: RV_8,033.10c vṛṣā hy ugra śṛṇviṣe parāvati vṛṣo arvāvati śrutaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1500: RV_8,033.11a vṛṣaṇas te abhīśavo vṛṣā kaśā hiraṇyayī |
GV01rv_hn08u:1501: RV_8,033.11c vṛṣā ratho maghavan vṛṣaṇā harī vṛṣā tvaṃ śatakrato ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1502: RV_8,033.12a vṛṣā sotā sunotu te vṛṣann ṛjīpinn ā bhara |
GV01rv_hn08u:1503: RV_8,033.12c vṛṣā dadhanve vṛṣaṇaṃ nadīṣv ā tubhyaṃ sthātar harīṇām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1504: RV_8,033.13a endra yāhi pītaye madhu śaviṣṭha somyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1505: RV_8,033.13c nāyam acchā maghavā śṛṇavad giro brahmokthā ca sukratuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1506: RV_8,033.14a vahantu tvā ratheṣṭhām ā harayo rathayujaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1507: RV_8,033.14c tiraś cid aryaṃ savanāni vṛtrahann anyeṣāṃ yā śatakrato ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1508: RV_8,033.15a asmākam adyāntamaṃ stomaṃ dhiṣva mahāmaha |
GV01rv_hn08u:1509: RV_8,033.15c asmākaṃ te savanā santu śantamā madāya dyukṣa somapāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1510: RV_8,033.16a nahi ṣas tava no mama śāstre anyasya raṇyati |
GV01rv_hn08u:1512: RV_8,033.17a indraś cid ghā tad abravīt striyā aśāsyam manaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1514: RV_8,033.18a saptī cid ghā madacyutā mithunā vahato ratham |
GV01rv_hn08u:1516: RV_8,033.19a adhaḥ paśyasva mopari saṃtarām pādakau hara |
GV01rv_hn08u:1517: RV_8,033.19c mā te kaśaplakau dṛśan strī hi brahmā babhūvitha ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1518: RV_8,034.01a endra yāhi haribhir upa kaṇvasya suṣṭutim |
GV01rv_hn08u:1519: RV_8,034.01c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1520: RV_8,034.02a ā tvā grāvā vadann iha somī ghoṣeṇa yacchatu |
GV01rv_hn08u:1521: RV_8,034.02c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1522: RV_8,034.03a atrā vi nemir eṣām urāṃ na dhūnute vṛkaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1523: RV_8,034.03c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1524: RV_8,034.04a ā tvā kaṇvā ihāvase havante vājasātaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:1525: RV_8,034.04c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1526: RV_8,034.05a dadhāmi te sutānāṃ vṛṣṇe na pūrvapāyyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1527: RV_8,034.05c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1528: RV_8,034.06a smatpurandhir na ā gahi viśvatodhīr na ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:1529: RV_8,034.06c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1530: RV_8,034.07a ā no yāhi mahemate sahasrote śatāmagha |
GV01rv_hn08u:1531: RV_8,034.07c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1532: RV_8,034.08a ā tvā hotā manurhito devatrā vakṣad īḍyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1533: RV_8,034.08c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1534: RV_8,034.09a ā tvā madacyutā harī śyenam pakṣeva vakṣataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1535: RV_8,034.09c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1536: RV_8,034.10a ā yāhy arya ā pari svāhā somasya pītaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:1537: RV_8,034.10c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1538: RV_8,034.11a ā no yāhy upaśruty uktheṣu raṇayā iha |
GV01rv_hn08u:1539: RV_8,034.11c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1540: RV_8,034.12a sarūpair ā su no gahi sambhṛtaiḥ sambhṛtāśvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1541: RV_8,034.12c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1542: RV_8,034.13a ā yāhi parvatebhyaḥ samudrasyādhi viṣṭapaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1543: RV_8,034.13c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1544: RV_8,034.14a ā no gavyāny aśvyā sahasrā śūra dardṛhi |
GV01rv_hn08u:1545: RV_8,034.14c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1546: RV_8,034.15a ā naḥ sahasraśo bharāyutāni śatāni ca |
GV01rv_hn08u:1547: RV_8,034.15c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1548: RV_8,034.16a ā yad indraś ca dadvahe sahasraṃ vasurociṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1554: RV_8,035.01a agninendreṇa varuṇena viṣṇunādityai rudrair vasubhiḥ sacābhuvā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1555: RV_8,035.01c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam pibatam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1556: RV_8,035.02a viśvābhir dhībhir bhuvanena vājinā divā pṛthivyādribhiḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:1558: RV_8,035.02c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam pibatam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1559: RV_8,035.03a viśvair devais tribhir ekādaśair ihādbhir marudbhir bhṛgubhiḥ sacābhuvā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1560: RV_8,035.03c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam pibatam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1561: RV_8,035.04a juṣethāṃ yajñam bodhataṃ havasya me viśveha devau savanāva gacchatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1562: RV_8,035.04c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ceṣaṃ no voḷham aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1563: RV_8,035.05a stomaṃ juṣethāṃ yuvaśeva kanyanāṃ viśveha devau savanāva gacchatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1564: RV_8,035.05c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ceṣaṃ no voḷham aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1565: RV_8,035.06a giro juṣethām adhvaraṃ juṣethāṃ viśveha devau savanāva gacchatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1566: RV_8,035.06c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ceṣaṃ no voḷham aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1567: RV_8,035.07a hāridraveva patatho vaned upa somaṃ sutam mahiṣevāva gacchathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1568: RV_8,035.07c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca trir vartir yātam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1569: RV_8,035.08a haṃsāv iva patatho adhvagāv iva somaṃ sutam mahiṣevāva gacchathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1570: RV_8,035.08c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca trir vartir yātam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1571: RV_8,035.09a śyenāv iva patatho havyadātaye somaṃ sutam mahiṣevāva gacchathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1572: RV_8,035.09c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca trir vartir yātam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1573: RV_8,035.10a pibataṃ ca tṛpṇutaṃ cā ca gacchatam prajāṃ ca dhattaṃ
GV01rv_hn08u:1575: RV_8,035.10c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa corjaṃ no dhattam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1576: RV_8,035.11a jayataṃ ca pra stutaṃ ca pra cāvatam prajāṃ ca dhattaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1577: RV_8,035.11c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa corjaṃ no dhattam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1578: RV_8,035.12a hataṃ ca śatrūn yatataṃ ca mitriṇaḥ prajāṃ ca dhattaṃ
GV01rv_hn08u:1580: RV_8,035.12c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa corjaṃ no dhattam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1581: RV_8,035.13a mitrāvaruṇavantā uta dharmavantā marutvantā jaritur gacchatho
GV01rv_hn08u:1583: RV_8,035.13c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cādityair yātam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1584: RV_8,035.14a aṅgirasvantā uta viṣṇuvantā marutvantā jaritur gacchatho
GV01rv_hn08u:1586: RV_8,035.14c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cādityair yātam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1587: RV_8,035.15a ṛbhumantā vṛṣaṇā vājavantā marutvantā jaritur gacchatho havam
GV01rv_hn08u:1588: RV_8,035.15c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cādityair yātam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1589: RV_8,035.16a brahma jinvatam uta jinvataṃ dhiyo hataṃ rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1590: RV_8,035.16c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ sunvato aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1591: RV_8,035.17a kṣatraṃ jinvatam uta jinvataṃ nṝn hataṃ rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1592: RV_8,035.17c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ sunvato aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1593: RV_8,035.18a dhenūr jinvatam uta jinvataṃ viśo hataṃ rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1594: RV_8,035.18c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ sunvato aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1595: RV_8,035.19a atrer iva śṛṇutam pūrvyastutiṃ śyāvāśvasya sunvato madacyutā
GV01rv_hn08u:1596: RV_8,035.19c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cāśvinā tiroahnyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1597: RV_8,035.20a sargāṃ iva sṛjataṃ suṣṭutīr upa śyāvāśvasya sunvato madacyutā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1598: RV_8,035.20c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cāśvinā tiroahnyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1599: RV_8,035.21a raśmīṃr iva yacchatam adhvarāṃ upa śyāvāśvasya sunvato madacyutā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1600: RV_8,035.21c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cāśvinā tiroahnyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1601: RV_8,035.22a arvāg rathaṃ ni yacchatam pibataṃ somyam madhu |
GV01rv_hn08u:1602: RV_8,035.22c ā yātam aśvinā gatam avasyur vām ahaṃ huve dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1603: RV_8,035.23a namovāke prasthite adhvare narā vivakṣaṇasya pītaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:1604: RV_8,035.23c ā yātam aśvinā gatam avasyur vām ahaṃ huve dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1605: RV_8,035.24a svāhākṛtasya tṛmpataṃ sutasya devāv andhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1606: RV_8,035.24c ā yātam aśvinā gatam avasyur vām ahaṃ huve dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1607: RV_8,036.01a avitāsi sunvato vṛktabarhiṣaḥ pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:1608: RV_8,036.01c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1609: RV_8,036.02a prāva stotāram maghavann ava tvām pibā somam madāya kaṃ
GV01rv_hn08u:1611: RV_8,036.02c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1612: RV_8,036.03a ūrjā devāṃ avasy ojasā tvām pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:1613: RV_8,036.03c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1614: RV_8,036.04a janitā divo janitā pṛthivyāḥ pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato
GV01rv_hn08u:1615: RV_8,036.04c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1616: RV_8,036.05a janitāśvānāṃ janitā gavām asi pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato
GV01rv_hn08u:1617: RV_8,036.05c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1618: RV_8,036.06a atrīṇāṃ stomam adrivo mahas kṛdhi pibā somam madāya kaṃ
GV01rv_hn08u:1620: RV_8,036.06c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1621: RV_8,036.07a śyāvāśvasya sunvatas tathā śṛṇu yathāśṛṇor atreḥ karmāṇi kṛṇvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1622: RV_8,036.07c pra trasadasyum āvitha tvam eka in nṛṣāhya indra brahmāṇi
GV01rv_hn08u:1624: RV_8,037.01a predam brahma vṛtratūryeṣv āvitha pra sunvataḥ śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:1625: RV_8,037.01d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya
GV01rv_hn08u:1627: RV_8,037.02a sehāna ugra pṛtanā abhi druhaḥ śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1628: RV_8,037.02d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya
GV01rv_hn08u:1630: RV_8,037.03a ekarāḷ asya bhuvanasya rājasi śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1631: RV_8,037.03d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya
GV01rv_hn08u:1633: RV_8,037.04a sasthāvānā yavayasi tvam eka ic chacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1634: RV_8,037.04d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya
GV01rv_hn08u:1636: RV_8,037.05a kṣemasya ca prayujaś ca tvam īśiṣe śacīpata indra viśvābhir
GV01rv_hn08u:1638: RV_8,037.05d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya
GV01rv_hn08u:1640: RV_8,037.06a kṣatrāya tvam avasi na tvam āvitha śacīpata indra viśvābhir
GV01rv_hn08u:1642: RV_8,037.06d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya
GV01rv_hn08u:1644: RV_8,037.07a śyāvāśvasya rebhatas tathā śṛṇu yathāśṛṇor atreḥ karmāṇi kṛṇvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1645: RV_8,037.07c pra trasadasyum āvitha tvam eka in nṛṣāhya indra kṣatrāṇi
GV01rv_hn08u:1647: RV_8,038.01a yajñasya hi stha ṛtvijā sasnī vājeṣu karmasu |
GV01rv_hn08u:1651: RV_8,038.03a idaṃ vām madiram madhv adhukṣann adribhir naraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1653: RV_8,038.04a juṣethāṃ yajñam iṣṭaye sutaṃ somaṃ sadhastutī |
GV01rv_hn08u:1655: RV_8,038.05a imā juṣethāṃ savanā yebhir havyāny ūhathuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1657: RV_8,038.06a imāṃ gāyatravartaniṃ juṣethāṃ suṣṭutim mama |
GV01rv_hn08u:1659: RV_8,038.07a prātaryāvabhir ā gataṃ devebhir jenyāvasū |
GV01rv_hn08u:1663: RV_8,038.09a evā vām ahva ūtaye yathāhuvanta medhirāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1665: RV_8,038.10a āhaṃ sarasvatīvator indrāgnyor avo vṛṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1667: RV_8,039.01a agnim astoṣy ṛgmiyam agnim īḷā yajadhyai |
GV01rv_hn08u:1668: RV_8,039.01c agnir devāṃ anaktu na ubhe hi vidathe kavir antaś carati dūtyaṃ nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1669: RV_8,039.02a ny agne navyasā vacas tanūṣu śaṃsam eṣām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1670: RV_8,039.02c ny arātī rarāvṇāṃ viśvā aryo arātīr ito yucchantv āmuro
GV01rv_hn08u:1672: RV_8,039.03a agne manmāni tubhyaṃ kaṃ ghṛtaṃ na juhva āsani |
GV01rv_hn08u:1673: RV_8,039.03c sa deveṣu pra cikiddhi tvaṃ hy asi pūrvyaḥ śivo dūto vivasvato nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1674: RV_8,039.04a tat-tad agnir vayo dadhe yathā-yathā kṛpaṇyati |
GV01rv_hn08u:1675: RV_8,039.04c ūrjāhutir vasūnāṃ śaṃ ca yoś ca mayo dadhe viśvasyai
GV01rv_hn08u:1677: RV_8,039.05a sa ciketa sahīyasāgniś citreṇa karmaṇā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1678: RV_8,039.05c sa hotā śaśvatīnāṃ dakṣiṇābhir abhīvṛta inoti ca pratīvyaṃ nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1679: RV_8,039.06a agnir jātā devānām agnir veda martānām apīcyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1680: RV_8,039.06c agniḥ sa draviṇodā agnir dvārā vy ūrṇute svāhuto navīyasā
GV01rv_hn08u:1682: RV_8,039.07a agnir deveṣu saṃvasuḥ sa vikṣu yajñiyāsv ā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1683: RV_8,039.07c sa mudā kāvyā puru viśvam bhūmeva puṣyati devo deveṣu yajñiyo nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1684: RV_8,039.08a yo agniḥ saptamānuṣaḥ śrito viśveṣu sindhuṣu |
GV01rv_hn08u:1685: RV_8,039.08c tam āganma tripastyam mandhātur dasyuhantamam agniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyaṃ nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1686: RV_8,039.09a agnis trīṇi tridhātūny ā kṣeti vidathā kaviḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1687: RV_8,039.09c sa trīṃr ekādaśāṃ iha yakṣac ca piprayac ca no vipro dūtaḥ pariṣkṛto nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1688: RV_8,039.10a tvaṃ no agna āyuṣu tvaṃ deveṣu pūrvya vasva eka irajyasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:1689: RV_8,039.10d tvām āpaḥ parisrutaḥ pari yanti svasetavo nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1690: RV_8,040.01a indrāgnī yuvaṃ su naḥ sahantā dāsatho rayim |
GV01rv_hn08u:1691: RV_8,040.01c yena dṛḷhā samatsv ā vīḷu cit sāhiṣīmahy agnir vaneva vāta in nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1692: RV_8,040.02a nahi vāṃ vavrayāmahe 'thendram id yajāmahe śaviṣṭhaṃ nṛṇāṃ naram |
GV01rv_hn08u:1693: RV_8,040.02d sa naḥ kadā cid arvatā gamad ā vājasātaye gamad ā medhasātaye nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1694: RV_8,040.03a tā hi madhyam bharāṇām indrāgnī adhikṣitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1695: RV_8,040.03c tā u kavitvanā kavī pṛcchyamānā sakhīyate saṃ dhītam aśnutaṃ
GV01rv_hn08u:1697: RV_8,040.04a abhy arca nabhākavad indrāgnī yajasā girā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1698: RV_8,040.04c yayor viśvam idaṃ jagad iyaṃ dyauḥ pṛthivī mahy upasthe
GV01rv_hn08u:1700: RV_8,040.05a pra brahmāṇi nabhākavad indrāgnibhyām irajyata |
GV01rv_hn08u:1701: RV_8,040.05c yā saptabudhnam arṇavaṃ jihmabāram aporṇuta indra īśāna ojasā nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1702: RV_8,040.06a api vṛśca purāṇavad vratater iva guṣpitam ojo dāsasya dambhaya |
GV01rv_hn08u:1703: RV_8,040.06d vayaṃ tad asya sambhṛtaṃ vasv indreṇa vi bhajemahi nabhantām
GV01rv_hn08u:1705: RV_8,040.07a yad indrāgnī janā ime vihvayante tanā girā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1706: RV_8,040.07c asmākebhir nṛbhir vayaṃ sāsahyāma pṛtanyato vanuyāma
GV01rv_hn08u:1708: RV_8,040.08a yā nu śvetāv avo diva uccarāta upa dyubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1709: RV_8,040.08c indrāgnyor anu vratam uhānā yanti sindhavo yān sīm bandhād
GV01rv_hn08u:1711: RV_8,040.09a pūrvīṣ ṭa indropamātayaḥ pūrvīr uta praśastayaḥ sūno hinvasya harivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1712: RV_8,040.09d vasvo vīrasyāpṛco yā nu sādhanta no dhiyo nabhantām anyake
GV01rv_hn08u:1714: RV_8,040.10a taṃ śiśītā suvṛktibhis tveṣaṃ satvānam ṛgmiyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1715: RV_8,040.10c uto nu cid ya ojasā śuṣṇasyāṇḍāni bhedati jeṣat svarvatīr apo nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1716: RV_8,040.11a taṃ śiśītā svadhvaraṃ satyaṃ satvānam ṛtviyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1717: RV_8,040.11c uto nu cid ya ohata āṇḍā śuṣṇasya bhedaty ajaiḥ svarvatīr apo nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1718: RV_8,040.12a evendrāgnibhyām pitṛvan navīyo mandhātṛvad aṅgirasvad avāci |
GV01rv_hn08u:1719: RV_8,040.12c tridhātunā śarmaṇā pātam asmān vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1720: RV_8,041.01a asmā ū ṣu prabhūtaye varuṇāya marudbhyo 'rcā viduṣṭarebhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1721: RV_8,041.01d yo dhītā mānuṣāṇām paśvo gā iva rakṣati nabhantām anyake same
GV01rv_hn08u:1722: RV_8,041.02a tam ū ṣu samanā girā pitṝṇāṃ ca manmabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1723: RV_8,041.02c nābhākasya praśastibhir yaḥ sindhūnām upodaye saptasvasā sa madhyamo nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1724: RV_8,041.03a sa kṣapaḥ pari ṣasvaje ny usro māyayā dadhe sa viśvam pari darśataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1725: RV_8,041.03d tasya venīr anu vratam uṣas tisro avardhayan nabhantām anyake
GV01rv_hn08u:1727: RV_8,041.04a yaḥ kakubho nidhārayaḥ pṛthivyām adhi darśataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1728: RV_8,041.04c sa mātā pūrvyam padaṃ tad varuṇasya saptyaṃ sa hi gopā iveryo nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1729: RV_8,041.05a yo dhartā bhuvanānāṃ ya usrāṇām apīcyā veda nāmāni guhyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1730: RV_8,041.05d sa kaviḥ kāvyā puru rūpaṃ dyaur iva puṣyati nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1731: RV_8,041.06a yasmin viśvāni kāvyā cakre nābhir iva śritā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1732: RV_8,041.06c tritaṃ jūtī saparyata vraje gāvo na saṃyuje yuje aśvāṃ
GV01rv_hn08u:1734: RV_8,041.07a ya āsv atka āśaye viśvā jātāny eṣām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1735: RV_8,041.07c pari dhāmāni marmṛśad varuṇasya puro gaye viśve devā anu
GV01rv_hn08u:1737: RV_8,041.08a sa samudro apīcyas turo dyām iva rohati ni yad āsu yajur dadhe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1738: RV_8,041.08d sa māyā arcinā padāstṛṇān nākam āruhan nabhantām anyake same
GV01rv_hn08u:1739: RV_8,041.09a yasya śvetā vicakṣaṇā tisro bhūmīr adhikṣitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1740: RV_8,041.09c trir uttarāṇi papratur varuṇasya dhruvaṃ sadaḥ sa saptānām irajyati nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1741: RV_8,041.10a yaḥ śvetāṃ adhinirṇijaś cakre kṛṣṇāṃ anu vratā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1742: RV_8,041.10c sa dhāma pūrvyam mame ya skambhena vi rodasī ajo na dyām adhārayan nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1743: RV_8,042.01a astabhnād dyām asuro viśvavedā amimīta varimāṇam pṛthivyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1744: RV_8,042.01c āsīdad viśvā bhuvanāni samrāḍ viśvet tāni varuṇasya vratāni ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1745: RV_8,042.02a evā vandasva varuṇam bṛhantaṃ namasyā dhīram amṛtasya gopām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1746: RV_8,042.02c sa naḥ śarma trivarūthaṃ vi yaṃsat pātaṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī
GV01rv_hn08u:1748: RV_8,042.03a imāṃ dhiyaṃ śikṣamāṇasya deva kratuṃ dakṣaṃ varuṇa saṃ śiśādhi |
GV01rv_hn08u:1749: RV_8,042.03c yayāti viśvā duritā tarema sutarmāṇam adhi nāvaṃ ruhema ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1750: RV_8,042.04a ā vāṃ grāvāṇo aśvinā dhībhir viprā acucyavuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1751: RV_8,042.04c nāsatyā somapītaye nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1752: RV_8,042.05a yathā vām atrir aśvinā gīrbhir vipro ajohavīt |
GV01rv_hn08u:1753: RV_8,042.05c nāsatyā somapītaye nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1754: RV_8,042.06a evā vām ahva ūtaye yathāhuvanta medhirāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1755: RV_8,042.06c nāsatyā somapītaye nabhantām anyake same ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1758: RV_8,043.02a asmai te pratiharyate jātavedo vicarṣaṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:1760: RV_8,043.03a ārokā iva ghed aha tigmā agne tava tviṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1762: RV_8,043.04a harayo dhūmaketavo vātajūtā upa dyavi |
GV01rv_hn08u:1764: RV_8,043.05a ete tye vṛthag agnaya iddhāsaḥ sam adṛkṣata |
GV01rv_hn08u:1766: RV_8,043.06a kṛṣṇā rajāṃsi patsutaḥ prayāṇe jātavedasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1768: RV_8,043.07a dhāsiṃ kṛṇvāna oṣadhīr bapsad agnir na vāyati |
GV01rv_hn08u:1770: RV_8,043.08a jihvābhir aha nannamad arciṣā jañjaṇābhavan |
GV01rv_hn08u:1772: RV_8,043.09a apsv agne sadhiṣ ṭava sauṣadhīr anu rudhyase |
GV01rv_hn08u:1774: RV_8,043.10a ud agne tava tad ghṛtād arcī rocata āhutam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1778: RV_8,043.12a uta tvā namasā vayaṃ hotar vareṇyakrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:1780: RV_8,043.13a uta tvā bhṛguvac chuce manuṣvad agna āhuta |
GV01rv_hn08u:1782: RV_8,043.14a tvaṃ hy agne agninā vipro vipreṇa san satā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1784: RV_8,043.15a sa tvaṃ viprāya dāśuṣe rayiṃ dehi sahasriṇam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1786: RV_8,043.16a agne bhrātaḥ sahaskṛta rohidaśva śucivrata |
GV01rv_hn08u:1788: RV_8,043.17a uta tvāgne mama stuto vāśrāya pratiharyate |
GV01rv_hn08u:1790: RV_8,043.18a tubhyaṃ tā aṅgirastama viśvāḥ sukṣitayaḥ pṛthak |
GV01rv_hn08u:1792: RV_8,043.19a agniṃ dhībhir manīṣiṇo medhirāso vipaścitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1794: RV_8,043.20a taṃ tvām ajmeṣu vājinaṃ tanvānā agne adhvaram |
GV01rv_hn08u:1796: RV_8,043.21a purutrā hi sadṛṅṅ asi viśo viśvā anu prabhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1798: RV_8,043.22a tam īḷiṣva ya āhuto 'gnir vibhrājate ghṛtaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1800: RV_8,043.23a taṃ tvā vayaṃ havāmahe śṛṇvantaṃ jātavedasam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1802: RV_8,043.24a viśāṃ rājānam adbhutam adhyakṣaṃ dharmaṇām imam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1803: RV_8,043.24c agnim īḷe sa u śravat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1804: RV_8,043.25a agniṃ viśvāyuvepasam maryaṃ na vājinaṃ hitam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1806: RV_8,043.26a ghnan mṛdhrāṇy apa dviṣo dahan rakṣāṃsi viśvahā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1808: RV_8,043.27a yaṃ tvā janāsa indhate manuṣvad aṅgirastama |
GV01rv_hn08u:1809: RV_8,043.27c agne sa bodhi me vacaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1810: RV_8,043.28a yad agne divijā asy apsujā vā sahaskṛta |
GV01rv_hn08u:1812: RV_8,043.29a tubhyaṃ ghet te janā ime viśvāḥ sukṣitayaḥ pṛthak |
GV01rv_hn08u:1814: RV_8,043.30a te ghed agne svādhyo 'hā viśvā nṛcakṣasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1816: RV_8,043.31a agnim mandram purupriyaṃ śīram pāvakaśociṣam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1818: RV_8,043.32a sa tvam agne vibhāvasuḥ sṛjan sūryo na raśmibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1820: RV_8,043.33a tat te sahasva īmahe dātraṃ yan nopadasyati |
GV01rv_hn08u:1824: RV_8,044.02a agne stomaṃ juṣasva me vardhasvānena manmanā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1826: RV_8,044.03a agniṃ dūtam puro dadhe havyavāham upa bruve |
GV01rv_hn08u:1828: RV_8,044.04a ut te bṛhanto arcayaḥ samidhānasya dīdivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1830: RV_8,044.05a upa tvā juhvo mama ghṛtācīr yantu haryata |
GV01rv_hn08u:1832: RV_8,044.06a mandraṃ hotāram ṛtvijaṃ citrabhānuṃ vibhāvasum |
GV01rv_hn08u:1833: RV_8,044.06c agnim īḷe sa u śravat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1834: RV_8,044.07a pratnaṃ hotāram īḍyaṃ juṣṭam agniṃ kavikratum |
GV01rv_hn08u:1838: RV_8,044.09a samidhāna u santya śukraśoca ihā vaha |
GV01rv_hn08u:1840: RV_8,044.10a vipraṃ hotāram adruhaṃ dhūmaketuṃ vibhāvasum |
GV01rv_hn08u:1842: RV_8,044.11a agne ni pāhi nas tvam prati ṣma deva rīṣataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1844: RV_8,044.12a agniḥ pratnena manmanā śumbhānas tanvaṃ svām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1846: RV_8,044.13a ūrjo napātam ā huve 'gnim pāvakaśociṣam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1848: RV_8,044.14a sa no mitramahas tvam agne śukreṇa śociṣā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1850: RV_8,044.15a yo agniṃ tanvo dame devam martaḥ saparyati |
GV01rv_hn08u:1852: RV_8,044.16a agnir mūrdhā divaḥ kakut patiḥ pṛthivyā ayam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1854: RV_8,044.17a ud agne śucayas tava śukrā bhrājanta īrate |
GV01rv_hn08u:1856: RV_8,044.18a īśiṣe vāryasya hi dātrasyāgne svarpatiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1858: RV_8,044.19a tvām agne manīṣiṇas tvāṃ hinvanti cittibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1860: RV_8,044.20a adabdhasya svadhāvato dūtasya rebhataḥ sadā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1862: RV_8,044.21a agniḥ śucivratatamaḥ śucir vipraḥ śuciḥ kaviḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1864: RV_8,044.22a uta tvā dhītayo mama giro vardhantu viśvahā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1866: RV_8,044.23a yad agne syām ahaṃ tvaṃ tvaṃ vā ghā syā aham |
GV01rv_hn08u:1868: RV_8,044.24a vasur vasupatir hi kam asy agne vibhāvasuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1870: RV_8,044.25a agne dhṛtavratāya te samudrāyeva sindhavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1872: RV_8,044.26a yuvānaṃ viśpatiṃ kaviṃ viśvādam puruvepasam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1874: RV_8,044.27a yajñānāṃ rathye vayaṃ tigmajambhāya vīḷave |
GV01rv_hn08u:1876: RV_8,044.28a ayam agne tve api jaritā bhūtu santya |
GV01rv_hn08u:1878: RV_8,044.29a dhīro hy asy admasad vipro na jāgṛviḥ sadā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1880: RV_8,044.30a purāgne duritebhyaḥ purā mṛdhrebhyaḥ kave |
GV01rv_hn08u:1881: RV_8,044.30c pra ṇa āyur vaso tira ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1882: RV_8,045.01a ā ghā ye agnim indhate stṛṇanti barhir ānuṣak |
GV01rv_hn08u:1884: RV_8,045.02a bṛhann id idhma eṣām bhūri śastam pṛthuḥ svaruḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1886: RV_8,045.03a ayuddha id yudhā vṛtaṃ śūra ājati satvabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1888: RV_8,045.04a ā bundaṃ vṛtrahā dade jātaḥ pṛcchad vi mātaram |
GV01rv_hn08u:1889: RV_8,045.04c ka ugrāḥ ke ha śṛṇvire ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1890: RV_8,045.05a prati tvā śavasī vadad girāv apso na yodhiṣat |
GV01rv_hn08u:1892: RV_8,045.06a uta tvam maghavañ chṛṇu yas te vaṣṭi vavakṣi tat |
GV01rv_hn08u:1894: RV_8,045.07a yad ājiṃ yāty ājikṛd indraḥ svaśvayur upa |
GV01rv_hn08u:1896: RV_8,045.08a vi ṣu viśvā abhiyujo vajrin viṣvag yathā vṛha |
GV01rv_hn08u:1898: RV_8,045.09a asmākaṃ su ratham pura indraḥ kṛṇotu sātaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:1900: RV_8,045.10a vṛjyāma te pari dviṣo 'raṃ te śakra dāvane |
GV01rv_hn08u:1902: RV_8,045.11a śanaiś cid yanto adrivo 'śvāvantaḥ śatagvinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1904: RV_8,045.12a ūrdhvā hi te dive-dive sahasrā sūnṛtā śatā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1906: RV_8,045.13a vidmā hi tvā dhanañjayam indra dṛḷhā cid ārujam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1908: RV_8,045.14a kakuhaṃ cit tvā kave mandantu dhṛṣṇav indavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1909: RV_8,045.14c ā tvā paṇiṃ yad īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1910: RV_8,045.15a yas te revāṃ adāśuriḥ pramamarṣa maghattaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:1911: RV_8,045.15c tasya no veda ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1912: RV_8,045.16a ima u tvā vi cakṣate sakhāya indra sominaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1914: RV_8,045.17a uta tvābadhiraṃ vayaṃ śrutkarṇaṃ santam ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:1916: RV_8,045.18a yac chuśrūyā imaṃ havaṃ durmarṣaṃ cakriyā uta |
GV01rv_hn08u:1918: RV_8,045.19a yac cid dhi te api vyathir jaganvāṃso amanmahi |
GV01rv_hn08u:1919: RV_8,045.19c godā id indra bodhi naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1920: RV_8,045.20a ā tvā rambhaṃ na jivrayo rarabhmā śavasas pate |
GV01rv_hn08u:1922: RV_8,045.21a stotram indrāya gāyata purunṛmṇāya satvane |
GV01rv_hn08u:1924: RV_8,045.22a abhi tvā vṛṣabhā sute sutaṃ sṛjāmi pītaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:1926: RV_8,045.23a mā tvā mūrā aviṣyavo mopahasvāna ā dabhan |
GV01rv_hn08u:1928: RV_8,045.24a iha tvā goparīṇasā mahe mandantu rādhase |
GV01rv_hn08u:1930: RV_8,045.25a yā vṛtrahā parāvati sanā navā ca cucyuve |
GV01rv_hn08u:1932: RV_8,045.26a apibat kadruvaḥ sutam indraḥ sahasrabāhve |
GV01rv_hn08u:1934: RV_8,045.27a satyaṃ tat turvaśe yadau vidāno ahnavāyyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1936: RV_8,045.28a taraṇiṃ vo janānāṃ tradaṃ vājasya gomataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1938: RV_8,045.29a ṛbhukṣaṇaṃ na vartava uktheṣu tugryāvṛdham |
GV01rv_hn08u:1940: RV_8,045.30a yaḥ kṛntad id vi yonyaṃ triśokāya girim pṛthum |
GV01rv_hn08u:1942: RV_8,045.31a yad dadhiṣe manasyasi mandānaḥ pred iyakṣasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:1943: RV_8,045.31c mā tat kar indra mṛḷaya ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1944: RV_8,045.32a dabhraṃ cid dhi tvāvataḥ kṛtaṃ śṛṇve adhi kṣami |
GV01rv_hn08u:1946: RV_8,045.33a taved u tāḥ sukīrtayo 'sann uta praśastayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1948: RV_8,045.34a mā na ekasminn āgasi mā dvayor uta triṣu |
GV01rv_hn08u:1950: RV_8,045.35a bibhayā hi tvāvata ugrād abhiprabhaṅgiṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1952: RV_8,045.36a mā sakhyuḥ śūnam ā vide mā putrasya prabhūvaso |
GV01rv_hn08u:1954: RV_8,045.37a ko nu maryā amithitaḥ sakhā sakhāyam abravīt |
GV01rv_hn08u:1956: RV_8,045.38a evāre vṛṣabhā sute 'sinvan bhūry āvayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1958: RV_8,045.39a ā ta etā vacoyujā harī gṛbhṇe sumadrathā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1959: RV_8,045.39c yad īm brahmabhya id dadaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1960: RV_8,045.40a bhindhi viśvā apa dviṣaḥ pari bādho jahī mṛdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1961: RV_8,045.40c vasu spārhaṃ tad ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1962: RV_8,045.41a yad vīḷāv indra yat sthire yat parśāne parābhṛtam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1963: RV_8,045.41c vasu spārhaṃ tad ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1964: RV_8,045.42a yasya te viśvamānuṣo bhūrer dattasya vedati |
GV01rv_hn08u:1965: RV_8,045.42c vasu spārhaṃ tad ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1966: RV_8,046.01a tvāvataḥ purūvaso vayam indra praṇetaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1968: RV_8,046.02a tvāṃ hi satyam adrivo vidma dātāram iṣām |
GV01rv_hn08u:1970: RV_8,046.03a ā yasya te mahimānaṃ śatamūte śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:1972: RV_8,046.04a sunītho ghā sa martyo yam maruto yam aryamā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1974: RV_8,046.05a dadhāno gomad aśvavat suvīryam ādityajūta edhate |
GV01rv_hn08u:1976: RV_8,046.06a tam indraṃ dānam īmahe śavasānam abhīrvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1978: RV_8,046.07a tasmin hi santy ūtayo viśvā abhīravaḥ sacā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1979: RV_8,046.07c tam ā vahantu saptayaḥ purūvasum madāya harayaḥ sutam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1980: RV_8,046.08a yas te mado vareṇyo ya indra vṛtrahantamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1981: RV_8,046.08c ya ādadiḥ svar nṛbhir yaḥ pṛtanāsu duṣṭaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1982: RV_8,046.09a yo duṣṭaro viśvavāra śravāyyo vājeṣv asti tarutā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1983: RV_8,046.09c sa naḥ śaviṣṭha savanā vaso gahi gamema gomati vraje ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1984: RV_8,046.10a gavyo ṣu ṇo yathā purāśvayota rathayā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1986: RV_8,046.11a nahi te śūra rādhaso 'ntaṃ vindāmi satrā |
GV01rv_hn08u:1987: RV_8,046.11c daśasyā no maghavan nū cid adrivo dhiyo vājebhir āvitha ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1988: RV_8,046.12a ya ṛṣvaḥ śrāvayatsakhā viśvet sa veda janimā puruṣṭutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1989: RV_8,046.12c taṃ viśve mānuṣā yugendraṃ havante taviṣaṃ yatasrucaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1990: RV_8,046.13a sa no vājeṣv avitā purūvasuḥ purasthātā maghavā vṛtrahā bhuvat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1991: RV_8,046.14a abhi vo vīram andhaso madeṣu gāya girā mahā vicetasam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1992: RV_8,046.14c indraṃ nāma śrutyaṃ śākinaṃ vaco yathā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1993: RV_8,046.15a dadī rekṇas tanve dadir vasu dadir vājeṣu puruhūta vājinam |
GV01rv_hn08u:1995: RV_8,046.16a viśveṣām irajyantaṃ vasūnāṃ sāsahvāṃsaṃ cid asya varpasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:1997: RV_8,046.17a mahaḥ su vo aram iṣe stavāmahe mīḷhuṣe araṅgamāya jagmaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:1998: RV_8,046.17c yajñebhir gīrbhir viśvamanuṣām marutām iyakṣasi gāye tvā namasā girā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:1999: RV_8,046.18a ye pātayante ajmabhir girīṇāṃ snubhir eṣām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2000: RV_8,046.18c yajñam mahiṣvaṇīnāṃ sumnaṃ tuviṣvaṇīnām prādhvare ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2001: RV_8,046.19a prabhaṅgaṃ durmatīnām indra śaviṣṭhā bhara |
GV01rv_hn08u:2002: RV_8,046.19c rayim asmabhyaṃ yujyaṃ codayanmate jyeṣṭhaṃ codayanmate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2003: RV_8,046.20a sanitaḥ susanitar ugra citra cetiṣṭha sūnṛta |
GV01rv_hn08u:2004: RV_8,046.20c prāsahā samrāṭ sahuriṃ sahantam bhujyuṃ vājeṣu pūrvyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2005: RV_8,046.21a ā sa etu ya īvad āṃ adevaḥ pūrtam ādade |
GV01rv_hn08u:2006: RV_8,046.21c yathā cid vaśo aśvyaḥ pṛthuśravasi kānīte 'syā vyuṣy ādade ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2007: RV_8,046.22a ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāśvyasyāyutāsanam uṣṭrānāṃ viṃśatiṃ śatā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2008: RV_8,046.22c daśa śyāvīnāṃ śatā daśa tryaruṣīṇāṃ daśa gavāṃ sahasrā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2009: RV_8,046.23a daśa śyāvā ṛdhadrayo vītavārāsa āśavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2012: RV_8,046.24c rathaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ dadan maṃhiṣṭhaḥ sūrir abhūd varṣiṣṭham akṛta śravaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2013: RV_8,046.25a ā no vāyo mahe tane yāhi makhāya pājase |
GV01rv_hn08u:2014: RV_8,046.25c vayaṃ hi te cakṛmā bhūri dāvane sadyaś cin mahi dāvane ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2015: RV_8,046.26a yo aśvebhir vahate vasta usrās triḥ sapta saptatīnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2016: RV_8,046.26c ebhiḥ somebhiḥ somasudbhiḥ somapā dānāya śukrapūtapāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2017: RV_8,046.27a yo ma imaṃ cid u tmanāmandac citraṃ dāvane |
GV01rv_hn08u:2018: RV_8,046.27c araṭve akṣe nahuṣe sukṛtvani sukṛttarāya sukratuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2019: RV_8,046.28a ucathye vapuṣi yaḥ svarāḷ uta vāyo ghṛtasnāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2020: RV_8,046.28c aśveṣitaṃ rajeṣitaṃ śuneṣitam prājma tad idaṃ nu tat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2021: RV_8,046.29a adha priyam iṣirāya ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāsanam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2023: RV_8,046.30a gāvo na yūtham upa yanti vadhraya upa mā yanti vadhrayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2024: RV_8,046.31a adha yac cārathe gaṇe śatam uṣṭrāṃ acikradat |
GV01rv_hn08u:2026: RV_8,046.32a śataṃ dāse balbūthe vipras tarukṣa ā dade |
GV01rv_hn08u:2027: RV_8,046.32c te te vāyav ime janā madantīndragopā madanti devagopāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2028: RV_8,046.33a adha syā yoṣaṇā mahī pratīcī vaśam aśvyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2030: RV_8,047.01a mahi vo mahatām avo varuṇa mitra dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2031: RV_8,047.01c yam ādityā abhi druho rakṣathā nem aghaṃ naśad anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2032: RV_8,047.02a vidā devā aghānām ādityāso apākṛtim |
GV01rv_hn08u:2033: RV_8,047.02c pakṣā vayo yathopari vy asme śarma yacchatānehaso va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2035: RV_8,047.03a vy asme adhi śarma tat pakṣā vayo na yantana |
GV01rv_hn08u:2036: RV_8,047.03c viśvāni viśvavedaso varūthyā manāmahe 'nehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2037: RV_8,047.04a yasmā arāsata kṣayaṃ jīvātuṃ ca pracetasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2038: RV_8,047.04c manor viśvasya ghed ima ādityā rāya īśate 'nehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2039: RV_8,047.05a pari ṇo vṛṇajann aghā durgāṇi rathyo yathā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2040: RV_8,047.05c syāmed indrasya śarmaṇy ādityānām utāvasy anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2041: RV_8,047.06a parihvṛted anā jano yuṣmādattasya vāyati |
GV01rv_hn08u:2042: RV_8,047.06c devā adabhram āśa vo yam ādityā ahetanānehaso va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2044: RV_8,047.07a na taṃ tigmaṃ cana tyajo na drāsad abhi taṃ guru |
GV01rv_hn08u:2045: RV_8,047.07c yasmā u śarma sapratha ādityāso arādhvam anehaso va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2047: RV_8,047.08a yuṣme devā api ṣmasi yudhyanta iva varmasu |
GV01rv_hn08u:2048: RV_8,047.08c yūyam maho na enaso yūyam arbhād uruṣyatānehaso va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2050: RV_8,047.09a aditir na uruṣyatv aditiḥ śarma yacchatu |
GV01rv_hn08u:2051: RV_8,047.09c mātā mitrasya revato 'ryamṇo varuṇasya cānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2052: RV_8,047.10a yad devāḥ śarma śaraṇaṃ yad bhadraṃ yad anāturam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2053: RV_8,047.10c tridhātu yad varūthyaṃ tad asmāsu vi yantanānehaso va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2055: RV_8,047.11a ādityā ava hi khyatādhi kūlād iva spaśaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2056: RV_8,047.11c sutīrtham arvato yathānu no neṣathā sugam anehaso va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2058: RV_8,047.12a neha bhadraṃ rakṣasvine nāvayai nopayā uta |
GV01rv_hn08u:2059: RV_8,047.12c gave ca bhadraṃ dhenave vīrāya ca śravasyate 'nehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2060: RV_8,047.13a yad āvir yad apīcyaṃ devāso asti duṣkṛtam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2061: RV_8,047.13c trite tad viśvam āptya āre asmad dadhātanānehaso va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2063: RV_8,047.14a yac ca goṣu duṣṣvapnyaṃ yac cāsme duhitar divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2064: RV_8,047.14c tritāya tad vibhāvary āptyāya parā vahānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2065: RV_8,047.15a niṣkaṃ vā ghā kṛṇavate srajaṃ vā duhitar divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2066: RV_8,047.15c trite duṣṣvapnyaṃ sarvam āptye pari dadmasy anehaso va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2068: RV_8,047.16a tadannāya tadapase tam bhāgam upaseduṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2069: RV_8,047.16c tritāya ca dvitāya coṣo duṣṣvapnyaṃ vahānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2070: RV_8,047.17a yathā kalāṃ yathā śaphaṃ yatha ṛṇaṃ saṃnayāmasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2071: RV_8,047.17c evā duṣṣvapnyaṃ sarvam āptye saṃ nayāmasy anehaso va ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2074: RV_8,047.18c uṣo yasmād duṣṣvapnyād abhaiṣmāpa tad ucchatv anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2075: RV_8,048.01a svādor abhakṣi vayasaḥ sumedhāḥ svādhyo varivovittarasya |
GV01rv_hn08u:2076: RV_8,048.01c viśve yaṃ devā uta martyāso madhu bruvanto abhi saṃcaranti ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2077: RV_8,048.02a antaś ca prāgā aditir bhavāsy avayātā haraso daivyasya |
GV01rv_hn08u:2078: RV_8,048.02c indav indrasya sakhyaṃ juṣāṇaḥ śrauṣṭīva dhuram anu rāya ṛdhyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2079: RV_8,048.03a apāma somam amṛtā abhūmāganma jyotir avidāma devān |
GV01rv_hn08u:2080: RV_8,048.03c kiṃ nūnam asmān kṛṇavad arātiḥ kim u dhūrtir amṛta martyasya
GV01rv_hn08u:2081: RV_8,048.04a śaṃ no bhava hṛda ā pīta indo piteva soma sūnave suśevaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2082: RV_8,048.04c sakheva sakhya uruśaṃsa dhīraḥ pra ṇa āyur jīvase soma tārīḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2083: RV_8,048.05a ime mā pītā yaśasa uruṣyavo rathaṃ na gāvaḥ sam anāha parvasu |
GV01rv_hn08u:2084: RV_8,048.05c te mā rakṣantu visrasaś caritrād uta mā srāmād yavayantv
GV01rv_hn08u:2086: RV_8,048.06a agniṃ na mā mathitaṃ saṃ didīpaḥ pra cakṣaya kṛṇuhi vasyaso naḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2087: RV_8,048.06c athā hi te mada ā soma manye revāṃ iva pra carā puṣṭim accha
GV01rv_hn08u:2088: RV_8,048.07a iṣireṇa te manasā sutasya bhakṣīmahi pitryasyeva rāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2089: RV_8,048.07c soma rājan pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tārīr ahānīva sūryo vāsarāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2090: RV_8,048.08a soma rājan mṛḷayā naḥ svasti tava smasi vratyās tasya viddhi
GV01rv_hn08u:2091: RV_8,048.08c alarti dakṣa uta manyur indo mā no aryo anukāmam parā dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2092: RV_8,048.09a tvaṃ hi nas tanvaḥ soma gopā gātre-gātre niṣasatthā nṛcakṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2093: RV_8,048.09c yat te vayam pramināma vratāni sa no mṛḷa suṣakhā deva vasyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2094: RV_8,048.10a ṛdūdareṇa sakhyā saceya yo mā na riṣyed dharyaśva pītaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2095: RV_8,048.10c ayaṃ yaḥ somo ny adhāyy asme tasmā indram pratiram emy āyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2096: RV_8,048.11a apa tyā asthur anirā amīvā nir atrasan tamiṣīcīr abhaiṣuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2097: RV_8,048.11c ā somo asmāṃ aruhad vihāyā aganma yatra pratiranta āyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2098: RV_8,048.12a yo na induḥ pitaro hṛtsu pīto 'martyo martyāṃ āviveśa |
GV01rv_hn08u:2099: RV_8,048.12c tasmai somāya haviṣā vidhema mṛḷīke asya sumatau syāma ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2100: RV_8,048.13a tvaṃ soma pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidāno 'nu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatantha |
GV01rv_hn08u:2101: RV_8,048.13c tasmai ta indo haviṣā vidhema vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2102: RV_8,048.14a trātāro devā adhi vocatā no mā no nidrā īśata mota jalpiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2103: RV_8,048.14c vayaṃ somasya viśvaha priyāsaḥ suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2104: RV_8,048.15a tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato vayodhās tvaṃ svarvid ā viśā nṛcakṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2105: RV_8,048.15c tvaṃ na inda ūtibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ pāhi paścātād uta vā purastāt ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2106: RV_8,049.01a abhi pra vaḥ surādhasam indram arca yathā vide |
GV01rv_hn08u:2107: RV_8,049.01c yo jaritṛbhyo maghavā purūvasuḥ sahasreṇeva śikṣati ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2108: RV_8,049.02a śatānīkeva pra jigāti dhṛṣṇuyā hanti vṛtrāṇi dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2109: RV_8,049.02c girer iva pra rasā asya pinvire datrāṇi purubhojasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2110: RV_8,049.03a ā tvā sutāsa indavo madā ya indra girvaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2111: RV_8,049.03c āpo na vajrinn anv okyaṃ saraḥ pṛṇanti śūra rādhase ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2112: RV_8,049.04a anehasam prataraṇaṃ vivakṣaṇam madhvaḥ svādiṣṭham īm piba |
GV01rv_hn08u:2113: RV_8,049.04c ā yathā mandasānaḥ kirāsi naḥ pra kṣudreva tmanā dhṛṣat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2114: RV_8,049.05a ā na stomam upa dravad dhiyāno aśvo na sotṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2115: RV_8,049.05c yaṃ te svadhāvan svadayanti dhenava indra kaṇveṣu rātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2116: RV_8,049.06a ugraṃ na vīraṃ namasopa sedima vibhūtim akṣitāvasum |
GV01rv_hn08u:2117: RV_8,049.06c udrīva vajrinn avato na siñcate kṣarantīndra dhītayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2118: RV_8,049.07a yad dha nūnaṃ yad vā yajñe yad vā pṛthivyām adhi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2119: RV_8,049.07c ato no yajñam āśubhir mahemata ugra ugrebhir ā gahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2120: RV_8,049.08a ajirāso harayo ye ta āśavo vātā iva prasakṣiṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2121: RV_8,049.08c yebhir apatyam manuṣaḥ parīyase yebhir viśvaṃ svar dṛśe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2122: RV_8,049.09a etāvatas ta īmaha indra sumnasya gomataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2123: RV_8,049.09c yathā prāvo maghavan medhyātithiṃ yathā nīpātithiṃ dhane ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2124: RV_8,049.10a yathā kaṇve maghavan trasadasyavi yathā pakthe daśavraje |
GV01rv_hn08u:2125: RV_8,049.10c yathā gośarye asanor ṛjiśvanīndra gomad dhiraṇyavat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2126: RV_8,050.01a pra su śrutaṃ surādhasam arcā śakram abhiṣṭaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:2127: RV_8,050.01c yaḥ sunvate stuvate kāmyaṃ vasu sahasreṇeva maṃhate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2128: RV_8,050.02a śatānīkā hetayo asya duṣṭarā indrasya samiṣo mahīḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2129: RV_8,050.02c girir na bhujmā maghavatsu pinvate yad īṃ sutā amandiṣuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2130: RV_8,050.03a yad īṃ sutāsa indavo 'bhi priyam amandiṣuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2131: RV_8,050.03c āpo na dhāyi savanam ma ā vaso dughā ivopa dāśuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2132: RV_8,050.04a anehasaṃ vo havamānam ūtaye madhvaḥ kṣaranti dhītayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2133: RV_8,050.04c ā tvā vaso havamānāsa indava upa stotreṣu dadhire ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2134: RV_8,050.05a ā naḥ some svadhvara iyāno atyo na tośate |
GV01rv_hn08u:2135: RV_8,050.05c yaṃ te svadāvan svadanti gūrtayaḥ paure chandayase havam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2136: RV_8,050.06a pra vīram ugraṃ viviciṃ dhanaspṛtaṃ vibhūtiṃ rādhaso mahaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2137: RV_8,050.06c udrīva vajrinn avato vasutvanā sadā pīpetha dāśuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2138: RV_8,050.07a yad dha nūnam parāvati yad vā pṛthivyāṃ divi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2139: RV_8,050.07c yujāna indra haribhir mahemata ṛṣva ṛṣvebhir ā gahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2140: RV_8,050.08a rathirāso harayo ye te asridha ojo vātasya piprati |
GV01rv_hn08u:2141: RV_8,050.08c yebhir ni dasyum manuṣo nighoṣayo yebhiḥ svaḥ parīyase ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2142: RV_8,050.09a etāvatas te vaso vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2143: RV_8,050.09c yathā prāva etaśaṃ kṛtvye dhane yathā vaśaṃ daśavraje ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2144: RV_8,050.10a yathā kaṇve maghavan medhe adhvare dīrghanīthe damūnasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2145: RV_8,050.10c yathā gośarye asiṣāso adrivo mayi gotraṃ hariśriyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2146: RV_8,051.01a yathā manau sāṃvaraṇau somam indrāpibaḥ sutam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2147: RV_8,051.01c nīpātithau maghavan medhyātithau puṣṭigau śruṣṭigau sacā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2148: RV_8,051.02a pārṣadvāṇaḥ praskaṇvaṃ sam asādayac chayānaṃ jivrim uddhitam
GV01rv_hn08u:2149: RV_8,051.02c sahasrāṇy asiṣāsad gavām ṛṣis tvoto dasyave vṛkaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2150: RV_8,051.03a ya ukthebhir na vindhate cikid ya ṛṣicodanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2151: RV_8,051.03c indraṃ tam acchā vada navyasyā maty ariṣyantaṃ na bhojase ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2152: RV_8,051.04a yasmā arkaṃ saptaśīrṣāṇam ānṛcus tridhātum uttame pade |
GV01rv_hn08u:2153: RV_8,051.04c sa tv imā viśvā bhuvanāni cikradad ād ij janiṣṭa pauṃsyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2154: RV_8,051.05a yo no dātā vasūnām indraṃ taṃ hūmahe vayam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2155: RV_8,051.05c vidmā hy asya sumatiṃ navīyasīṃ gamema gomati vraje ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2156: RV_8,051.06a yasmai tvaṃ vaso dānāya śikṣasi sa rāyas poṣam aśnute |
GV01rv_hn08u:2157: RV_8,051.06c taṃ tvā vayam maghavann indra girvaṇaḥ sutāvanto havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2158: RV_8,051.07a kadā cana starīr asi nendra saścasi dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2159: RV_8,051.07c upopen nu maghavan bhūya in nu te dānaṃ devasya pṛcyate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2160: RV_8,051.08a pra yo nanakṣe abhy ojasā kriviṃ vadhaiḥ śuṣṇaṃ nighoṣayan |
GV01rv_hn08u:2161: RV_8,051.08c yaded astambhīt prathayann amūṃ divam ād ij janiṣṭa pārthivaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2162: RV_8,051.09a yasyāyaṃ viśva āryo dāsaḥ śevadhipā ariḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2163: RV_8,051.09c tiraś cid arye ruśame parīravi tubhyet so ajyate rayiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2164: RV_8,051.10a turaṇyavo madhumantaṃ ghṛtaścutaṃ viprāso arkam ānṛcuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2165: RV_8,051.10c asme rayiḥ paprathe vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo 'sme suvānāsa indavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2166: RV_8,052.01a yathā manau vivasvati somaṃ śakrāpibaḥ sutam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2167: RV_8,052.01c yathā trite chanda indra jujoṣasy āyau mādayase sacā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2168: RV_8,052.02a pṛṣadhre medhye mātariśvanīndra suvāne amandathāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2169: RV_8,052.02c yathā somaṃ daśaśipre daśoṇye syūmaraśmāv ṛjūnasi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2170: RV_8,052.03a ya ukthā kevalā dadhe yaḥ somaṃ dhṛṣitāpibat |
GV01rv_hn08u:2171: RV_8,052.03c yasmai viṣṇus trīṇi padā vicakrama upa mitrasya dharmabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2172: RV_8,052.04a yasya tvam indra stomeṣu cākano vāje vājiñ chatakrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:2173: RV_8,052.04c taṃ tvā vayaṃ sudughām iva goduho juhūmasi śravasyavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2174: RV_8,052.05a yo no dātā sa naḥ pitā mahāṃ ugra īśānakṛt |
GV01rv_hn08u:2175: RV_8,052.05c ayāmann ugro maghavā purūvasur gor aśvasya pra dātu naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2176: RV_8,052.06a yasmai tvaṃ vaso dānāya maṃhase sa rāyas poṣam invati |
GV01rv_hn08u:2177: RV_8,052.06c vasūyavo vasupatiṃ śatakratuṃ stomair indraṃ havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2178: RV_8,052.07a kadā cana pra yucchasy ubhe ni pāsi janmanī |
GV01rv_hn08u:2179: RV_8,052.07c turīyāditya havanaṃ ta indriyam ā tasthāv amṛtaṃ divi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2180: RV_8,052.08a yasmai tvam maghavann indra girvaṇaḥ śikṣo śikṣasi dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2181: RV_8,052.08c asmākaṃ gira uta suṣṭutiṃ vaso kaṇvavac chṛṇudhī havam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2182: RV_8,052.09a astāvi manma pūrvyam brahmendrāya vocata |
GV01rv_hn08u:2183: RV_8,052.09c pūrvīr ṛtasya bṛhatīr anūṣata stotur medhā asṛkṣata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2184: RV_8,052.10a sam indro rāyo bṛhatīr adhūnuta saṃ kṣoṇī sam u sūryam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2185: RV_8,052.10c saṃ śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ saṃ gavāśiraḥ somā indram amandiṣuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2186: RV_8,053.01a upamaṃ tvā maghonāṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ ca vṛṣabhāṇām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2187: RV_8,053.01c pūrbhittamam maghavann indra govidam īśānaṃ rāya īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2188: RV_8,053.02a ya āyuṃ kutsam atithigvam ardayo vāvṛdhāno dive-dive |
GV01rv_hn08u:2189: RV_8,053.02c taṃ tvā vayaṃ haryaśvaṃ śatakratuṃ vājayanto havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2190: RV_8,053.03a ā no viśveṣāṃ rasam madhvaḥ siñcantv adrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2191: RV_8,053.03c ye parāvati sunvire janeṣv ā ye arvāvatīndavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2192: RV_8,053.04a viśvā dveṣāṃsi jahi cāva cā kṛdhi viśve sanvantv ā vasu |
GV01rv_hn08u:2193: RV_8,053.04c śīṣṭeṣu cit te madirāso aṃśavo yatrā somasya tṛmpasi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2194: RV_8,053.05a indra nedīya ed ihi mitamedhābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2195: RV_8,053.05c ā śantama śantamābhir abhiṣṭibhir ā svāpe svāpibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2196: RV_8,053.06a ājituraṃ satpatiṃ viśvacarṣaṇiṃ kṛdhi prajāsv ābhagam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2197: RV_8,053.06c pra sū tirā śacībhir ye ta ukthinaḥ kratum punata ānuṣak ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2198: RV_8,053.07a yas te sādhiṣṭho 'vase te syāma bhareṣu te |
GV01rv_hn08u:2199: RV_8,053.07c vayaṃ hotrābhir uta devahūtibhiḥ sasavāṃso manāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2200: RV_8,053.08a ahaṃ hi te harivo brahma vājayur ājiṃ yāmi sadotibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2201: RV_8,053.08c tvām id eva tam ame sam aśvayur gavyur agre mathīnām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2202: RV_8,054.01a etat ta indra vīryaṃ gīrbhir gṛṇanti kāravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2203: RV_8,054.01c te stobhanta ūrjam āvan ghṛtaścutam paurāso nakṣan dhītibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2204: RV_8,054.02a nakṣanta indram avase sukṛtyayā yeṣāṃ suteṣu mandase |
GV01rv_hn08u:2205: RV_8,054.02c yathā saṃvarte amado yathā kṛśa evāsme indra matsva ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2206: RV_8,054.03a ā no viśve sajoṣaso devāso gantanopa naḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2207: RV_8,054.03c vasavo rudrā avase na ā gamañ chṛṇvantu maruto havam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2208: RV_8,054.04a pūṣā viṣṇur havanam me sarasvaty avantu sapta sindhavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2209: RV_8,054.04c āpo vātaḥ parvatāso vanaspatiḥ śṛṇotu pṛthivī havam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2210: RV_8,054.05a yad indra rādho asti te māghonam maghavattama |
GV01rv_hn08u:2211: RV_8,054.05c tena no bodhi sadhamādyo vṛdhe bhago dānāya vṛtrahan ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2212: RV_8,054.06a ājipate nṛpate tvam id dhi no vāja ā vakṣi sukrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:2213: RV_8,054.06c vītī hotrābhir uta devavītibhiḥ sasavāṃso vi śṛṇvire ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2214: RV_8,054.07a santi hy arya āśiṣa indra āyur janānām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2215: RV_8,054.07c asmān nakṣasva maghavann upāvase dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2216: RV_8,054.08a vayaṃ ta indra stomebhir vidhema tvam asmākaṃ śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:2217: RV_8,054.08c mahi sthūraṃ śaśayaṃ rādho ahrayam praskaṇvāya ni tośaya ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2218: RV_8,055.01a bhūrīd indrasya vīryaṃ vy akhyam abhy āyati |
GV01rv_hn08u:2220: RV_8,055.02a śataṃ śvetāsa ukṣaṇo divi tāro na rocante |
GV01rv_hn08u:2222: RV_8,055.03a śataṃ veṇūñ chataṃ śunaḥ śataṃ carmāṇi mlātāni |
GV01rv_hn08u:2223: RV_8,055.03c śatam me balbajastukā aruṣīṇāṃ catuḥśatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2224: RV_8,055.04a sudevā stha kāṇvāyanā vayo-vayo vicarantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2226: RV_8,055.05a ād it sāptasya carkirann ānūnasya mahi śravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2227: RV_8,055.05c śyāvīr atidhvasan pathaś cakṣuṣā cana saṃnaśe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2228: RV_8,056.01a prati te dasyave vṛka rādho adarśy ahrayam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2230: RV_8,056.02a daśa mahyam pautakrataḥ sahasrā dasyave vṛkaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2232: RV_8,056.03a śatam me gardabhānāṃ śatam ūrṇāvatīnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2234: RV_8,056.04a tatro api prāṇīyata pūtakratāyai vyaktā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2236: RV_8,056.05a acety agniś cikitur havyavāṭ sa sumadrathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2237: RV_8,056.05c agniḥ śukreṇa śociṣā bṛhat sūro arocata divi sūryo arocata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2238: RV_8,057.01a yuvaṃ devā kratunā pūrvyeṇa yuktā rathena taviṣaṃ yajatrā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2239: RV_8,057.01c āgacchataṃ nāsatyā śacībhir idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ savanam pibāthaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2240: RV_8,057.02a yuvāṃ devās traya ekādaśāsaḥ satyāḥ satyasya dadṛśe purastāt |
GV01rv_hn08u:2241: RV_8,057.02c asmākaṃ yajñaṃ savanaṃ juṣāṇā pātaṃ somam aśvinā dīdyagnī ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2242: RV_8,057.03a panāyyaṃ tad aśvinā kṛtaṃ vāṃ vṛṣabho divo rajasaḥ pṛthivyāḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2243: RV_8,057.03c sahasraṃ śaṃsā uta ye gaviṣṭau sarvāṃ it tāṃ upa yātā pibadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2244: RV_8,057.04a ayaṃ vām bhāgo nihito yajatremā giro nāsatyopa yātam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2245: RV_8,057.04c pibataṃ somam madhumantam asme pra dāśvāṃsam avataṃ śacībhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2246: RV_8,058.01a yam ṛtvijo bahudhā kalpayantaḥ sacetaso yajñam imaṃ vahanti |
GV01rv_hn08u:2247: RV_8,058.01c yo anūcāno brāhmaṇo yukta āsīt kā svit tatra yajamānasya
GV01rv_hn08u:2249: RV_8,058.02a eka evāgnir bahudhā samiddha ekaḥ sūryo viśvam anu prabhūtaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:2250: RV_8,058.02c ekaivoṣāḥ sarvam idaṃ vi bhāty ekaṃ vā idaṃ vi babhūva sarvam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2251: RV_8,058.03a jyotiṣmantaṃ ketumantaṃ tricakraṃ sukhaṃ rathaṃ suṣadam
GV01rv_hn08u:2253: RV_8,058.03c citrāmaghā yasya yoge 'dhijajñe taṃ vāṃ huve ati riktam pibadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2254: RV_8,059.01a imāni vām bhāgadheyāni sisrata indrāvaruṇā pra mahe suteṣu vām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2255: RV_8,059.01c yajñe-yajñe ha savanā bhuraṇyatho yat sunvate yajamānāya
GV01rv_hn08u:2257: RV_8,059.02a niṣṣidhvarīr oṣadhīr āpa āstām indrāvaruṇā mahimānam āśata |
GV01rv_hn08u:2258: RV_8,059.02c yā sisratū rajasaḥ pāre adhvano yayoḥ śatrur nakir ādeva
GV01rv_hn08u:2260: RV_8,059.03a satyaṃ tad indrāvaruṇā kṛśasya vām madhva ūrmiṃ duhate sapta
GV01rv_hn08u:2262: RV_8,059.03c tābhir dāśvāṃsam avataṃ śubhas patī yo vām adabdho abhi pāti cittibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2263: RV_8,059.04a ghṛtapruṣaḥ saumyā jīradānavaḥ sapta svasāraḥ sadana ṛtasya |
GV01rv_hn08u:2264: RV_8,059.04c yā ha vām indrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutas tābhir dhattaṃ yajamānāya śikṣatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2265: RV_8,059.05a avocāma mahate saubhagāya satyaṃ tveṣābhyām mahimānam
GV01rv_hn08u:2267: RV_8,059.05c asmān sv indrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutas tribhiḥ sāptebhir avataṃ śubhas patī ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2268: RV_8,059.06a indrāvaruṇā yad ṛṣibhyo manīṣāṃ vāco matiṃ śrutam adattam agre |
GV01rv_hn08u:2269: RV_8,059.06c yāni sthānāny asṛjanta dhīrā yajñaṃ tanvānās tapasābhy apaśyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2270: RV_8,059.07a indrāvaruṇā saumanasam adṛptaṃ rāyas poṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhattam
GV01rv_hn08u:2271: RV_8,059.07c prajām puṣṭim bhūtim asmāsu dhattaṃ dīrghāyutvāya pra tirataṃ na āyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2272: RV_8,060.01a agna ā yāhy agnibhir hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2273: RV_8,060.01c ā tvām anaktu prayatā haviṣmatī yajiṣṭham barhir āsade ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2274: RV_8,060.02a acchā hi tvā sahasaḥ sūno aṅgiraḥ srucaś caranty adhvare |
GV01rv_hn08u:2275: RV_8,060.02c ūrjo napātaṃ ghṛtakeśam īmahe 'gniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2276: RV_8,060.03a agne kavir vedhā asi hotā pāvaka yakṣyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2277: RV_8,060.03c mandro yajiṣṭho adhvareṣv īḍyo viprebhiḥ śukra manmabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2278: RV_8,060.04a adrogham ā vahośato yaviṣṭhya devāṃ ajasra vītaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:2279: RV_8,060.04c abhi prayāṃsi sudhitā vaso gahi mandasva dhītibhir hitaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2280: RV_8,060.05a tvam it saprathā asy agne trātar ṛtas kaviḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2281: RV_8,060.05c tvāṃ viprāsaḥ samidhāna dīdiva ā vivāsanti vedhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2282: RV_8,060.06a śocā śociṣṭha dīdihi viśe mayo rāsva stotre mahāṃ asi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2283: RV_8,060.06c devānāṃ śarman mama santu sūrayaḥ śatrūṣāhaḥ svagnayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2284: RV_8,060.07a yathā cid vṛddham atasam agne saṃjūrvasi kṣami |
GV01rv_hn08u:2285: RV_8,060.07c evā daha mitramaho yo asmadhrug durmanmā kaś ca venati ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2286: RV_8,060.08a mā no martāya ripave rakṣasvine māghaśaṃsāya rīradhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2287: RV_8,060.08c asredhadbhis taraṇibhir yaviṣṭhya śivebhiḥ pāhi pāyubhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2288: RV_8,060.09a pāhi no agna ekayā pāhy uta dvitīyayā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2289: RV_8,060.09c pāhi gīrbhis tisṛbhir ūrjām pate pāhi catasṛbhir vaso ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2290: RV_8,060.10a pāhi viśvasmād rakṣaso arāvṇaḥ pra sma vājeṣu no 'va |
GV01rv_hn08u:2291: RV_8,060.10c tvām id dhi nediṣṭhaṃ devatātaya āpiṃ nakṣāmahe vṛdhe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2292: RV_8,060.11a ā no agne vayovṛdhaṃ rayim pāvaka śaṃsyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2293: RV_8,060.11c rāsvā ca na upamāte puruspṛhaṃ sunītī svayaśastaram ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2294: RV_8,060.12a yena vaṃsāma pṛtanāsu śardhatas taranto arya ādiśaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2295: RV_8,060.12c sa tvaṃ no vardha prayasā śacīvaso jinvā dhiyo vasuvidaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2296: RV_8,060.13a śiśāno vṛṣabho yathāgniḥ śṛṅge davidhvat |
GV01rv_hn08u:2297: RV_8,060.13c tigmā asya hanavo na pratidhṛṣe sujambhaḥ sahaso yahuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2298: RV_8,060.14a nahi te agne vṛṣabha pratidhṛṣe jambhāso yad vitiṣṭhase |
GV01rv_hn08u:2299: RV_8,060.14c sa tvaṃ no hotaḥ suhutaṃ haviṣ kṛdhi vaṃsvā no vāryā puru ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2300: RV_8,060.15a śeṣe vaneṣu mātroḥ saṃ tvā martāsa indhate |
GV01rv_hn08u:2301: RV_8,060.15c atandro havyā vahasi haviṣkṛta ād id deveṣu rājasi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2302: RV_8,060.16a sapta hotāras tam id īḷate tvāgne sutyajam ahrayam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2303: RV_8,060.16c bhinatsy adriṃ tapasā vi śociṣā prāgne tiṣṭha janāṃ ati ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2304: RV_8,060.17a agnim-agniṃ vo adhriguṃ huvema vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2305: RV_8,060.17c agniṃ hitaprayasaḥ śaśvatīṣv ā hotāraṃ carṣaṇīnām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2306: RV_8,060.18a ketena śarman sacate suṣāmaṇy agne tubhyaṃ cikitvanā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2307: RV_8,060.18c iṣaṇyayā naḥ pururūpam ā bhara vājaṃ nediṣṭham ūtaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2308: RV_8,060.19a agne jaritar viśpatis tepāno deva rakṣasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2309: RV_8,060.19c aproṣivān gṛhapatir mahāṃ asi divas pāyur duroṇayuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2310: RV_8,060.20a mā no rakṣa ā veśīd āghṛṇīvaso mā yātur yātumāvatām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2311: RV_8,060.20c parogavyūty anirām apa kṣudham agne sedha rakṣasvinaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2312: RV_8,061.01a ubhayaṃ śṛṇavac ca na indro arvāg idaṃ vacaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2313: RV_8,061.01c satrācyā maghavā somapītaye dhiyā śaviṣṭha ā gamat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2314: RV_8,061.02a taṃ hi svarājaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tam ojase dhiṣaṇe niṣṭatakṣatuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2315: RV_8,061.02c utopamānām prathamo ni ṣīdasi somakāmaṃ hi te manaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2317: RV_8,061.03c vidmā hi tvā harivaḥ pṛtsu sāsahim adhṛṣṭaṃ cid dadhṛṣvaṇim
GV01rv_hn08u:2318: RV_8,061.04a aprāmisatya maghavan tathed asad indra kratvā yathā vaśaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2319: RV_8,061.04c sanema vājaṃ tava śiprinn avasā makṣū cid yanto adrivaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2320: RV_8,061.05a śagdhy ū ṣu śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2321: RV_8,061.05c bhagaṃ na hi tvā yaśasaṃ vasuvidam anu śūra carāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2322: RV_8,061.06a pauro aśvasya purukṛd gavām asy utso deva hiraṇyayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2323: RV_8,061.06c nakir hi dānam parimardhiṣat tve yad-yad yāmi tad ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2324: RV_8,061.07a tvaṃ hy ehi cerave vidā bhagaṃ vasuttaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:2325: RV_8,061.07c ud vāvṛṣasva maghavan gaviṣṭaya ud indrāśvamiṣṭaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2326: RV_8,061.08a tvam purū sahasrāṇi śatāni ca yūthā dānāya maṃhase |
GV01rv_hn08u:2327: RV_8,061.08c ā purandaraṃ cakṛma vipravacasa indraṃ gāyanto 'vase ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2328: RV_8,061.09a avipro vā yad avidhad vipro vendra te vacaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2329: RV_8,061.09c sa pra mamandat tvāyā śatakrato prācāmanyo ahaṃsana ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2330: RV_8,061.10a ugrabāhur mrakṣakṛtvā purandaro yadi me śṛṇavad dhavam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2331: RV_8,061.10c vasūyavo vasupatiṃ śatakratuṃ stomair indraṃ havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2332: RV_8,061.11a na pāpāso manāmahe nārāyāso na jaḷhavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2333: RV_8,061.11c yad in nv indraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ sacā sute sakhāyaṃ kṛṇavāmahai ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2334: RV_8,061.12a ugraṃ yuyujma pṛtanāsu sāsahim ṛṇakātim adābhyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2335: RV_8,061.12c vedā bhṛmaṃ cit sanitā rathītamo vājinaṃ yam id ū naśat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2336: RV_8,061.13a yata indra bhayāmahe tato no abhayaṃ kṛdhi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2337: RV_8,061.13c maghavañ chagdhi tava tan na ūtibhir vi dviṣo vi mṛdho jahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2338: RV_8,061.14a tvaṃ hi rādhaspate rādhaso mahaḥ kṣayasyāsi vidhataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2339: RV_8,061.14c taṃ tvā vayam maghavann indra girvaṇaḥ sutāvanto havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2340: RV_8,061.15a indra spaḷ uta vṛtrahā paraspā no vareṇyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2341: RV_8,061.15c sa no rakṣiṣac caramaṃ sa madhyamaṃ sa paścāt pātu naḥ puraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2342: RV_8,061.16a tvaṃ naḥ paścād adharād uttarāt pura indra ni pāhi viśvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2343: RV_8,061.16c āre asmat kṛṇuhi daivyam bhayam āre hetīr adevīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2344: RV_8,061.17a adyādyā śvaḥ-śva indra trāsva pare ca naḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2345: RV_8,061.17c viśvā ca no jaritṝn satpate ahā divā naktaṃ ca rakṣiṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2346: RV_8,061.18a prabhaṅgī śūro maghavā tuvīmaghaḥ sammiślo viryāya kam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2347: RV_8,061.18c ubhā te bāhū vṛṣaṇā śatakrato ni yā vajram mimikṣatuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2348: RV_8,062.01a pro asmā upastutim bharatā yaj jujoṣati |
GV01rv_hn08u:2349: RV_8,062.01c ukthair indrasya māhinaṃ vayo vardhanti somino bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2350: RV_8,062.02a ayujo asamo nṛbhir ekaḥ kṛṣṭīr ayāsyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2351: RV_8,062.02c pūrvīr ati pra vāvṛdhe viśvā jātāny ojasā bhadrā indrasya
GV01rv_hn08u:2353: RV_8,062.03a ahitena cid arvatā jīradānuḥ siṣāsati |
GV01rv_hn08u:2354: RV_8,062.03c pravācyam indra tat tava vīryāṇi kariṣyato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2355: RV_8,062.04a ā yāhi kṛṇavāma ta indra brahmāṇi vardhanā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2356: RV_8,062.04c yebhiḥ śaviṣṭha cākano bhadram iha śravasyate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2357: RV_8,062.05a dhṛṣataś cid dhṛṣan manaḥ kṛṇoṣīndra yat tvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2358: RV_8,062.05c tīvraiḥ somaiḥ saparyato namobhiḥ pratibhūṣato bhadrā
GV01rv_hn08u:2360: RV_8,062.06a ava caṣṭa ṛcīṣamo 'vatāṃ iva mānuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2361: RV_8,062.06c juṣṭvī dakṣasya sominaḥ sakhāyaṃ kṛṇute yujam bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2362: RV_8,062.07a viśve ta indra vīryaṃ devā anu kratuṃ daduḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2363: RV_8,062.07c bhuvo viśvasya gopatiḥ puruṣṭuta bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2364: RV_8,062.08a gṛṇe tad indra te śava upamaṃ devatātaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:2365: RV_8,062.08c yad dhaṃsi vṛtram ojasā śacīpate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2366: RV_8,062.09a samaneva vapuṣyataḥ kṛṇavan mānuṣā yugā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2367: RV_8,062.09c vide tad indraś cetanam adha śruto bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2368: RV_8,062.10a uj jātam indra te śava ut tvām ut tava kratum |
GV01rv_hn08u:2369: RV_8,062.10c bhūrigo bhūri vāvṛdhur maghavan tava śarmaṇi bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2370: RV_8,062.11a ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vṛtrahan saṃ yujyāva sanibhya ā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2371: RV_8,062.11c arātīvā cid adrivo 'nu nau śūra maṃsate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2372: RV_8,062.12a satyam id vā u taṃ vayam indraṃ stavāma nānṛtam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2373: RV_8,062.12c mahāṃ asunvato vadho bhūri jyotīṃṣi sunvato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2374: RV_8,063.01a sa pūrvyo mahānāṃ venaḥ kratubhir ānaje |
GV01rv_hn08u:2375: RV_8,063.01c yasya dvārā manuṣ pitā deveṣu dhiya ānaje ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2376: RV_8,063.02a divo mānaṃ not sadan somapṛṣṭhāso adrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2378: RV_8,063.03a sa vidvāṃ aṅgirobhya indro gā avṛṇod apa |
GV01rv_hn08u:2380: RV_8,063.04a sa pratnathā kavivṛdha indro vākasya vakṣaṇiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2381: RV_8,063.04c śivo arkasya homany asmatrā gantv avase ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2382: RV_8,063.05a ād ū nu te anu kratuṃ svāhā varasya yajyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2383: RV_8,063.05c śvātram arkā anūṣatendra gotrasya dāvane ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2384: RV_8,063.06a indre viśvāni vīryā kṛtāni kartvāni ca |
GV01rv_hn08u:2386: RV_8,063.07a yat pāñcajanyayā viśendre ghoṣā asṛkṣata |
GV01rv_hn08u:2387: RV_8,063.07c astṛṇād barhaṇā vipo 'ryo mānasya sa kṣayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2388: RV_8,063.08a iyam u te anuṣṭutiś cakṛṣe tāni pauṃsyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2390: RV_8,063.09a asya vṛṣṇo vyodana uru kramiṣṭa jīvase |
GV01rv_hn08u:2391: RV_8,063.09c yavaṃ na paśva ā dade ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2392: RV_8,063.10a tad dadhānā avasyavo yuṣmābhir dakṣapitaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2394: RV_8,063.11a baḷ ṛtviyāya dhāmna ṛkvabhiḥ śūra nonumaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2396: RV_8,063.12a asme rudrā mehanā parvatāso vṛtrahatye bharahūtau sajoṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2397: RV_8,063.12c yaḥ śaṃsate stuvate dhāyi pajra indrajyeṣṭhā asmāṃ avantu devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2398: RV_8,064.01a ut tvā mandantu stomāḥ kṛṇuṣva rādho adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2400: RV_8,064.02a padā paṇīṃr arādhaso ni bādhasva mahāṃ asi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2401: RV_8,064.02c nahi tvā kaś cana prati ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2402: RV_8,064.03a tvam īśiṣe sutānām indra tvam asutānām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2404: RV_8,064.04a ehi prehi kṣayo divy āghoṣañ carṣaṇīnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2406: RV_8,064.05a tyaṃ cit parvataṃ giriṃ śatavantaṃ sahasriṇam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2408: RV_8,064.06a vayam u tvā divā sute vayaṃ naktaṃ havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2410: RV_8,064.07a kva sya vṛṣabho yuvā tuvigrīvo anānataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2412: RV_8,064.08a kasya svit savanaṃ vṛṣā jujuṣvāṃ ava gacchati |
GV01rv_hn08u:2413: RV_8,064.08c indraṃ ka u svid ā cake ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2414: RV_8,064.09a kaṃ te dānā asakṣata vṛtrahan kaṃ suvīryā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2415: RV_8,064.09c ukthe ka u svid antamaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2416: RV_8,064.10a ayaṃ te mānuṣe jane somaḥ pūruṣu sūyate |
GV01rv_hn08u:2418: RV_8,064.11a ayaṃ te śaryaṇāvati suṣomāyām adhi priyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2420: RV_8,064.12a tam adya rādhase mahe cārum madāya ghṛṣvaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:2422: RV_8,065.01a yad indra prāg apāg udaṅ nyag vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2424: RV_8,065.02a yad vā prasravaṇe divo mādayāse svarṇare |
GV01rv_hn08u:2426: RV_8,065.03a ā tvā gīrbhir mahām uruṃ huve gām iva bhojase |
GV01rv_hn08u:2428: RV_8,065.04a ā ta indra mahimānaṃ harayo deva te mahaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2430: RV_8,065.05a indra gṛṇīṣa u stuṣe mahāṃ ugra īśānakṛt |
GV01rv_hn08u:2432: RV_8,065.06a sutāvantas tvā vayam prayasvanto havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2434: RV_8,065.07a yac cid dhi śaśvatām asīndra sādhāraṇas tvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2436: RV_8,065.08a idaṃ te somyam madhv adhukṣann adribhir naraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2438: RV_8,065.09a viśvāṃ aryo vipaścito 'ti khyas tūyam ā gahi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2440: RV_8,065.10a dātā me pṛṣatīnāṃ rājā hiraṇyavīnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2442: RV_8,065.11a sahasre pṛṣatīnām adhi ścandram bṛhat pṛthu |
GV01rv_hn08u:2444: RV_8,065.12a napāto durgahasya me sahasreṇa surādhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2446: RV_8,066.01a tarobhir vo vidadvasum indraṃ sabādha ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:2447: RV_8,066.01c bṛhad gāyantaḥ sutasome adhvare huve bharaṃ na kāriṇam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2448: RV_8,066.02a na yaṃ dudhrā varante na sthirā muro made suśipram andhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2449: RV_8,066.02c ya ādṛtyā śaśamānāya sunvate dātā jaritra ukthyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2450: RV_8,066.03a yaḥ śakro mṛkṣo aśvyo yo vā kījo hiraṇyayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2451: RV_8,066.03c sa ūrvasya rejayaty apāvṛtim indro gavyasya vṛtrahā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2452: RV_8,066.04a nikhātaṃ cid yaḥ purusambhṛtaṃ vasūd id vapati dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2453: RV_8,066.04c vajrī suśipro haryaśva it karad indraḥ kratvā yathā vaśat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2454: RV_8,066.05a yad vāvantha puruṣṭuta purā cic chūra nṛṇām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2455: RV_8,066.05c vayaṃ tat ta indra sam bharāmasi yajñam ukthaṃ turaṃ vacaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2456: RV_8,066.06a sacā someṣu puruhūta vajrivo madāya dyukṣa somapāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2457: RV_8,066.06c tvam id dhi brahmakṛte kāmyaṃ vasu deṣṭhaḥ sunvate bhuvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2458: RV_8,066.07a vayam enam idā hyo 'pīpemeha vajriṇam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2459: RV_8,066.07c tasmā u adya samanā sutam bharā nūnam bhūṣata śrute ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2460: RV_8,066.08a vṛkaś cid asya vāraṇa urāmathir ā vayuneṣu bhūṣati |
GV01rv_hn08u:2461: RV_8,066.08c semaṃ na stomaṃ jujuṣāṇa ā gahīndra pra citrayā dhiyā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2462: RV_8,066.09a kad ū nv asyākṛtam indrasyāsti pauṃsyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2463: RV_8,066.09c keno nu kaṃ śromatena na śuśruve januṣaḥ pari vṛtrahā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2464: RV_8,066.10a kad ū mahīr adhṛṣṭā asya taviṣīḥ kad u vṛtraghno astṛtam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2465: RV_8,066.10c indro viśvān bekanāṭāṃ ahardṛśa uta kratvā paṇīṃr abhi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2466: RV_8,066.11a vayaṃ ghā te apūrvyendra brahmāṇi vṛtrahan |
GV01rv_hn08u:2467: RV_8,066.11c purūtamāsaḥ puruhūta vajrivo bhṛtiṃ na pra bharāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2468: RV_8,066.12a pūrvīś cid dhi tve tuvikūrminn āśaso havanta indrotayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2469: RV_8,066.12c tiraś cid aryaḥ savanā vaso gahi śaviṣṭha śrudhi me havam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2470: RV_8,066.13a vayaṃ ghā te tve id v indra viprā api ṣmasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2471: RV_8,066.13c nahi tvad anyaḥ puruhūta kaś cana maghavann asti marḍitā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2472: RV_8,066.14a tvaṃ no asyā amater uta kṣudho 'bhiśaster ava spṛdhi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2473: RV_8,066.14c tvaṃ na ūtī tava citrayā dhiyā śikṣā śaciṣṭha gātuvit ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2474: RV_8,066.15a soma id vaḥ suto astu kalayo mā bibhītana |
GV01rv_hn08u:2475: RV_8,066.15c aped eṣa dhvasmāyati svayaṃ ghaiṣo apāyati ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2476: RV_8,067.01a tyān nu kṣatriyāṃ ava ādityān yāciṣāmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2478: RV_8,067.02a mitro no aty aṃhatiṃ varuṇaḥ parṣad aryamā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2480: RV_8,067.03a teṣāṃ hi citram ukthyaṃ varūtham asti dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2482: RV_8,067.04a mahi vo mahatām avo varuṇa mitrāryaman |
GV01rv_hn08u:2484: RV_8,067.05a jīvān no abhi dhetanādityāsaḥ purā hathāt |
GV01rv_hn08u:2486: RV_8,067.06a yad vaḥ śrāntāya sunvate varūtham asti yac chardiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2488: RV_8,067.07a asti devā aṃhor urv asti ratnam anāgasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2490: RV_8,067.08a mā naḥ setuḥ siṣed ayam mahe vṛṇaktu nas pari |
GV01rv_hn08u:2491: RV_8,067.08c indra id dhi śruto vaśī ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2492: RV_8,067.09a mā no mṛcā ripūṇāṃ vṛjinānām aviṣyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2494: RV_8,067.10a uta tvām adite mahy ahaṃ devy upa bruve |
GV01rv_hn08u:2496: RV_8,067.11a parṣi dīne gabhīra āṃ ugraputre jighāṃsataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2498: RV_8,067.12a aneho na uruvraja urūci vi prasartave |
GV01rv_hn08u:2500: RV_8,067.13a ye mūrdhānaḥ kṣitīnām adabdhāsaḥ svayaśasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2502: RV_8,067.14a te na āsno vṛkāṇām ādityāso mumocata |
GV01rv_hn08u:2504: RV_8,067.15a apo ṣu ṇa iyaṃ śarur ādityā apa durmatiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2506: RV_8,067.16a śaśvad dhi vaḥ sudānava ādityā ūtibhir vayam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2508: RV_8,067.17a śaśvantaṃ hi pracetasaḥ pratiyantaṃ cid enasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2510: RV_8,067.18a tat su no navyaṃ sanyasa ādityā yan mumocati |
GV01rv_hn08u:2512: RV_8,067.19a nāsmākam asti tat tara ādityāso atiṣkade |
GV01rv_hn08u:2514: RV_8,067.20a mā no hetir vivasvata ādityāḥ kṛtrimā śaruḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2516: RV_8,067.21a vi ṣu dveṣo vy aṃhatim ādityāso vi saṃhitam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2518: RV_8,068.01a ā tvā rathaṃ yathotaye sumnāya vartayāmasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2519: RV_8,068.01c tuvikūrmim ṛtīṣaham indra śaviṣṭha satpate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2520: RV_8,068.02a tuviśuṣma tuvikrato śacīvo viśvayā mate |
GV01rv_hn08u:2522: RV_8,068.03a yasya te mahinā mahaḥ pari jmāyantam īyatuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2524: RV_8,068.04a viśvānarasya vas patim anānatasya śavasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2525: RV_8,068.04c evaiś ca carṣaṇīnām ūtī huve rathānām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2526: RV_8,068.05a abhiṣṭaye sadāvṛdhaṃ svarmīḷheṣu yaṃ naraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2528: RV_8,068.06a paromātram ṛcīṣamam indram ugraṃ surādhasam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2530: RV_8,068.07a taṃ-tam id rādhase maha indraṃ codāmi pītaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:2531: RV_8,068.07c yaḥ pūrvyām anuṣṭutim īśe kṛṣṭīnāṃ nṛtuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2532: RV_8,068.08a na yasya te śavasāna sakhyam ānaṃśa martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2534: RV_8,068.09a tvotāsas tvā yujāpsu sūrye mahad dhanam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2536: RV_8,068.10a taṃ tvā yajñebhir īmahe taṃ gīrbhir girvaṇastama |
GV01rv_hn08u:2537: RV_8,068.10c indra yathā cid āvitha vājeṣu purumāyyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2538: RV_8,068.11a yasya te svādu sakhyaṃ svādvī praṇītir adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2540: RV_8,068.12a uru ṇas tanve tana uru kṣayāya nas kṛdhi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2542: RV_8,068.13a uruṃ nṛbhya uruṃ gava uruṃ rathāya panthām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2544: RV_8,068.14a upa mā ṣaḍ dvā-dvā naraḥ somasya harṣyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2546: RV_8,068.15a ṛjrāv indrota ā dade harī ṛkṣasya sūnavi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2550: RV_8,068.17a ṣaḷ aśvāṃ ātithigva indrote vadhūmataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2552: RV_8,068.18a aiṣu cetad vṛṣaṇvaty antar ṛjreṣv aruṣī |
GV01rv_hn08u:2554: RV_8,068.19a na yuṣme vājabandhavo ninitsuś cana martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2556: RV_8,069.01a pra-pra vas triṣṭubham iṣam mandadvīrāyendave |
GV01rv_hn08u:2557: RV_8,069.01c dhiyā vo medhasātaye purandhyā vivāsati ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2558: RV_8,069.02a nadaṃ va odatīnāṃ nadaṃ yoyuvatīnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2559: RV_8,069.02c patiṃ vo aghnyānāṃ dhenūnām iṣudhyasi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2560: RV_8,069.03a tā asya sūdadohasaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2561: RV_8,069.03c janman devānāṃ viśas triṣv ā rocane divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2562: RV_8,069.04a abhi pra gopatiṃ girendram arca yathā vide |
GV01rv_hn08u:2564: RV_8,069.05a ā harayaḥ sasṛjrire 'ruṣīr adhi barhiṣi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2566: RV_8,069.06a indrāya gāva āśiraṃ duduhre vajriṇe madhu |
GV01rv_hn08u:2568: RV_8,069.07a ud yad bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ gṛham indraś ca ganvahi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2569: RV_8,069.07c madhvaḥ pītvā sacevahi triḥ sapta sakhyuḥ pade ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2571: RV_8,069.08c arcantu putrakā uta puraṃ na dhṛṣṇv arcata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2572: RV_8,069.09a ava svarāti gargaro godhā pari saniṣvaṇat |
GV01rv_hn08u:2573: RV_8,069.09c piṅgā pari caniṣkadad indrāya brahmodyatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2574: RV_8,069.10a ā yat patanty enyaḥ sudughā anapasphuraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2575: RV_8,069.10c apasphuraṃ gṛbhāyata somam indrāya pātave ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2576: RV_8,069.11a apād indro apād agnir viśve devā amatsata |
GV01rv_hn08u:2577: RV_8,069.11c varuṇa id iha kṣayat tam āpo abhy anūṣata vatsaṃ saṃśiśvarīr iva ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2578: RV_8,069.12a sudevo asi varuṇa yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2579: RV_8,069.12c anukṣaranti kākudaṃ sūrmyaṃ suṣirām iva ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2580: RV_8,069.13a yo vyatīṃr aphāṇayat suyuktāṃ upa dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2581: RV_8,069.13c takvo netā tad id vapur upamā yo amucyata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2582: RV_8,069.14a atīd u śakra ohata indro viśvā ati dviṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2583: RV_8,069.14c bhinat kanīna odanam pacyamānam paro girā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2584: RV_8,069.15a arbhako na kumārako 'dhi tiṣṭhan navaṃ ratham |
GV01rv_hn08u:2585: RV_8,069.15c sa pakṣan mahiṣam mṛgam pitre mātre vibhukratum ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2586: RV_8,069.16a ā tū suśipra dampate rathaṃ tiṣṭhā hiraṇyayam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2587: RV_8,069.16c adha dyukṣaṃ sacevahi sahasrapādam aruṣaṃ svastigām anehasam
GV01rv_hn08u:2588: RV_8,069.17a taṃ ghem itthā namasvina upa svarājam āsate |
GV01rv_hn08u:2589: RV_8,069.17c arthaṃ cid asya sudhitaṃ yad etava āvartayanti dāvane ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2591: RV_8,069.18c pūrvām anu prayatiṃ vṛktabarhiṣo hitaprayasa āśata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2592: RV_8,070.01a yo rājā carṣaṇīnāṃ yātā rathebhir adhriguḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2593: RV_8,070.01c viśvāsāṃ tarutā pṛtanānāṃ jyeṣṭho yo vṛtrahā gṛṇe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2594: RV_8,070.02a indraṃ taṃ śumbha puruhanmann avase yasya dvitā vidhartari |
GV01rv_hn08u:2595: RV_8,070.02c hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśato maho dive na sūryaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2596: RV_8,070.03a nakiṣ ṭaṃ karmaṇā naśad yaś cakāra sadāvṛdham |
GV01rv_hn08u:2597: RV_8,070.03c indraṃ na yajñair viśvagūrtam ṛbhvasam adhṛṣṭaṃ dhṛṣṇvojasam
GV01rv_hn08u:2598: RV_8,070.04a aṣāḷham ugram pṛtanāsu sāsahiṃ yasmin mahīr urujrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2599: RV_8,070.04c saṃ dhenavo jāyamāne anonavur dyāvaḥ kṣāmo anonavuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2600: RV_8,070.05a yad dyāva indra te śataṃ śatam bhūmīr uta syuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2601: RV_8,070.05c na tvā vajrin sahasraṃ sūryā anu na jātam aṣṭa rodasī ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2602: RV_8,070.06a ā paprātha mahinā vṛṣṇyā vṛṣan viśvā śaviṣṭha śavasā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2603: RV_8,070.06c asmāṃ ava maghavan gomati vraje vajriñ citrābhir ūtibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2604: RV_8,070.07a na sīm adeva āpad iṣaṃ dīrghāyo martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2605: RV_8,070.07c etagvā cid ya etaśā yuyojate harī indro yuyojate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2606: RV_8,070.08a taṃ vo maho mahāyyam indraṃ dānāya sakṣaṇim |
GV01rv_hn08u:2607: RV_8,070.08c yo gādheṣu ya āraṇeṣu havyo vājeṣv asti havyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2608: RV_8,070.09a ud ū ṣu ṇo vaso mahe mṛśasva śūra rādhase |
GV01rv_hn08u:2609: RV_8,070.09c ud ū ṣu mahyai maghavan maghattaya ud indra śravase mahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2610: RV_8,070.10a tvaṃ na indra ṛtayus tvānido ni tṛmpasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2611: RV_8,070.10c madhye vasiṣva tuvinṛmṇorvor ni dāsaṃ śiśnatho hathaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2613: RV_8,070.11c ava svaḥ sakhā dudhuvīta parvataḥ sughnāya dasyum parvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2614: RV_8,070.12a tvaṃ na indrāsāṃ haste śaviṣṭha dāvane |
GV01rv_hn08u:2615: RV_8,070.12c dhānānāṃ na saṃ gṛbhāyāsmayur dviḥ saṃ gṛbhāyāsmayuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2616: RV_8,070.13a sakhāyaḥ kratum icchata kathā rādhāma śarasya |
GV01rv_hn08u:2617: RV_8,070.13c upastutim bhojaḥ sūrir yo ahrayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2618: RV_8,070.14a bhūribhiḥ samaha ṛṣibhir barhiṣmadbhi staviṣyase |
GV01rv_hn08u:2619: RV_8,070.14c yad ittham ekam-ekam ic chara vatsān parādadaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2620: RV_8,070.15a karṇagṛhyā maghavā śauradevyo vatsaṃ nas tribhya ānayat |
GV01rv_hn08u:2622: RV_8,071.01a tvaṃ no agne mahobhiḥ pāhi viśvasyā arāteḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2624: RV_8,071.02a nahi manyuḥ pauruṣeya īśe hi vaḥ priyajāta |
GV01rv_hn08u:2626: RV_8,071.03a sa no viśvebhir devebhir ūrjo napād bhadraśoce |
GV01rv_hn08u:2628: RV_8,071.04a na tam agne arātayo martaṃ yuvanta rāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2630: RV_8,071.05a yaṃ tvaṃ vipra medhasātāv agne hinoṣi dhanāya |
GV01rv_hn08u:2632: RV_8,071.06a tvaṃ rayim puruvīram agne dāśuṣe martāya |
GV01rv_hn08u:2633: RV_8,071.06c pra ṇo naya vasyo accha ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2634: RV_8,071.07a uruṣyā ṇo mā parā dā aghāyate jātavedaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2636: RV_8,071.08a agne mākiṣ ṭe devasya rātim adevo yuyota |
GV01rv_hn08u:2638: RV_8,071.09a sa no vasva upa māsy ūrjo napān māhinasya |
GV01rv_hn08u:2640: RV_8,071.10a acchā naḥ śīraśociṣaṃ giro yantu darśatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2641: RV_8,071.10c acchā yajñāso namasā purūvasum purupraśastam ūtaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2642: RV_8,071.11a agniṃ sūnuṃ sahaso jātavedasaṃ dānāya vāryāṇām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2643: RV_8,071.11c dvitā yo bhūd amṛto martyeṣv ā hotā mandratamo viśi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2644: RV_8,071.12a agniṃ vo devayajyayāgnim prayaty adhvare |
GV01rv_hn08u:2645: RV_8,071.12c agniṃ dhīṣu prathamam agnim arvaty agniṃ kṣaitrāya sādhase ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2646: RV_8,071.13a agnir iṣāṃ sakhye dadātu na īśe yo vāryāṇām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2647: RV_8,071.13c agniṃ toke tanaye śaśvad īmahe vasuṃ santaṃ tanūpām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2649: RV_8,071.14c agniṃ rāye purumīḷha śrutaṃ naro 'gniṃ sudītaye chardiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2650: RV_8,071.15a agniṃ dveṣo yotavai no gṛṇīmasy agniṃ śaṃ yoś ca dātave |
GV01rv_hn08u:2651: RV_8,071.15c viśvāsu vikṣv aviteva havyo bhuvad vastur ṛṣūṇām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2652: RV_8,072.01a haviṣ kṛṇudhvam ā gamad adhvaryur vanate punaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2654: RV_8,072.02a ni tigmam abhy aṃśuṃ sīdad dhotā manāv adhi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2656: RV_8,072.03a antar icchanti taṃ jane rudram paro manīṣayā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2658: RV_8,072.04a jāmy atītape dhanur vayodhā aruhad vanam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2660: RV_8,072.05a caran vatso ruśann iha nidātāraṃ na vindate |
GV01rv_hn08u:2662: RV_8,072.06a uto nv asya yan mahad aśvāvad yojanam bṛhad |
