GV01rv_hn08u:2664: RV_8,072.07a duhanti saptaikām upa dvā pañca sṛjataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2666: RV_8,072.08a ā daśabhir vivasvata indraḥ kośam acucyavīt |
GV01rv_hn08u:2668: RV_8,072.09a pari tridhātur adhvaraṃ jūrṇir eti navīyasī |
GV01rv_hn08u:2672: RV_8,072.11a abhyāram id adrayo niṣiktam puṣkare madhu |
GV01rv_hn08u:2674: RV_8,072.12a gāva upāvatāvatam mahī yajñasya rapsudā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2676: RV_8,072.13a ā sute siñcata śriyaṃ rodasyor abhiśriyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2678: RV_8,072.14a te jānata svam okyaṃ saṃ vatsāso na mātṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2680: RV_8,072.15a upa srakveṣu bapsataḥ kṛṇvate dharuṇaṃ divi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2682: RV_8,072.16a adhukṣat pipyuṣīm iṣam ūrjaṃ saptapadīm ariḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2684: RV_8,072.17a somasya mitrāvaruṇoditā sūra ā dade |
GV01rv_hn08u:2686: RV_8,072.18a uto nv asya yat padaṃ haryatasya nidhānyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2688: RV_8,073.01a ud īrāthām ṛtāyate yuñjāthām aśvinā ratham |
GV01rv_hn08u:2689: RV_8,073.01c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2690: RV_8,073.02a nimiṣaś cij javīyasā rathenā yātam aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2691: RV_8,073.02c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2692: RV_8,073.03a upa stṛṇītam atraye himena gharmam aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2693: RV_8,073.03c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2694: RV_8,073.04a kuha sthaḥ kuha jagmathuḥ kuha śyeneva petathuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2695: RV_8,073.04c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2696: RV_8,073.05a yad adya karhi karhi cic chuśrūyātam imaṃ havam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2697: RV_8,073.05c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2698: RV_8,073.06a aśvinā yāmahūtamā nediṣṭhaṃ yāmy āpyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2699: RV_8,073.06c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2700: RV_8,073.07a avantam atraye gṛhaṃ kṛṇutaṃ yuvam aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2701: RV_8,073.07c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2702: RV_8,073.08a varethe agnim ātapo vadate valgv atraye |
GV01rv_hn08u:2703: RV_8,073.08c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2704: RV_8,073.09a pra saptavadhrir āśasā dhārām agner aśāyata |
GV01rv_hn08u:2705: RV_8,073.09c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2706: RV_8,073.10a ihā gataṃ vṛṣaṇvasū śṛṇutam ma imaṃ havam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2707: RV_8,073.10c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2708: RV_8,073.11a kim idaṃ vām purāṇavaj jarator iva śasyate |
GV01rv_hn08u:2709: RV_8,073.11c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2710: RV_8,073.12a samānaṃ vāṃ sajātyaṃ samāno bandhur aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2711: RV_8,073.12c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2712: RV_8,073.13a yo vāṃ rajāṃsy aśvinā ratho viyāti rodasī |
GV01rv_hn08u:2713: RV_8,073.13c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2714: RV_8,073.14a ā no gavyebhir aśvyaiḥ sahasrair upa gacchatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2715: RV_8,073.14c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2716: RV_8,073.15a mā no gavyebhir aśvyaiḥ sahasrebhir ati khyatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2717: RV_8,073.15c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2718: RV_8,073.16a aruṇapsur uṣā abhūd akar jyotir ṛtāvarī |
GV01rv_hn08u:2719: RV_8,073.16c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2720: RV_8,073.17a aśvinā su vicākaśad vṛkṣam paraśumāṃ iva |
GV01rv_hn08u:2721: RV_8,073.17c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2722: RV_8,073.18a puraṃ na dhṛṣṇav ā ruja kṛṣṇayā bādhito viśā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2723: RV_8,073.18c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2724: RV_8,074.01a viśo-viśo vo atithiṃ vājayantaḥ purupriyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2725: RV_8,074.01c agniṃ vo duryaṃ vaca stuṣe śūṣasya manmabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2726: RV_8,074.02a yaṃ janāso haviṣmanto mitraṃ na sarpirāsutim |
GV01rv_hn08u:2728: RV_8,074.03a panyāṃsaṃ jātavedasaṃ yo devatāty udyatā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2730: RV_8,074.04a āganma vṛtrahantamaṃ jyeṣṭham agnim ānavam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2731: RV_8,074.04c yasya śrutarvā bṛhann ārkṣo anīka edhate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2732: RV_8,074.05a amṛtaṃ jātavedasaṃ tiras tamāṃsi darśatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2734: RV_8,074.06a sabādho yaṃ janā ime 'gniṃ havyebhir īḷate |
GV01rv_hn08u:2736: RV_8,074.07a iyaṃ te navyasī matir agne adhāyy asmad ā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2738: RV_8,074.08a sā te agne śantamā caniṣṭhā bhavatu priyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2740: RV_8,074.09a sā dyumnair dyumninī bṛhad upopa śravasi śravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2742: RV_8,074.10a aśvam id gāṃ rathaprāṃ tveṣam indraṃ na satpatim |
GV01rv_hn08u:2743: RV_8,074.10c yasya śravāṃsi tūrvatha panyam-panyaṃ ca kṛṣṭayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2744: RV_8,074.11a yaṃ tvā gopavano girā caniṣṭhad agne aṅgiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2746: RV_8,074.12a yaṃ tvā janāsa īḷate sabādho vājasātaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:2748: RV_8,074.13a ahaṃ huvāna ārkṣe śrutarvaṇi madacyuti |
GV01rv_hn08u:2749: RV_8,074.13c śardhāṃsīva stukāvinām mṛkṣā śīrṣā caturṇām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2750: RV_8,074.14a māṃ catvāra āśavaḥ śaviṣṭhasya dravitnavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2751: RV_8,074.14c surathāso abhi prayo vakṣan vayo na tugryam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2752: RV_8,074.15a satyam it tvā mahenadi paruṣṇy ava dediśam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2753: RV_8,074.15c nem āpo aśvadātaraḥ śaviṣṭhād asti martyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2754: RV_8,075.01a yukṣvā hi devahūtamāṃ aśvāṃ agne rathīr iva |
GV01rv_hn08u:2756: RV_8,075.02a uta no deva devāṃ acchā voco viduṣṭaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2758: RV_8,075.03a tvaṃ ha yad yaviṣṭhya sahasaḥ sūnav āhuta |
GV01rv_hn08u:2760: RV_8,075.04a ayam agniḥ sahasriṇo vājasya śatinas patiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2762: RV_8,075.05a taṃ nemim ṛbhavo yathā namasva sahūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2764: RV_8,075.06a tasmai nūnam abhidyave vācā virūpa nityayā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2766: RV_8,075.07a kam u ṣvid asya senayāgner apākacakṣasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2768: RV_8,075.08a mā no devānāṃ viśaḥ prasnātīr ivosrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2770: RV_8,075.09a mā naḥ samasya dūḍhyaḥ paridveṣaso aṃhatiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2771: RV_8,075.09c ūrmir na nāvam ā vadhīt ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2772: RV_8,075.10a namas te agna ojase gṛṇanti deva kṛṣṭayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2774: RV_8,075.11a kuvit su no gaviṣṭaye 'gne saṃveṣiṣo rayim |
GV01rv_hn08u:2776: RV_8,075.12a mā no asmin mahādhane parā varg bhārabhṛd yathā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2778: RV_8,075.13a anyam asmad bhiyā iyam agne siṣaktu ducchunā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2780: RV_8,075.14a yasyājuṣan namasvinaḥ śamīm adurmakhasya vā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2782: RV_8,075.15a parasyā adhi saṃvato 'varāṃ abhy ā tara |
GV01rv_hn08u:2784: RV_8,075.16a vidmā hi te purā vayam agne pitur yathāvasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2786: RV_8,076.01a imaṃ nu māyinaṃ huva indram īśānam ojasā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2788: RV_8,076.02a ayam indro marutsakhā vi vṛtrasyābhinac chiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2790: RV_8,076.03a vāvṛdhāno marutsakhendro vi vṛtram airayat |
GV01rv_hn08u:2792: RV_8,076.04a ayaṃ ha yena vā idaṃ svar marutvatā jitam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2796: RV_8,076.06a indram pratnena manmanā marutvantaṃ havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2798: RV_8,076.07a marutvāṃ indra mīḍhvaḥ pibā somaṃ śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:2800: RV_8,076.08a tubhyed indra marutvate sutāḥ somāso adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2802: RV_8,076.09a pibed indra marutsakhā sutaṃ somaṃ diviṣṭiṣu |
GV01rv_hn08u:2804: RV_8,076.10a uttiṣṭhann ojasā saha pītvī śipre avepayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2806: RV_8,076.11a anu tvā rodasī ubhe krakṣamāṇam akṛpetām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2808: RV_8,076.12a vācam aṣṭāpadīm ahaṃ navasraktim ṛtaspṛśam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2810: RV_8,077.01a jajñāno nu śatakratur vi pṛcchad iti mātaram |
GV01rv_hn08u:2811: RV_8,077.01c ka ugrāḥ ke ha śṛṇvire ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2812: RV_8,077.02a ād īṃ śavasy abravīd aurṇavābham ahīśuvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2814: RV_8,077.03a sam it tān vṛtrahākhidat khe arāṃ iva khedayā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2816: RV_8,077.04a ekayā pratidhāpibat sākaṃ sarāṃsi triṃśatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2818: RV_8,077.05a abhi gandharvam atṛṇad abudhneṣu rajassv ā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2820: RV_8,077.06a nir āvidhyad giribhya ā dhārayat pakvam odanam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2822: RV_8,077.07a śatabradhna iṣus tava sahasraparṇa eka it |
GV01rv_hn08u:2824: RV_8,077.08a tena stotṛbhya ā bhara nṛbhyo nāribhyo attave |
GV01rv_hn08u:2826: RV_8,077.09a etā cyautnāni te kṛtā varṣiṣṭhāni parīṇasā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2828: RV_8,077.10a viśvet tā viṣṇur ābharad urukramas tveṣitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2829: RV_8,077.10c śatam mahiṣān kṣīrapākam odanaṃ varāham indra emuṣam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2830: RV_8,077.11a tuvikṣaṃ te sukṛtaṃ sūmayaṃ dhanuḥ sādhur bundo hiraṇyayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2831: RV_8,077.11c ubhā te bāhū raṇyā susaṃskṛta ṛdūpe cid ṛdūvṛdhā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2832: RV_8,078.01a puroḷāśaṃ no andhasa indra sahasram ā bhara |
GV01rv_hn08u:2834: RV_8,078.02a ā no bhara vyañjanaṃ gām aśvam abhyañjanam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2836: RV_8,078.03a uta naḥ karṇaśobhanā purūṇi dhṛṣṇav ā bhara |
GV01rv_hn08u:2838: RV_8,078.04a nakīṃ vṛdhīka indra te na suṣā na sudā uta |
GV01rv_hn08u:2840: RV_8,078.05a nakīm indro nikartave na śakraḥ pariśaktave |
GV01rv_hn08u:2842: RV_8,078.06a sa manyum martyānām adabdho ni cikīṣate |
GV01rv_hn08u:2844: RV_8,078.07a kratva it pūrṇam udaraṃ turasyāsti vidhataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2846: RV_8,078.08a tve vasūni saṃgatā viśvā ca soma saubhagā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2848: RV_8,078.09a tvām id yavayur mama kāmo gavyur hiraṇyayuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2850: RV_8,078.10a taved indrāham āśasā haste dātraṃ canā dade |
GV01rv_hn08u:2851: RV_8,078.10c dinasya vā maghavan sambhṛtasya vā pūrdhi yavasya kāśinā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2852: RV_8,079.01a ayaṃ kṛtnur agṛbhīto viśvajid udbhid it somaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2854: RV_8,079.02a abhy ūrṇoti yan nagnam bhiṣakti viśvaṃ yat turam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2855: RV_8,079.02c prem andhaḥ khyan niḥ śroṇo bhūt ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2858: RV_8,079.04a tvaṃ cittī tava dakṣair diva ā pṛthivyā ṛjīṣin |
GV01rv_hn08u:2860: RV_8,079.05a arthino yanti ced arthaṃ gacchān id daduṣo rātim |
GV01rv_hn08u:2862: RV_8,079.06a vidad yat pūrvyaṃ naṣṭam ud īm ṛtāyum īrayat |
GV01rv_hn08u:2864: RV_8,079.07a suśevo no mṛḷayākur adṛptakratur avātaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2865: RV_8,079.07c bhavā naḥ soma śaṃ hṛde ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2866: RV_8,079.08a mā naḥ soma saṃ vīvijo mā vi bībhiṣathā rājan |
GV01rv_hn08u:2867: RV_8,079.08c mā no hārdi tviṣā vadhīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2868: RV_8,079.09a ava yat sve sadhasthe devānāṃ durmatīr īkṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2869: RV_8,079.09c rājann apa dviṣaḥ sedha mīḍhvo apa sridhaḥ sedha ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2870: RV_8,080.01a nahy anyam baḷākaram marḍitāraṃ śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:2872: RV_8,080.02a yo naḥ śaśvat purāvithāmṛdhro vājasātaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:2873: RV_8,080.02c sa tvaṃ na indra mṛḷaya ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2874: RV_8,080.03a kim aṅga radhracodanaḥ sunvānasyāvited asi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2875: RV_8,080.03c kuvit sv indra ṇaḥ śakaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2876: RV_8,080.04a indra pra ṇo ratham ava paścāc cit santam adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2878: RV_8,080.05a hanto nu kim āsase prathamaṃ no rathaṃ kṛdhi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2880: RV_8,080.06a avā no vājayuṃ rathaṃ sukaraṃ te kim it pari |
GV01rv_hn08u:2882: RV_8,080.07a indra dṛhyasva pūr asi bhadrā ta eti niṣkṛtam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2884: RV_8,080.08a mā sīm avadya ā bhāg urvī kāṣṭhā hitaṃ dhanam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2886: RV_8,080.09a turīyaṃ nāma yajñiyaṃ yadā karas tad uśmasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:2887: RV_8,080.09c ād it patir na ohase ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2888: RV_8,080.10a avīvṛdhad vo amṛtā amandīd ekadyūr devā uta yāś ca devīḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2889: RV_8,080.10c tasmā u rādhaḥ kṛṇuta praśastam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2890: RV_8,081.01a ā tū na indra kṣumantaṃ citraṃ grābhaṃ saṃ gṛbhāya |
GV01rv_hn08u:2892: RV_8,081.02a vidmā hi tvā tuvikūrmiṃ tuvideṣṇaṃ tuvīmagham |
GV01rv_hn08u:2894: RV_8,081.03a nahi tvā śūra devā na martāso ditsantam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2896: RV_8,081.04a eto nv indraṃ stavāmeśānaṃ vasvaḥ svarājam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2898: RV_8,081.05a pra stoṣad upa gāsiṣac chravat sāma gīyamānam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2900: RV_8,081.06a ā no bhara dakṣiṇenābhi savyena pra mṛśa |
GV01rv_hn08u:2901: RV_8,081.06c indra mā no vasor nir bhāk ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2902: RV_8,081.07a upa kramasvā bhara dhṛṣatā dhṛṣṇo janānām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2904: RV_8,081.08a indra ya u nu te asti vājo viprebhiḥ sanitvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2906: RV_8,081.09a sadyojuvas te vājā asmabhyaṃ viśvaścandrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2908: RV_8,082.01a ā pra drava parāvato 'rvāvataś ca vṛtrahan |
GV01rv_hn08u:2910: RV_8,082.02a tīvrāḥ somāsa ā gahi sutāso mādayiṣṇavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2912: RV_8,082.03a iṣā mandasvād u te 'raṃ varāya manyave |
GV01rv_hn08u:2913: RV_8,082.03c bhuvat ta indra śaṃ hṛde ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2914: RV_8,082.04a ā tv aśatrav ā gahi ny ukthāni ca hūyase |
GV01rv_hn08u:2916: RV_8,082.05a tubhyāyam adribhiḥ suto gobhiḥ śrīto madāya kam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2918: RV_8,082.06a indra śrudhi su me havam asme sutasya gomataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2920: RV_8,082.07a ya indra camaseṣv ā somaś camūṣu te sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2922: RV_8,082.08a yo apsu candramā iva somaś camūṣu dadṛśe |
GV01rv_hn08u:2924: RV_8,082.09a yaṃ te śyenaḥ padābharat tiro rajāṃsy aspṛtam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2926: RV_8,083.01a devānām id avo mahat tad ā vṛṇīmahe vayam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2928: RV_8,083.02a te naḥ santu yujaḥ sadā varuṇo mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2930: RV_8,083.03a ati no viṣpitā puru naubhir apo na parṣatha |
GV01rv_hn08u:2932: RV_8,083.04a vāmaṃ no astv aryaman vāmaṃ varuṇa śaṃsyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2934: RV_8,083.05a vāmasya hi pracetasa īśānāśo riśādasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2936: RV_8,083.06a vayam id vaḥ sudānavaḥ kṣiyanto yānto adhvann ā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2938: RV_8,083.07a adhi na indraiṣāṃ viṣṇo sajātyānām |
GV01rv_hn08u:2940: RV_8,083.08a pra bhrātṛtvaṃ sudānavo 'dha dvitā samānyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2942: RV_8,083.09a yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānava indrajyeṣṭhā abhidyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2943: RV_8,083.09c adhā cid va uta bruve ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2944: RV_8,084.01a preṣṭhaṃ vo atithiṃ stuṣe mitram iva priyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2946: RV_8,084.02a kavim iva pracetasaṃ yaṃ devāso adha dvitā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2948: RV_8,084.03a tvaṃ yaviṣṭha dāśuṣo nṝṃḥ pāhi śṛṇudhī giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2950: RV_8,084.04a kayā te agne aṅgira ūrjo napād upastutim |
GV01rv_hn08u:2952: RV_8,084.05a dāśema kasya manasā yajñasya sahaso yaho |
GV01rv_hn08u:2953: RV_8,084.05c kad u voca idaṃ namaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2954: RV_8,084.06a adhā tvaṃ hi nas karo viśvā asmabhyaṃ sukṣitīḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2956: RV_8,084.07a kasya nūnam parīṇaso dhiyo jinvasi dampate |
GV01rv_hn08u:2958: RV_8,084.08a tam marjayanta sukratum puroyāvānam ājiṣu |
GV01rv_hn08u:2960: RV_8,084.09a kṣeti kṣemebhiḥ sādhubhir nakir yaṃ ghnanti hanti yaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2962: RV_8,085.01a ā me havaṃ nāsatyāśvinā gacchataṃ yuvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2964: RV_8,085.02a imam me stomam aśvinemam me śṛṇutaṃ havam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2966: RV_8,085.03a ayaṃ vāṃ kṛṣṇo aśvinā havate vājinīvasū |
GV01rv_hn08u:2968: RV_8,085.04a śṛṇutaṃ jaritur havaṃ kṛṣṇasya stuvato narā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2970: RV_8,085.05a chardir yantam adābhyaṃ viprāya stuvate narā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2972: RV_8,085.06a gacchataṃ dāśuṣo gṛham itthā stuvato aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2974: RV_8,085.07a yuñjāthāṃ rāsabhaṃ rathe vīḍvaṅge vṛṣaṇvasū |
GV01rv_hn08u:2976: RV_8,085.08a trivandhureṇa trivṛtā rathenā yātam aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2978: RV_8,085.09a nū me giro nāsatyāśvinā prāvataṃ yuvam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2980: RV_8,086.01a ubhā hi dasrā bhiṣajā mayobhuvobhā dakṣasya vacaso babhūvathuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:2981: RV_8,086.01c tā vāṃ viśvako havate tanūkṛthe mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2982: RV_8,086.02a kathā nūnaṃ vāṃ vimanā upa stavad yuvaṃ dhiyaṃ dadathur
GV01rv_hn08u:2984: RV_8,086.02c tā vāṃ viśvako havate tanūkṛthe mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2985: RV_8,086.03a yuvaṃ hi ṣmā purubhujemam edhatuṃ viṣṇāpve dadathur vasyaiṣṭaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:2986: RV_8,086.03c tā vāṃ viśvako havate tanūkṛthe mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2987: RV_8,086.04a uta tyaṃ vīraṃ dhanasām ṛjīṣiṇaṃ dūre cit santam avase
GV01rv_hn08u:2989: RV_8,086.04c yasya svādiṣṭhā sumatiḥ pitur yathā mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2990: RV_8,086.05a ṛtena devaḥ savitā śamāyata ṛtasya śṛṅgam urviyā vi paprathe
GV01rv_hn08u:2991: RV_8,086.05c ṛtaṃ sāsāha mahi cit pṛtanyato mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2992: RV_8,087.01a dyumnī vāṃ stomo aśvinā krivir na seka ā gatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:2993: RV_8,087.01c madhvaḥ sutasya sa divi priyo narā pātaṃ gaurāv iveriṇe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2994: RV_8,087.02a pibataṃ gharmam madhumantam aśvinā barhiḥ sīdataṃ narā |
GV01rv_hn08u:2995: RV_8,087.02c tā mandasānā manuṣo duroṇa ā ni pātaṃ vedasā vayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2996: RV_8,087.03a ā vāṃ viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ priyamedhā ahūṣata |
GV01rv_hn08u:2997: RV_8,087.03c tā vartir yātam upa vṛktabarhiṣo juṣṭaṃ yajñaṃ diviṣṭiṣu ||
GV01rv_hn08u:2998: RV_8,087.04a pibataṃ somam madhumantam aśvinā barhiḥ sīdataṃ sumat |
GV01rv_hn08u:2999: RV_8,087.04c tā vāvṛdhānā upa suṣṭutiṃ divo gantaṃ gaurāv iveriṇam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3000: RV_8,087.05a ā nūnaṃ yātam aśvināśvebhiḥ pruṣitapsubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3001: RV_8,087.05c dasrā hiraṇyavartanī śubhas patī pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3002: RV_8,087.06a vayaṃ hi vāṃ havāmahe vipanyavo viprāso vājasātaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:3003: RV_8,087.06c tā valgū dasrā purudaṃsasā dhiyāśvinā śruṣṭy ā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3004: RV_8,088.01a taṃ vo dasmam ṛtīṣahaṃ vasor mandānam andhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3005: RV_8,088.01c abhi vatsaṃ na svasareṣu dhenava indraṃ gīrbhir navāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3006: RV_8,088.02a dyukṣaṃ sudānuṃ taviṣībhir āvṛtaṃ giriṃ na purubhojasam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3007: RV_8,088.02c kṣumantaṃ vājaṃ śatinaṃ sahasriṇam makṣū gomantam īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3008: RV_8,088.03a na tvā bṛhanto adrayo varanta indra vīḷavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3009: RV_8,088.03c yad ditsasi stuvate māvate vasu nakiṣ ṭad ā mināti te ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3010: RV_8,088.04a yoddhāsi kratvā śavasota daṃsanā viśvā jātābhi majmanā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3011: RV_8,088.04c ā tvāyam arka ūtaye vavartati yaṃ gotamā ajījanan ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3012: RV_8,088.05a pra hi ririkṣa ojasā divo antebhyas pari |
GV01rv_hn08u:3013: RV_8,088.05c na tvā vivyāca raja indra pārthivam anu svadhāṃ vavakṣitha ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3014: RV_8,088.06a nakiḥ pariṣṭir maghavan maghasya te yad dāśuṣe daśasyasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:3015: RV_8,088.06c asmākam bodhy ucathasya coditā maṃhiṣṭho vājasātaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3016: RV_8,089.01a bṛhad indrāya gāyata maruto vṛtrahantamam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3017: RV_8,089.01c yena jyotir ajanayann ṛtāvṛdho devaṃ devāya jāgṛvi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3018: RV_8,089.02a apādhamad abhiśastīr aśastihāthendro dyumny ābhavat |
GV01rv_hn08u:3019: RV_8,089.02c devās ta indra sakhyāya yemire bṛhadbhāno marudgaṇa ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3020: RV_8,089.03a pra va indrāya bṛhate maruto brahmārcata |
GV01rv_hn08u:3021: RV_8,089.03c vṛtraṃ hanati vṛtrahā śatakratur vajreṇa śataparvaṇā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3022: RV_8,089.04a abhi pra bhara dhṛṣatā dhṛṣanmanaḥ śravaś cit te asad bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn08u:3023: RV_8,089.04c arṣantv āpo javasā vi mātaro hano vṛtraṃ jayā svaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3024: RV_8,089.05a yaj jāyathā apūrvya maghavan vṛtrahatyāya |
GV01rv_hn08u:3025: RV_8,089.05c tat pṛthivīm aprathayas tad astabhnā uta dyām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3026: RV_8,089.06a tat te yajño ajāyata tad arka uta haskṛtiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3027: RV_8,089.06c tad viśvam abhibhūr asi yaj jātaṃ yac ca jantvam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3028: RV_8,089.07a āmāsu pakvam airaya ā sūryaṃ rohayo divi |
GV01rv_hn08u:3029: RV_8,089.07c gharmaṃ na sāman tapatā suvṛktibhir juṣṭaṃ girvaṇase bṛhat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3030: RV_8,090.01a ā no viśvāsu havya indraḥ samatsu bhūṣatu |
GV01rv_hn08u:3031: RV_8,090.01c upa brahmāṇi savanāni vṛtrahā paramajyā ṛcīṣamaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3032: RV_8,090.02a tvaṃ dātā prathamo rādhasām asy asi satya īśānakṛt |
GV01rv_hn08u:3033: RV_8,090.02c tuvidyumnasya yujyā vṛṇīmahe putrasya śavaso mahaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3034: RV_8,090.03a brahmā ta indra girvaṇaḥ kriyante anatidbhutā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3035: RV_8,090.03c imā juṣasva haryaśva yojanendra yā te amanmahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3036: RV_8,090.04a tvaṃ hi satyo maghavann anānato vṛtrā bhūri nyṛñjase |
GV01rv_hn08u:3037: RV_8,090.04c sa tvaṃ śaviṣṭha vajrahasta dāśuṣe 'rvāñcaṃ rayim ā kṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3038: RV_8,090.05a tvam indra yaśā asy ṛjīṣī śavasas pate |
GV01rv_hn08u:3039: RV_8,090.05c tvaṃ vṛtrāṇi haṃsy apratīny eka id anuttā carṣaṇīdhṛtā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3040: RV_8,090.06a tam u tvā nūnam asura pracetasaṃ rādho bhāgam ivemahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:3041: RV_8,090.06c mahīva kṛttiḥ śaraṇā ta indra pra te sumnā no aśnavan ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3042: RV_8,091.01a kanyā vār avāyatī somam api srutāvidat |
GV01rv_hn08u:3043: RV_8,091.01c astam bharanty abravīd indrāya sunavai tvā śakrāya sunavai tvā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3044: RV_8,091.02a asau ya eṣi vīrako gṛhaṃ-gṛhaṃ vicākaśad |
GV01rv_hn08u:3045: RV_8,091.02c imaṃ jambhasutam piba dhānāvantaṃ karambhiṇam apūpavantam
GV01rv_hn08u:3047: RV_8,091.03a ā cana tvā cikitsāmo 'dhi cana tvā nemasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:3048: RV_8,091.03c śanair iva śanakair ivendrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3049: RV_8,091.04a kuvic chakat kuvit karat kuvin no vasyasas karat |
GV01rv_hn08u:3050: RV_8,091.04c kuvit patidviṣo yatīr indreṇa saṃgamāmahai ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3051: RV_8,091.05a imāni trīṇi viṣṭapā tānīndra vi rohaya |
GV01rv_hn08u:3052: RV_8,091.05c śiras tatasyorvarām ād idam ma upodare ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3053: RV_8,091.06a asau ca yā na urvarād imāṃ tanvam mama |
GV01rv_hn08u:3054: RV_8,091.06c atho tatasya yac chiraḥ sarvā tā romaśā kṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3055: RV_8,091.07a khe rathasya khe 'nasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:3056: RV_8,091.07c apālām indra triṣ pūtvy akṛṇoḥ sūryatvacam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3057: RV_8,092.01a pāntam ā vo andhasa indram abhi pra gāyata |
GV01rv_hn08u:3061: RV_8,092.03a indra in no mahānāṃ dātā vājānāṃ nṛtuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3063: RV_8,092.04a apād u śipry andhasaḥ sudakṣasya prahoṣiṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3065: RV_8,092.05a tam v abhi prārcatendraṃ somasya pītaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:3066: RV_8,092.05c tad id dhy asya vardhanam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3067: RV_8,092.06a asya pītvā madānāṃ devo devasyaujasā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3069: RV_8,092.07a tyam u vaḥ satrāsāhaṃ viśvāsu gīrṣv āyatam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3071: RV_8,092.08a yudhmaṃ santam anarvāṇaṃ somapām anapacyutam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3073: RV_8,092.09a śikṣā ṇa indra rāya ā puru vidvāṃ ṛcīṣama |
GV01rv_hn08u:3075: RV_8,092.10a ataś cid indra ṇa upā yāhi śatavājayā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3077: RV_8,092.11a ayāma dhīvato dhiyo 'rvadbhiḥ śakra godare |
GV01rv_hn08u:3079: RV_8,092.12a vayam u tvā śatakrato gāvo na yavaseṣv ā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3083: RV_8,092.14a tve su putra śavaso 'vṛtran kāmakātayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3085: RV_8,092.15a sa no vṛṣan saniṣṭhayā saṃ ghorayā dravitnvā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3087: RV_8,092.16a yas te nūnaṃ śatakratav indra dyumnitamo madaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3089: RV_8,092.17a yas te citraśravastamo ya indra vṛtrahantamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3091: RV_8,092.18a vidmā hi yas te adrivas tvādattaḥ satya somapāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3093: RV_8,092.19a indrāya madvane sutam pari ṣṭobhantu no giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3095: RV_8,092.20a yasmin viśvā adhi śriyo raṇanti sapta saṃsadaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3097: RV_8,092.21a trikadrukeṣu cetanaṃ devāso yajñam atnata |
GV01rv_hn08u:3098: RV_8,092.21c tam id vardhantu no giraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3099: RV_8,092.22a ā tvā viśantv indavaḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3101: RV_8,092.23a vivyaktha mahinā vṛṣan bhakṣaṃ somasya jāgṛve |
GV01rv_hn08u:3103: RV_8,092.24a araṃ ta indra kukṣaye somo bhavatu vṛtrahan |
GV01rv_hn08u:3105: RV_8,092.25a aram aśvāya gāyati śrutakakṣo araṃ gave |
GV01rv_hn08u:3107: RV_8,092.26a araṃ hi ṣma suteṣu ṇaḥ someṣv indra bhūṣasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:3109: RV_8,092.27a parākāttāc cid adrivas tvāṃ nakṣanta no giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3111: RV_8,092.28a evā hy asi vīrayur evā śūra uta sthiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3113: RV_8,092.29a evā rātis tuvīmagha viśvebhir dhāyi dhātṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3114: RV_8,092.29c adhā cid indra me sacā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3115: RV_8,092.30a mo ṣu brahmeva tandrayur bhuvo vājānām pate |
GV01rv_hn08u:3117: RV_8,092.31a mā na indrābhy ādiśaḥ sūro aktuṣv ā yaman |
GV01rv_hn08u:3119: RV_8,092.32a tvayed indra yujā vayam prati bruvīmahi spṛdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3121: RV_8,092.33a tvām id dhi tvāyavo 'nunonuvataś carān |
GV01rv_hn08u:3123: RV_8,093.01a ud ghed abhi śrutāmaghaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ naryāpasam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3125: RV_8,093.02a nava yo navatim puro bibheda bāhvojasā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3127: RV_8,093.03a sa na indraḥ śivaḥ sakhāśvāvad gomad yavamat |
GV01rv_hn08u:3129: RV_8,093.04a yad adya kac ca vṛtrahann udagā abhi sūrya |
GV01rv_hn08u:3130: RV_8,093.04c sarvaṃ tad indra te vaśe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3131: RV_8,093.05a yad vā pravṛddha satpate na marā iti manyase |
GV01rv_hn08u:3132: RV_8,093.05c uto tat satyam it tava ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3133: RV_8,093.06a ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire |
GV01rv_hn08u:3135: RV_8,093.07a tam indraṃ vājayāmasi mahe vṛtrāya hantave |
GV01rv_hn08u:3137: RV_8,093.08a indraḥ sa dāmane kṛta ojiṣṭhaḥ sa made hitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3139: RV_8,093.09a girā vajro na sambhṛtaḥ sabalo anapacyutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3141: RV_8,093.10a durge cin naḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi gṛṇāna indra girvaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3143: RV_8,093.11a yasya te nū cid ādiśaṃ na minanti svarājyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3145: RV_8,093.12a adhā te apratiṣkutaṃ devī śuṣmaṃ saparyataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3147: RV_8,093.13a tvam etad adhārayaḥ kṛṣṇāsu rohiṇīṣu ca |
GV01rv_hn08u:3149: RV_8,093.14a vi yad aher adha tviṣo viśve devāso akramuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3151: RV_8,093.15a ād u me nivaro bhuvad vṛtrahādiṣṭa pauṃsyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3153: RV_8,093.16a śrutaṃ vo vṛtrahantamam pra śardhaṃ carṣaṇīnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:3155: RV_8,093.17a ayā dhiyā ca gavyayā puruṇāman puruṣṭuta |
GV01rv_hn08u:3157: RV_8,093.18a bodhinmanā id astu no vṛtrahā bhūryāsutiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3159: RV_8,093.19a kayā tvaṃ na ūtyābhi pra mandase vṛṣan |
GV01rv_hn08u:3161: RV_8,093.20a kasya vṛṣā sute sacā niyutvān vṛṣabho raṇat |
GV01rv_hn08u:3163: RV_8,093.21a abhī ṣu ṇas tvaṃ rayim mandasānaḥ sahasriṇam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3165: RV_8,093.22a patnīvantaḥ sutā ima uśanto yanti vītaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:3167: RV_8,093.23a iṣṭā hotrā asṛkṣatendraṃ vṛdhāso adhvare |
GV01rv_hn08u:3169: RV_8,093.24a iha tyā sadhamādyā harī hiraṇyakeśyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3171: RV_8,093.25a tubhyaṃ somāḥ sutā ime stīrṇam barhir vibhāvaso |
GV01rv_hn08u:3173: RV_8,093.26a ā te dakṣaṃ vi rocanā dadhad ratnā vi dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:3175: RV_8,093.27a ā te dadhāmīndriyam ukthā viśvā śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:3177: RV_8,093.28a bhadram-bhadraṃ na ā bhareṣam ūrjaṃ śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:3179: RV_8,093.29a sa no viśvāny ā bhara suvitāni śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:3181: RV_8,093.30a tvām id vṛtrahantama sutāvanto havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:3183: RV_8,093.31a upa no haribhiḥ sutaṃ yāhi madānām pate |
GV01rv_hn08u:3185: RV_8,093.32a dvitā yo vṛtrahantamo vida indraḥ śatakratuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3187: RV_8,093.33a tvaṃ hi vṛtrahann eṣām pātā somānām asi |
GV01rv_hn08u:3189: RV_8,093.34a indra iṣe dadātu na ṛbhukṣaṇam ṛbhuṃ rayim |
GV01rv_hn08u:3191: RV_8,094.01a gaur dhayati marutāṃ śravasyur mātā maghonām |
GV01rv_hn08u:3193: RV_8,094.02a yasyā devā upasthe vratā viśve dhārayante |
GV01rv_hn08u:3195: RV_8,094.03a tat su no viśve arya ā sadā gṛṇanti kāravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3197: RV_8,094.04a asti somo ayaṃ sutaḥ pibanty asya marutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3199: RV_8,094.05a pibanti mitro aryamā tanā pūtasya varuṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3201: RV_8,094.06a uto nv asya joṣam āṃ indraḥ sutasya gomataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3203: RV_8,094.07a kad atviṣanta sūrayas tira āpa iva sridhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3205: RV_8,094.08a kad vo adya mahānāṃ devānām avo vṛṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:3207: RV_8,094.09a ā ye viśvā pārthivāni paprathan rocanā divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3209: RV_8,094.10a tyān nu pūtadakṣaso divo vo maruto huve |
GV01rv_hn08u:3211: RV_8,094.11a tyān nu ye vi rodasī tastabhur maruto huve |
GV01rv_hn08u:3213: RV_8,094.12a tyaṃ nu mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ giriṣṭhāṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ huve |
GV01rv_hn08u:3215: RV_8,095.01a ā tvā giro rathīr ivāsthuḥ suteṣu girvaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3216: RV_8,095.01c abhi tvā sam anūṣatendra vatsaṃ na mātaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3217: RV_8,095.02a ā tvā śukrā acucyavuḥ sutāsa indra girvaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3218: RV_8,095.02c pibā tv asyāndhasa indra viśvāsu te hitam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3219: RV_8,095.03a pibā somam madāya kam indra śyenābhṛtaṃ sutam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3220: RV_8,095.03c tvaṃ hi śaśvatīnām patī rājā viśām asi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3221: RV_8,095.04a śrudhī havaṃ tiraścyā indra yas tvā saparyati |
GV01rv_hn08u:3222: RV_8,095.04c suvīryasya gomato rāyas pūrdhi mahāṃ asi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3223: RV_8,095.05a indra yas te navīyasīṃ giram mandrām ajījanat |
GV01rv_hn08u:3224: RV_8,095.05c cikitvinmanasaṃ dhiyam pratnām ṛtasya pipyuṣīm ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3225: RV_8,095.06a tam u ṣṭavāma yaṃ gira indram ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3226: RV_8,095.06c purūṇy asya pauṃsyā siṣāsanto vanāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3227: RV_8,095.07a eto nv indraṃ stavāma śuddhaṃ śuddhena sāmnā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3228: RV_8,095.07c śuddhair ukthair vāvṛdhvāṃsaṃ śuddha āśīrvān mamattu ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3229: RV_8,095.08a indra śuddho na ā gahi śuddhaḥ śuddhābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3230: RV_8,095.08c śuddho rayiṃ ni dhāraya śuddho mamaddhi somyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3231: RV_8,095.09a indra śuddho hi no rayiṃ śuddho ratnāni dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:3232: RV_8,095.09c śuddho vṛtrāṇi jighnase śuddho vājaṃ siṣāsasi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3233: RV_8,096.01a asmā uṣāsa ātiranta yāmam indrāya naktam ūrmyāḥ suvācaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3234: RV_8,096.01c asmā āpo mātaraḥ sapta tasthur nṛbhyas tarāya sindhavaḥ supārāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3235: RV_8,096.02a atividdhā vithureṇā cid astrā triḥ sapta sānu saṃhitā girīṇām
GV01rv_hn08u:3236: RV_8,096.02c na tad devo na martyas tuturyād yāni pravṛddho vṛṣabhaś
GV01rv_hn08u:3238: RV_8,096.03a indrasya vajra āyaso nimiśla indrasya bāhvor bhūyiṣṭham ojaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3239: RV_8,096.03c śīrṣann indrasya kratavo nireka āsann eṣanta śrutyā upāke ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3240: RV_8,096.04a manye tvā yajñiyaṃ yajñiyānām manye tvā cyavanam acyutānām |
GV01rv_hn08u:3241: RV_8,096.04c manye tvā satvanām indra ketum manye tvā vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnām
GV01rv_hn08u:3242: RV_8,096.05a ā yad vajram bāhvor indra dhatse madacyutam ahaye hantavā u |
GV01rv_hn08u:3243: RV_8,096.05c pra parvatā anavanta pra gāvaḥ pra brahmāṇo abhinakṣanta indram ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3244: RV_8,096.06a tam u ṣṭavāma ya imā jajāna viśvā jātāny avarāṇy asmāt |
GV01rv_hn08u:3245: RV_8,096.06c indreṇa mitraṃ didhiṣema gīrbhir upo namobhir vṛṣabhaṃ viśema ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3246: RV_8,096.07a vṛtrasya tvā śvasathād īṣamāṇā viśve devā ajahur ye sakhāyaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:3247: RV_8,096.07c marudbhir indra sakhyaṃ te astv athemā viśvāḥ pṛtanā jayāsi
GV01rv_hn08u:3248: RV_8,096.08a triḥ ṣaṣṭis tvā maruto vāvṛdhānā usrā iva rāśayo yajñiyāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3249: RV_8,096.08c upa tvemaḥ kṛdhi no bhāgadheyaṃ śuṣmaṃ ta enā haviṣā vidhema
GV01rv_hn08u:3250: RV_8,096.09a tigmam āyudham marutām anīkaṃ kas ta indra prati vajraṃ
GV01rv_hn08u:3252: RV_8,096.09c anāyudhāso asurā adevāś cakreṇa tāṃ apa vapa ṛjīṣin ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3253: RV_8,096.10a maha ugrāya tavase suvṛktim preraya śivatamāya paśvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3254: RV_8,096.10c girvāhase gira indrāya pūrvīr dhehi tanve kuvid aṅga vedat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3255: RV_8,096.11a ukthavāhase vibhve manīṣāṃ druṇā na pāram īrayā nadīnām |
GV01rv_hn08u:3256: RV_8,096.11c ni spṛśa dhiyā tanvi śrutasya juṣṭatarasya kuvid aṅga vedat
GV01rv_hn08u:3257: RV_8,096.12a tad viviḍḍhi yat ta indro jujoṣat stuhi suṣṭutiṃ namasā
GV01rv_hn08u:3259: RV_8,096.12c upa bhūṣa jaritar mā ruvaṇyaḥ śrāvayā vācaṃ kuvid aṅga vedat
GV01rv_hn08u:3260: RV_8,096.13a ava drapso aṃśumatīm atiṣṭhad iyānaḥ kṛṣṇo daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3261: RV_8,096.13c āvat tam indraḥ śacyā dhamantam apa snehitīr nṛmaṇā adhatta
GV01rv_hn08u:3262: RV_8,096.14a drapsam apaśyaṃ viṣuṇe carantam upahvare nadyo aṃśumatyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3263: RV_8,096.14c nabho na kṛṣṇam avatasthivāṃsam iṣyāmi vo vṛṣaṇo yudhyatājau ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3264: RV_8,096.15a adha drapso aṃśumatyā upasthe 'dhārayat tanvaṃ titviṣāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3265: RV_8,096.15c viśo adevīr abhy ācarantīr bṛhaspatinā yujendraḥ sasāhe ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3266: RV_8,096.16a tvaṃ ha tyat saptabhyo jāyamāno 'śatrubhyo abhavaḥ śatrur indra |
GV01rv_hn08u:3267: RV_8,096.16c gūḷhe dyāvāpṛthivī anv avindo vibhumadbhyo bhuvanebhyo raṇaṃ dhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3268: RV_8,096.17a tvaṃ ha tyad apratimānam ojo vajreṇa vajrin dhṛṣito jaghantha
GV01rv_hn08u:3269: RV_8,096.17c tvaṃ śuṣṇasyāvātiro vadhatrais tvaṃ gā indra śacyed avindaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3270: RV_8,096.18a tvaṃ ha tyad vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnāṃ ghano vṛtrāṇāṃ taviṣo babhūtha |
GV01rv_hn08u:3271: RV_8,096.18c tvaṃ sindhūṃr asṛjas tastabhānān tvam apo ajayo dāsapatnīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3272: RV_8,096.19a sa sukratū raṇitā yaḥ suteṣv anuttamanyur yo aheva revān |
GV01rv_hn08u:3273: RV_8,096.19c ya eka in nary apāṃsi kartā sa vṛtrahā pratīd anyam āhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3274: RV_8,096.20a sa vṛtrahendraś carṣaṇīdhṛt taṃ suṣṭutyā havyaṃ huvema |
GV01rv_hn08u:3275: RV_8,096.20c sa prāvitā maghavā no 'dhivaktā sa vājasya śravasyasya dātā
GV01rv_hn08u:3276: RV_8,096.21a sa vṛtrahendra ṛbhukṣāḥ sadyo jajñāno havyo babhūva |
GV01rv_hn08u:3277: RV_8,096.21c kṛṇvann apāṃsi naryā purūṇi somo na pīto havyaḥ sakhibhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3278: RV_8,097.01a yā indra bhuja ābharaḥ svarvāṃ asurebhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3279: RV_8,097.01c stotāram in maghavann asya vardhaya ye ca tve vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:3280: RV_8,097.02a yam indra dadhiṣe tvam aśvaṃ gām bhāgam avyayam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3281: RV_8,097.02c yajamāne sunvati dakṣiṇāvati tasmin taṃ dhehi mā paṇau ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3282: RV_8,097.03a ya indra sasty avrato 'nuṣvāpam adevayuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3283: RV_8,097.03c svaiḥ ṣa evair mumurat poṣyaṃ rayiṃ sanutar dhehi taṃ tataḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:3284: RV_8,097.04a yac chakrāsi parāvati yad arvāvati vṛtrahan |
GV01rv_hn08u:3285: RV_8,097.04c atas tvā gīrbhir dyugad indra keśibhiḥ sutāvāṃ ā vivāsati ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3286: RV_8,097.05a yad vāsi rocane divaḥ samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi |
GV01rv_hn08u:3287: RV_8,097.05c yat pārthive sadane vṛtrahantama yad antarikṣa ā gahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3288: RV_8,097.06a sa naḥ someṣu somapāḥ suteṣu śavasas pate |
GV01rv_hn08u:3289: RV_8,097.06c mādayasva rādhasā sūnṛtāvatendra rāyā parīṇasā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3290: RV_8,097.07a mā na indra parā vṛṇag bhavā naḥ sadhamādyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3291: RV_8,097.07c tvaṃ na ūtī tvam in na āpyam mā na indra parā vṛṇak ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3292: RV_8,097.08a asme indra sacā sute ni ṣadā pītaye madhu |
GV01rv_hn08u:3293: RV_8,097.08c kṛdhī jaritre maghavann avo mahad asme indra sacā sute ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3294: RV_8,097.09a na tvā devāsa āśata na martyāso adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3295: RV_8,097.09c viśvā jātāni śavasābhibhūr asi na tvā devāsa āśata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3296: RV_8,097.10a viśvāḥ pṛtanā abhibhūtaraṃ naraṃ sajūs tatakṣur indraṃ jajanuś ca rājase |
GV01rv_hn08u:3297: RV_8,097.10c kratvā variṣṭhaṃ vara āmurim utogram ojiṣṭhaṃ tavasaṃ tarasvinam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3298: RV_8,097.11a sam īṃ rebhāso asvarann indraṃ somasya pītaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:3299: RV_8,097.11c svarpatiṃ yad īṃ vṛdhe dhṛtavrato hy ojasā sam ūtibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3300: RV_8,097.12a nemiṃ namanti cakṣasā meṣaṃ viprā abhisvarā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3301: RV_8,097.12c sudītayo vo adruho 'pi karṇe tarasvinaḥ sam ṛkvabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3302: RV_8,097.13a tam indraṃ johavīmi maghavānam ugraṃ satrā dadhānam apratiṣkutaṃ śavāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn08u:3303: RV_8,097.13c maṃhiṣṭho gīrbhir ā ca yajñiyo vavartad rāye no viśvā supathā kṛṇotu vajrī ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3304: RV_8,097.14a tvam pura indra cikid enā vy ojasā śaviṣṭha śakra nāśayadhyai
GV01rv_hn08u:3305: RV_8,097.14c tvad viśvāni bhuvanāni vajrin dyāvā rejete pṛthivī ca bhīṣā
GV01rv_hn08u:3306: RV_8,097.15a tan ma ṛtam indra śūra citra pātv apo na vajrin duritāti parṣi bhūri |
GV01rv_hn08u:3307: RV_8,097.15c kadā na indra rāya ā daśasyer viśvapsnyasya spṛhayāyyasya rājan ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3308: RV_8,098.01a indrāya sāma gāyata viprāya bṛhate bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn08u:3310: RV_8,098.02a tvam indrābhibhūr asi tvaṃ sūryam arocayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3312: RV_8,098.03a vibhrājañ jyotiṣā svar agaccho rocanaṃ divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3313: RV_8,098.03c devās ta indra sakhyāya yemire ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3314: RV_8,098.04a endra no gadhi priyaḥ satrājid agohyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3315: RV_8,098.04c girir na viśvatas pṛthuḥ patir divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3316: RV_8,098.05a abhi hi satya somapā ubhe babhūtha rodasī |
GV01rv_hn08u:3317: RV_8,098.05c indrāsi sunvato vṛdhaḥ patir divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3318: RV_8,098.06a tvaṃ hi śaśvatīnām indra dartā purām asi |
GV01rv_hn08u:3319: RV_8,098.06c hantā dasyor manor vṛdhaḥ patir divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3320: RV_8,098.07a adhā hīndra girvaṇa upa tvā kāmān mahaḥ sasṛjmahe |
GV01rv_hn08u:3322: RV_8,098.08a vār ṇa tvā yavyābhir vardhanti śūra brahmāṇi |
GV01rv_hn08u:3324: RV_8,098.09a yuñjanti harī iṣirasya gāthayorau ratha uruyuge |
GV01rv_hn08u:3326: RV_8,098.10a tvaṃ na indrā bharaṃ ojo nṛmṇaṃ śatakrato vicarṣaṇe |
GV01rv_hn08u:3328: RV_8,098.11a tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā vaso tvam mātā śatakrato babhūvitha |
GV01rv_hn08u:3330: RV_8,098.12a tvāṃ śuṣmin puruhūta vājayantam upa bruve śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn08u:3332: RV_8,099.01a tvām idā hyo naro 'pīpyan vajrin bhūrṇayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3333: RV_8,099.01c sa indra stomavāhasām iha śrudhy upa svasaram ā gahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3334: RV_8,099.02a matsvā suśipra harivas tad īmahe tve ā bhūṣanti vedhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3335: RV_8,099.02c tava śravāṃsy upamāny ukthyā suteṣv indra girvaṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3336: RV_8,099.03a śrāyanta iva sūryaṃ viśved indrasya bhakṣata |
GV01rv_hn08u:3337: RV_8,099.03c vasūni jāte janamāna ojasā prati bhāgaṃ na dīdhima ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3338: RV_8,099.04a anarśarātiṃ vasudām upa stuhi bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3339: RV_8,099.04c so asya kāmaṃ vidhato na roṣati mano dānāya codayan ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3340: RV_8,099.05a tvam indra pratūrtiṣv abhi viśvā asi spṛdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3341: RV_8,099.05c aśastihā janitā viśvatūr asi tvaṃ tūrya taruṣyataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3342: RV_8,099.06a anu te śuṣmaṃ turayantam īyatuḥ kṣoṇī śiśuṃ na mātarā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3343: RV_8,099.06c viśvās te spṛdhaḥ śnathayanta manyave vṛtraṃ yad indra tūrvasi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3344: RV_8,099.07a ita ūtī vo ajaram prahetāram aprahitam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3345: RV_8,099.07c āśuṃ jetāraṃ hetāraṃ rathītamam atūrtaṃ tugryāvṛdham ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3346: RV_8,099.08a iṣkartāram aniṣkṛtaṃ sahaskṛtaṃ śatamūtiṃ śatakratum |
GV01rv_hn08u:3347: RV_8,099.08c samānam indram avase havāmahe vasavānaṃ vasūjuvam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3348: RV_8,100.01a ayaṃ ta emi tanvā purastād viśve devā abhi mā yanti paścāt |
GV01rv_hn08u:3349: RV_8,100.01c yadā mahyaṃ dīdharo bhāgam indrād in mayā kṛṇavo vīryāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3350: RV_8,100.02a dadhāmi te madhuno bhakṣam agre hitas te bhāgaḥ suto astu somaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3351: RV_8,100.02c asaś ca tvaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ sakhā me 'dhā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3352: RV_8,100.03a pra su stomam bharata vājayanta indrāya satyaṃ yadi satyam
GV01rv_hn08u:3354: RV_8,100.03c nendro astīti nema u tva āha ka īṃ dadarśa kam abhi ṣṭavāma
GV01rv_hn08u:3355: RV_8,100.04a ayam asmi jaritaḥ paśya meha viśvā jātāny abhy asmi mahnā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3356: RV_8,100.04c ṛtasya mā pradiśo vardhayanty ādardiro bhuvanā dardarīmi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3357: RV_8,100.05a ā yan mā venā aruhann ṛtasyaṃ ekam āsīnaṃ haryatasya pṛṣṭhe |
GV01rv_hn08u:3358: RV_8,100.05c manaś cin me hṛda ā praty avocad acikradañ chiśumantaḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:3360: RV_8,100.06a viśvet tā te savaneṣu pravācyā yā cakartha maghavann indra
GV01rv_hn08u:3362: RV_8,100.06c pārāvataṃ yat purusambhṛtaṃ vasv apāvṛṇoḥ śarabhāya
GV01rv_hn08u:3364: RV_8,100.07a pra nūnaṃ dhāvatā pṛthaṅ neha yo vo avāvarīt |
GV01rv_hn08u:3365: RV_8,100.07c ni ṣīṃ vṛtrasya marmaṇi vajram indro apīpatat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3366: RV_8,100.08a manojavā ayamāna āyasīm atarat puram |
GV01rv_hn08u:3367: RV_8,100.08c divaṃ suparṇo gatvāya somaṃ vajriṇa ābharat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3368: RV_8,100.09a samudre antaḥ śayata udnā vajro abhīvṛtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3369: RV_8,100.09c bharanty asmai saṃyataḥ puraḥprasravaṇā balim ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3370: RV_8,100.10a yad vāg vadanty avicetanāni rāṣṭrī devānāṃ niṣasāda mandrā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3371: RV_8,100.10c catasra ūrjaṃ duduhe payāṃsi kva svid asyāḥ paramaṃ jagāma ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3372: RV_8,100.11a devīṃ vācam ajanayanta devās tāṃ viśvarūpāḥ paśavo vadanti |
GV01rv_hn08u:3373: RV_8,100.11c sā no mandreṣam ūrjaṃ duhānā dhenur vāg asmān upa suṣṭutaitu
GV01rv_hn08u:3374: RV_8,100.12a sakhe viṣṇo vitaraṃ vi kramasva dyaur dehi lokaṃ vajrāya
GV01rv_hn08u:3376: RV_8,100.12c hanāva vṛtraṃ riṇacāva sindhūn indrasya yantu prasave visṛṣṭāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3377: RV_8,101.01a ṛdhag itthā sa martyaḥ śaśame devatātaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:3378: RV_8,101.01c yo nūnam mitrāvaruṇāv abhiṣṭaya ācakre havyadātaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3379: RV_8,101.02a varṣiṣṭhakṣatrā urucakṣasā narā rājānā dīrghaśruttamā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3380: RV_8,101.02c tā bāhutā na daṃsanā ratharyataḥ sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3381: RV_8,101.03a pra yo vām mitrāvaruṇājiro dūto adravat |
GV01rv_hn08u:3383: RV_8,101.04a na yaḥ sampṛcche na punar havītave na saṃvādāya ramate |
GV01rv_hn08u:3384: RV_8,101.04c tasmān no adya samṛter uruṣyatam bāhubhyāṃ na uruṣyatam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3385: RV_8,101.05a pra mitrāya prāryamṇe sacathyam ṛtāvaso |
GV01rv_hn08u:3386: RV_8,101.05c varūthyaṃ varuṇe chandyaṃ vaca stotraṃ rājasu gāyata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3387: RV_8,101.06a te hinvire aruṇaṃ jenyaṃ vasv ekam putraṃ tisṝṇām |
GV01rv_hn08u:3388: RV_8,101.06c te dhāmāny amṛtā martyānām adabdhā abhi cakṣate ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3389: RV_8,101.07a ā me vacāṃsy udyatā dyumattamāni kartvā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3390: RV_8,101.07c ubhā yātaṃ nāsatyā sajoṣasā prati havyāni vītaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3391: RV_8,101.08a rātiṃ yad vām arakṣasaṃ havāmahe yuvābhyāṃ vājinīvasū |
GV01rv_hn08u:3392: RV_8,101.08c prācīṃ hotrām pratirantāv itaṃ narā gṛṇānā jamadagninā ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3393: RV_8,101.09a ā no yajñaṃ divispṛśaṃ vāyo yāhi sumanmabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3394: RV_8,101.09c antaḥ pavitra upari śrīṇāno 'yaṃ śukro ayāmi te ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3395: RV_8,101.10a vety adhvaryuḥ pathibhī rajiṣṭhaiḥ prati havyāni vītaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:3396: RV_8,101.10c adhā niyutva ubhayasya naḥ piba śuciṃ somaṃ gavāśiram ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3397: RV_8,101.11a baṇ mahāṃ asi sūrya baḷ āditya mahāṃ asi |
GV01rv_hn08u:3398: RV_8,101.11c mahas te sato mahimā panasyate 'ddhā deva mahāṃ asi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3399: RV_8,101.12a baṭ sūrya śravasā mahāṃ asi satrā deva mahāṃ asi |
GV01rv_hn08u:3400: RV_8,101.12c mahnā devānām asuryaḥ purohito vibhu jyotir adābhyam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3401: RV_8,101.13a iyaṃ yā nīcy arkiṇī rūpā rohiṇyā kṛtā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3402: RV_8,101.13c citreva praty adarśy āyaty antar daśasu bāhuṣu ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3403: RV_8,101.14a prajā ha tisro atyāyam īyur ny anyā arkam abhito viviśre |
GV01rv_hn08u:3404: RV_8,101.14c bṛhad dha tasthau bhuvaneṣv antaḥ pavamāno harita ā viveśa ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3405: RV_8,101.15a mātā rudrāṇāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ svasādityānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3406: RV_8,101.15c pra nu vocaṃ cikituṣe janāya mā gām anāgām aditiṃ vadhiṣṭa ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3407: RV_8,101.16a vacovidaṃ vācam udīrayantīṃ viśvābhir dhībhir upatiṣṭhamānām
GV01rv_hn08u:3408: RV_8,101.16c devīṃ devebhyaḥ pary eyuṣīṃ gām ā māvṛkta martyo dabhracetāḥ
GV01rv_hn08u:3409: RV_8,102.01a tvam agne bṛhad vayo dadhāsi deva dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:3411: RV_8,102.02a sa na īḷānayā saha devāṃ agne duvasyuvā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3413: RV_8,102.03a tvayā ha svid yujā vayaṃ codiṣṭhena yaviṣṭhya |
GV01rv_hn08u:3415: RV_8,102.04a aurvabhṛguvac chucim apnavānavad ā huve |
GV01rv_hn08u:3417: RV_8,102.05a huve vātasvanaṃ kavim parjanyakrandyaṃ sahaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3419: RV_8,102.06a ā savaṃ savitur yathā bhagasyeva bhujiṃ huve |
GV01rv_hn08u:3421: RV_8,102.07a agniṃ vo vṛdhantam adhvarāṇām purūtamam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3423: RV_8,102.08a ayaṃ yathā na ābhuvat tvaṣṭā rūpeva takṣyā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3425: RV_8,102.09a ayaṃ viśvā abhi śriyo 'gnir deveṣu patyate |
GV01rv_hn08u:3426: RV_8,102.09c ā vājair upa no gamat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3427: RV_8,102.10a viśveṣām iha stuhi hotṝṇāṃ yaśastamam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3429: RV_8,102.11a śīram pāvakaśociṣaṃ jyeṣṭho yo dameṣv ā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3431: RV_8,102.12a tam arvantaṃ na sānasiṃ gṛṇīhi vipra śuṣmiṇam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3433: RV_8,102.13a upa tvā jāmayo giro dediśatīr haviṣkṛtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3435: RV_8,102.14a yasya tridhātv avṛtam barhis tasthāv asaṃdinam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3436: RV_8,102.14c āpaś cin ni dadhā padam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3439: RV_8,102.16a agne ghṛtasya dhītibhis tepāno deva śociṣā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3440: RV_8,102.16c ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3441: RV_8,102.17a taṃ tvājananta mātaraḥ kaviṃ devāso aṅgiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3443: RV_8,102.18a pracetasaṃ tvā kave 'gne dūtaṃ vareṇyam |
GV01rv_hn08u:3445: RV_8,102.19a nahi me asty aghnyā na svadhitir vananvati |
GV01rv_hn08u:3447: RV_8,102.20a yad agne kāni kāni cid ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi |
GV01rv_hn08u:3449: RV_8,102.21a yad atty upajihvikā yad vamro atisarpati |
GV01rv_hn08u:3450: RV_8,102.21c sarvaṃ tad astu te ghṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3451: RV_8,102.22a agnim indhāno manasā dhiyaṃ saceta martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3453: RV_8,103.01a adarśi gātuvittamo yasmin vratāny ādadhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3454: RV_8,103.01c upo ṣu jātam āryasya vardhanam agniṃ nakṣanta no giraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3455: RV_8,103.02a pra daivodāso agnir devāṃ acchā na majmanā |
GV01rv_hn08u:3456: RV_8,103.02c anu mātaram pṛthivīṃ vi vāvṛte tasthau nākasya sānavi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3457: RV_8,103.03a yasmād rejanta kṛṣṭayaś carkṛtyāni kṛṇvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3458: RV_8,103.03c sahasrasām medhasātāv iva tmanāgniṃ dhībhiḥ saparyata ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3459: RV_8,103.04a pra yaṃ rāye ninīṣasi marto yas te vaso dāśat |
GV01rv_hn08u:3460: RV_8,103.04c sa vīraṃ dhatte agna ukthaśaṃsinaṃ tmanā sahasrapoṣiṇam ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3461: RV_8,103.05a sa dṛḷhe cid abhi tṛṇatti vājam arvatā sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3462: RV_8,103.05c tve devatrā sadā purūvaso viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3463: RV_8,103.06a yo viśvā dayate vasu hotā mandro janānām |
GV01rv_hn08u:3464: RV_8,103.06c madhor na pātrā prathamāny asmai pra stomā yanty agnaye ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3465: RV_8,103.07a aśvaṃ na gīrbhī rathyaṃ sudānavo marmṛjyante devayavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3466: RV_8,103.07c ubhe toke tanaye dasma viśpate parṣi rādho maghonām ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3467: RV_8,103.08a pra maṃhiṣṭhāya gāyata ṛtāvne bṛhate śukraśociṣe |
GV01rv_hn08u:3469: RV_8,103.09a ā vaṃsate maghavā vīravad yaśaḥ samiddho dyumny āhutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3470: RV_8,103.09c kuvin no asya sumatir navīyasy acchā vājebhir āgamat ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3471: RV_8,103.10a preṣṭham u priyāṇāṃ stuhy āsāvātithim |
GV01rv_hn08u:3473: RV_8,103.11a uditā yo niditā veditā vasv ā yajñiyo vavartati |
GV01rv_hn08u:3474: RV_8,103.11c duṣṭarā yasya pravaṇe normayo dhiyā vājaṃ siṣāsataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3475: RV_8,103.12a mā no hṛṇītām atithir vasur agniḥ purupraśasta eṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3477: RV_8,103.13a mo te riṣan ye acchoktibhir vaso 'gne kebhiś cid evaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn08u:3478: RV_8,103.13c kīriś cid dhi tvām īṭṭe dūtyāya rātahavyaḥ svadhvaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn08u:3479: RV_8,103.14a āgne yāhi marutsakhā rudrebhiḥ somapītaye |
GV01rv_hn08u:3480: RV_8,103.14c sobharyā upa suṣṭutim mādayasva svarṇare ||
